
-----title
西安（长安） (出生地)
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='83af01cc537a4088bd9367fc47108a49_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("83af01cc537a4088bd9367fc47108a49");'><span id='83af01cc537a4088bd9367fc47108a49_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=826')">803-826年</a>，1-24岁</div><div id='83af01cc537a4088bd9367fc47108a49' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　杜牧本年出生。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　不详。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年8月</a>　八月，宦官俱文珍等恶王叔文，强迫顺宗传位于太子李纯，宪宗即位。王叔文、柳宗元、刘禹锡等均遭贬谪。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年1月</a>　正月，顺宗卒。父从郁转左补阙，改授左拾遗，又改秘书丞。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年</a>　弟杜顗生。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　王易简常来杜家，杜牧识之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　不详。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　杜牧常在其祖父杜佑樊川别墅游戏。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　不详。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　杜牧祖父杜佑卒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=816')">813-816年</a>　不详。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年</a>　杜牧父杜从郁卒，杜牧兄弟幼小，不善持家，卖宅还债，奴婢多散去。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=819')">818-819年</a>　不详。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　正月，宪宗为宦官陈弘志等所杀，穆宗李恒即位。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　不详。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　杜牧读《尚书》、《毛诗》、《左传》、《国语》、十三代史书，知兵事关系于国家之兴亡，贤卿大夫均宜知兵。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=824')">823-824年</a>　不详。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=825&endYear=825')">825年</a>　敬宗即位时，年十六，好击球，喜手搏，大治宫室，沉溺声色。杜牧作文，借秦事以讽之。作品：《阿房宫赋》<div id='poem_1374739' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374739' class='poemTitle "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>六王</span>毕。四海一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374739_comment'></div>蜀山兀。阿房出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374739_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>覆压</span>三百馀里。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>隔离</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>天日</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374739_comment'></div>骊山北构而西折。直走咸阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374739_comment'></div>二川溶溶。流入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>宫墙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374739_comment'></div>五步一楼。十步一阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374739_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>廊腰</span>缦回。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>檐牙</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>高啄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374739_comment'></div>各抱地势。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>钩心斗角</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374739_comment'></div>盘盘焉。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>囷囷</span>焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374739_comment'></div>蜂房水涡矗。不知乎几千万落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374739_comment'></div>长桥卧波。未云何龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374739_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>复道</span>行空。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>不霁</span>何虹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374739_comment'></div>高低冥迷。不知西东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374739_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>歌台</span>暖响。春光融融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374739_comment'></div>舞殿冷袖。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>风雨凄凄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374739_comment'></div>一日之内。一宫之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374739_comment'></div>而气候不齐。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>妃嫔</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/33/Comments/1")'>媵嫱</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374739_comment'></div>王子皇孙。辞楼下殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374739_comment'></div>辇来于秦。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>朝歌夜弦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374739_comment'></div>为秦宫人。明星荧荧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374739_comment'></div>开<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>妆镜</span>也。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>绿云</span>扰扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374739_comment'></div>梳晓鬟也。渭流涨腻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374739_comment'></div>弃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>脂水</span>也。烟斜雾横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374739_comment'></div>焚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>椒兰</span>也。雷霆乍惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374739_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>宫车</span>过也。辘辘远听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374739_comment'></div>杳不知其所之也。一肌一容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374739_comment'></div>尽态极妍。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>缦立</span>远视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374739_comment'></div>而望幸焉。有不得见者三十六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374739_comment'></div>燕赵之收藏。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>韩魏</span>之经营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374739_comment'></div>齐楚之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>精英</span>。几世几年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374739_comment'></div>剽掠其人。倚叠如山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374739_comment'></div>一旦不能有。输来其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374739_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>鼎铛玉石</span>。金块<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>珠砾</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374739_comment'></div>弃掷逦迤。秦人视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374739_comment'></div>亦不甚惜。嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374739_comment'></div>一人之心。千万人之心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374739_comment'></div>秦爱纷奢。人亦念其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374739_comment'></div>柰何取之尽锱铢。用之如泥沙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374739_comment'></div>使负栋之柱。多于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>南亩</span>之农夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374739_comment'></div>架梁之椽。多于机上之工女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374739_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>钉头</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/80/Comments/1")'>磷磷</span>。多于在庾之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>粟粒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374739_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>瓦缝</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/82/Comments/1")'>参差</span>。多于周身之帛缕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374739_comment'></div>直栏横槛。多于九土之城郭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374739_comment'></div>管弦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>呕哑</span>。多于市人之言语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374739_comment'></div>使天下之人。不敢言而敢怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374739_comment'></div>独夫之心。日益骄固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374739_comment'></div>戌卒叫。函谷举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374739_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>楚人一炬</span>。可怜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1374739", 1374739, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>焦土</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374739_comment'></div>呜呼。灭六国者六国也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374739_comment'></div>非秦也。族秦者秦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374739_comment'></div>非天下也。嗟夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374739_comment'></div>使六国各爱其人。则足以拒秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374739_comment'></div>秦复爱六国之人。则递三世可至万世而为君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374739_comment'></div>谁得而族灭也。秦人不暇自哀而后人哀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374739_comment'></div>后人哀之而不鉴之。亦使后人而复哀后人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374739_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_55_1374739_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=825&endYear=825')">825年</a>　在长安。杜牧作文劝昭义节度使刘悟，劝其讨河北叛镇朱克融、王廷凑、史宪诚，并对其恃功骄恣，加以规讽。作品：《上昭义刘司徒书》<div id='poem_1374872' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374872' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374872?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上李司徒相公论用兵书</a><span class='authorDate'>（825年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374872")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374872_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374872'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374872'>伏睹明诏。诛山东不受命者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374872_comment'></div>庙堂之上。事在相公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374872_comment'></div>虽樽俎之谋。算画已定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374872_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1374872", 1374872, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>贱末</span>之士。刍荛敢陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374872_comment'></div>伏希舍其狂愚。一赐听览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374872_comment'></div>某大和二年为校书郎。曾诣淮西将军董重质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374872_comment'></div>诘其以三州之众。四岁不破之由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374872_comment'></div>重质自誇勇敢多算之外。复言其不破之由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374872_comment'></div>是徵兵太杂耳。遍徵诸道兵士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374872_comment'></div>上不过五千人。下不至千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374872_comment'></div>既不能自成一军。事须帖附地主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374872_comment'></div>名为客军。每有战阵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374872_comment'></div>客军居前。主人在后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374872_comment'></div>势羸力弱。心志不一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374872_comment'></div>既居前列。多致败亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374872_comment'></div>如战似胜。则主人引救以为已功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374872_comment'></div>小不胜。则主人先退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374872_comment'></div>至有歼焉。初战二年已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374872_comment'></div>战则必胜。是多杀客军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374872_comment'></div>及二年已后。客军殚少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374872_comment'></div>止与陈许河阳全军相搏。纵使唐州军不能因雪取城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374872_comment'></div>蔡州兵力亦不支矣。其时朝廷若使鄂州寿州唐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374872_comment'></div>祇令保境。不用进战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374872_comment'></div>但用陈许郑滑两道全军。帖以宣润弩手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374872_comment'></div>令其守隘。即不出一岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374872_comment'></div>无蔡州矣。今者上党之叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374872_comment'></div>复与淮西不同。淮西为寇仅五十岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374872_comment'></div>破汴州襄州襄城。尽得其财货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374872_comment'></div>输之悬瓠。复败韩全义于溵上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374872_comment'></div>多杀官军四万馀人。输辇财谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374872_comment'></div>数月不尽。是以其人味为寇之腴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374872_comment'></div>见为寇之利。风俗益固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374872_comment'></div>气燄已成。自以为天下之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374872_comment'></div>莫我与敌。父子相勉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374872_comment'></div>仅于两世。根深源阔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374872_comment'></div>取之固难。夫上党则不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374872_comment'></div>自安史南下。不甚附隶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374872_comment'></div>建中之后。每奋忠义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374872_comment'></div>是以郳公抱真能窘田悦。走朱滔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374872_comment'></div>常以孤穷寒苦之军。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1374872", 1374872, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>横折</span>河朔彊梁之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374872_comment'></div>贞元中。节度使李长策卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374872_comment'></div>中使提诏授与本军大将。但军士附者即授之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374872_comment'></div>其时大将来希皓为众所服。中使将以手诏付之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374872_comment'></div>希皓言于众曰。此军取人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374872_comment'></div>合是希皓。但作节度使不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374872_comment'></div>若朝廷以一束草来。希皓亦必敬事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374872_comment'></div>中使言面奉进旨。只令此军取大将授与节龯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374872_comment'></div>朝廷不别除人。希皓固辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374872_comment'></div>押衙卢从史其位居四下。因潜与监军相结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374872_comment'></div>超出伍曰。若来大夫不肯受诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374872_comment'></div>某请且勾当此军。监军曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374872_comment'></div>卢中丞若肯如此。此亦固合圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374872_comment'></div>中使因探怀取诏以授之。从史捧诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374872_comment'></div>再拜舞蹈。希皓回挥同列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374872_comment'></div>使北面称贺。军士毕集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374872_comment'></div>更无一言。从史尔后渐畜奸谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374872_comment'></div>养义儿三千人。日夕煦沫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374872_comment'></div>及父虔死。军士留之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374872_comment'></div>表请起复。亦只义儿与之唱和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374872_comment'></div>其馀大将王翼元乌重允第五钊等及长行兵士。并不同心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374872_comment'></div>及至被擒。乌重允坐于军门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374872_comment'></div>喻以祸福。义儿三千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374872_comment'></div>一取约束。及河阳取孟元阳为之统帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374872_comment'></div>一军无主仅一月日。曾无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1374872", 1374872, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>犬吠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374872_comment'></div>况于他谋。以此證验人心忠赤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374872_comment'></div>习尚专一。可以尽见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374872_comment'></div>及元和十五年。授与刘悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374872_comment'></div>时当幽镇入觐。天下无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374872_comment'></div>柄庙算者。议必销兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374872_comment'></div>雄健敢勇之士。百战千攻之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374872_comment'></div>坐食租赋。其来已久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374872_comment'></div>一旦黜去。使同编户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374872_comment'></div>纷纷诸镇。停解至多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374872_comment'></div>是以天下兵士闻之。无不忿恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374872_comment'></div>至长庆元年七月。幽镇乘此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374872_comment'></div>首唱为乱。昭义一军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374872_comment'></div>初亦郁咈。及诏下诛叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374872_comment'></div>使温起居造宣慰泽潞。便令发兵其时九月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374872_comment'></div>天气已寒。四方全师未颁中冬衣服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374872_comment'></div>聚之授诏。或伍或离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374872_comment'></div>垂手<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1374872", 1374872, "Clauses/160/Comments/0")'>强项</span>。往往谇语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374872_comment'></div>及温起居立于重榻。大布恩旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374872_comment'></div>并疏昭义一军。自七十馀年忠义战伐之功劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374872_comment'></div>安史已还叛逆灭亡之明效。辞语既毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374872_comment'></div>无不欢呼。人衣裋褐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374872_comment'></div>争出效命。其时用兵处处败北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374872_comment'></div>唯昭义一军。于临城县北同果堡下大战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374872_comment'></div>杀贼五千馀人。所杀皆楼下步射搏天飞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374872_comment'></div>贼之精勇。无不歼焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374872_comment'></div>贼中大震。更一月日田布不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374872_comment'></div>贼亦自溃。后一月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374872_comment'></div>其军大乱。杀大将磁州刺史张汶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374872_comment'></div>因劫监军刘承阶。尽杀其下小使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374872_comment'></div>此实承阶侮媟一军。侵取不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374872_comment'></div>张汶随王承元出于镇州。久与昭义相攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374872_comment'></div>军人恶之。汶既因依承阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374872_comment'></div>谋欲杀悟自取。军人忌怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374872_comment'></div>遂至大乱。非悟独能使其如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374872_comment'></div>刘悟卒。从谏求继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1374872_comment'></div>与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1374872", 1374872, "Clauses/198/Comments/0")'>扶同</span>者只郓州随来中军二千耳。其副倅贾直言入责从谏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1374872_comment'></div>尔父提十二州地归之朝廷。其功非细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1374872_comment'></div>祇以张汶之故。自谓不洁淋头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1374872_comment'></div>竟至羞死。尔一孺子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1374872_comment'></div>安敢如此。从谏恐悚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1374872_comment'></div>不敢出言。一军闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1374872_comment'></div>皆阴然直言之说。值宝历多故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1374872_comment'></div>因以授之。今才二十馀岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1374872_comment'></div>风俗未改。故老尚存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1374872_comment'></div>虽欲劫之。必不用命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1374872_comment'></div>伏以河阳西北去天井关强一百里。关隘多山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1374872_comment'></div>井不可凿。虽有兵力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1374872_comment'></div>必恐无功。若以万人为垒下窒其口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1374872_comment'></div>高壁深堑。勿与之战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1374872_comment'></div>忽有败负。势惊洛师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1374872_comment'></div>盖河阳军士。素非精勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1374872_comment'></div>战则不足。守则有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1374872_comment'></div>成德一军。自六十年来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1374872_comment'></div>世与昭义为敌。访闻无事之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1374872_comment'></div>村落邻里。不相往来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1374872_comment'></div>今王司徒代居反侧。思一自雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1374872_comment'></div>况联姻戚。愿奋可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1374872_comment'></div>六十年相雠之兵。仗朝廷委任之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1374872_comment'></div>必宜尽节。以答殊私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1374872_comment'></div>魏博承风。亦当效顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1374872_comment'></div>然亦止于围一城攻一堡。刊木堙井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1374872_comment'></div>系累稚老而已。必不能背二十城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1374872_comment'></div>长驱上山。径捣上党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1374872_comment'></div>其用武之地。必取之策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1374872_comment'></div>在于西面。今者严紫塞之守备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1374872_comment'></div>谨白马之堤防。祇以忠武武宁两军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1374872_comment'></div>以青州五千精甲宣润二千弩手。由绛州路直东径入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1374872_comment'></div>不过数日。必覆其巢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1374872_comment'></div>何者。昭义军粮尽在山东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1374872_comment'></div>泽潞两州全居山内。土瘠地狭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1374872_comment'></div>积谷全无。是以节度使多在邢州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1374872_comment'></div>名为就粮。山东粮谷既不可输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1374872_comment'></div>山西兵士亦必单鲜。捣虚之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1374872_comment'></div>正在于此。后周武帝大举伐齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1374872_comment'></div>路由河阳。吏部宇文㢸曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1374872_comment'></div>夫河阳要冲。精兵所聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1374872_comment'></div>尽力攻围。恐难得志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1374872_comment'></div>如臣所见。彼汾之曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1374872_comment'></div>戌小山平。用武之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1374872_comment'></div>莫过于此。帝不纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1374872_comment'></div>无功而还。后复大举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1374872_comment'></div>竟用㢸计。遂以灭齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1374872_comment'></div>前秦苻坚遣将王猛伐后燕慕容伟。大破伟将慕容评于潞州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1374872_comment'></div>因遂灭之。路亦由此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1374872_comment'></div>北齐高欢再攻后周。路亦由此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1374872_comment'></div>而后周名将韦孝宽齐王攸常镇勋州玉璧城。故东西相伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1374872_comment'></div>每由此路。以古为證。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1374872_comment'></div>得之者多。以某愚见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1374872_comment'></div>不言刘稹终不能取。贵欲速擒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1374872_comment'></div>免生他患。昨者北虏才毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1374872_comment'></div>复生上党。赖相公庙算深远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1374872_comment'></div>北虏即日败亡。傥使北虏至今尚存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1374872_comment'></div>沿边犹须转战。回顾上党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1374872_comment'></div>岂能讨除。天下虽言无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1374872_comment'></div>若上党久不能解。别生患难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1374872_comment'></div>此亦非细。自古皆因攻伐未解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1374872_comment'></div>旁有他变。故孙子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1374872_comment'></div>兵闻拙速。未睹巧之久也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1374872_comment'></div>伏闻圣主全以兵事付于相公。某受恩最深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1374872_comment'></div>窃敢干冒威严。远陈愚见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1374872_comment'></div>无任战汗。某顿首再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1374872_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_165_1374872_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=826&endYear=826')">826年12月</a>　十二月，宦官刘克明、击毬军将苏左明等杀敬宗，宦官王守澄等拥立为文宗李昂，即文宗。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='b04e78bcdb4f429eb523c9dec30e956b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b04e78bcdb4f429eb523c9dec30e956b");'><span id='b04e78bcdb4f429eb523c9dec30e956b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=828&endYear=828')">828年</a>，26岁</div><div id='b04e78bcdb4f429eb523c9dec30e956b' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=828&endYear=828')">828年3月</a>　三月，在长安。杜牧应制举贤良方正能方极谏科，以第四等及第，授官为弘文馆校书郎、试左武卫兵曹参军。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=828&endYear=828')">828年</a>　在长安。杜牧游城南文公寺。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=828&endYear=828')">828年</a>　在长安。杜牧作诗赠终南兰若僧人。作品：《赠终南兰若僧》<div id='poem_32115' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32115' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/32115?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠终南兰若僧</a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32115")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_32115_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_32115'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4342, "poem_allusion_32115")'>休公</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_32115_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32115'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32115'>北阙南山是故乡<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作家在城南杜曲傍）</span>，两枝仙桂一时芳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32115'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4342, "poem_sentence_1_32115")'>休公</span>都不知名姓，始觉禅门气味长。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32115'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_32115_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=828&endYear=828')">828年</a>　在长安。弘文馆校书郎任上，杜牧诣董重质，问淮西四岁不破之由。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=828&endYear=828')">828年</a>　在长安。弘文馆校书郎任上。秋，杜牧居于樊川，有文一篇。作品：《晚晴赋并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此条活动具体时间不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1374741' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374741' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374741?labeling=true' target='_blank'>晚晴赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374741")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374741_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1374741'>秋日晚晴。樊川子目于郊园。见大者小者。有状类者。故书赋云。</div><div id='poem_preface_1374741_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374741'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374741'>雨晴秋容新沐兮。忻绕园而细履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374741_comment'></div>面平池之清空兮。紫阁青横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374741_comment'></div>远来照水。如高堂之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374741_comment'></div>见罗幕兮。垂乎镜里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374741_comment'></div>木势党伍兮。行者如迎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374741_comment'></div>偃者如醉。高者如达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374741_comment'></div>低者如跂。松数十株。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374741_comment'></div>切切交峙。如冠剑大臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374741_comment'></div>国有急难。庭立而议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374741_comment'></div>竹林外裹兮。十万丈夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374741_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1374741", 1374741, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>甲刃</span>摐摐。密阵而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1374741", 1374741, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>环侍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374741_comment'></div>岂负军令之不敢嚣兮。何意气之严毅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374741_comment'></div>复引舟于深湾。忽八九之红芰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374741_comment'></div>姹然如妇。敛然如女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374741_comment'></div>堕蕊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1374741", 1374741, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>黦颜</span>。似见放弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374741_comment'></div>白鹭潜来兮。邈风标之公子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374741_comment'></div>窥此美人兮。如慕悦其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1374741", 1374741, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>容媚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374741_comment'></div>杂花参差于岸侧兮。绛绿黄紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374741_comment'></div>格顽色贱兮。或妾或婢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374741_comment'></div>间草甚多。丛者束兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_1374917' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374917' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374917?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故范阳卢秀才墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（839年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374917")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374917_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374917'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374917'>秀才卢生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374917_comment'></div>名霈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374917_comment'></div>字子中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374917_comment'></div>自天宝后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374917_comment'></div>三代或仕燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374917_comment'></div>或仕赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374917_comment'></div>两地皆多良田畜马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374917_comment'></div>生年二十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374917_comment'></div>未知古有人曰周公孔夫子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374917_comment'></div>击毬饮酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374917_comment'></div>策马射走兔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374917_comment'></div>语言习尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374917_comment'></div>无非攻守战斗之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374917_comment'></div>镇州有儒者黄建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374917_comment'></div>镇人敬之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374917_comment'></div>呼为先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374917_comment'></div>建因语生以先王儒学之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374917_comment'></div>因复曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374917_comment'></div>自河而南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374917_comment'></div>有土地数万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374917_comment'></div>可以燕赵比者百数十处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374917_comment'></div>有西京东京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374917_comment'></div>西京有天子公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374917_comment'></div>士人畦居两京间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374917_comment'></div>皆亿万家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374917_comment'></div>万国皆持其土产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374917_comment'></div>出其珍异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374917_comment'></div>时节朝贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374917_comment'></div>一取约束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374917_comment'></div>无禁限疑忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374917_comment'></div>广大宽易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374917_comment'></div>嬉游终日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374917_comment'></div>但能为先王儒学之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374917_comment'></div>可得其公卿之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374917_comment'></div>显荣富贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374917_comment'></div>流及子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374917_comment'></div>至老不见战争杀戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374917_comment'></div>生立悟其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374917_comment'></div>即阴约母弟云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374917_comment'></div>窃家骏马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374917_comment'></div>日驰三百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374917_comment'></div>夜抵襄国界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374917_comment'></div>舍马步行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374917_comment'></div>径入王屋山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374917_comment'></div>请诣道士观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374917_comment'></div>道士怜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374917_comment'></div>置之门外庑下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374917_comment'></div>席地而处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374917_comment'></div>始闻孝经论语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374917_comment'></div>布褐不袜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374917_comment'></div>捽草为茹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374917_comment'></div>或竟日不得食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374917_comment'></div>如此凡十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374917_comment'></div>年三十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374917_comment'></div>有文有学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374917_comment'></div>日闲习人事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374917_comment'></div>诚敬通达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374917_comment'></div>汝洛间士人稍稍知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374917_comment'></div>开成三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374917_comment'></div>来京师举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374917_comment'></div>于群辈中酋酋然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374917_comment'></div>凡曰进士知名者多趋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374917_comment'></div>愿与之为交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374917_comment'></div>生尝曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374917_comment'></div>丈夫一日得志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374917_comment'></div>天子召于座前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374917_comment'></div>以笏画地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374917_comment'></div>取山东一百二十城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374917_comment'></div>唯我知其甚易耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374917_comment'></div>因言燕赵间山川夷险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374917_comment'></div>教令风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374917_comment'></div>人情之所短长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374917_comment'></div>三十年来王师攻击。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374917_comment'></div>利与不利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374917_comment'></div>其所来由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374917_comment'></div>明白如彩画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374917_comment'></div>一一可以目睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374917_comment'></div>开成四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374917_comment'></div>客游代州南归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374917_comment'></div>某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374917_comment'></div>于晋州霍邑县界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374917_comment'></div>昼日盗杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374917_comment'></div>京师名进士闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374917_comment'></div>多有哭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374917_comment'></div>资其弟云至霍邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374917_comment'></div>取生丧来长安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374917_comment'></div>以某年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374917_comment'></div>葬于城南某乡里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374917_comment'></div>其所资费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374917_comment'></div>皆出于交游间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374917_comment'></div>曾祖昌嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374917_comment'></div>涿州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374917_comment'></div>祖顗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374917_comment'></div>易州长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374917_comment'></div>父劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374917_comment'></div>镇州石邑令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374917_comment'></div>某常以生之材节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374917_comment'></div>荐生于公卿间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374917_comment'></div>闻生之死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1374917_comment'></div>哭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1374917_comment'></div>因志其墓。</div><div id='poem_sentence_100_1374917_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=839&endYear=839')">839年</a>　在长安，左补阙、史馆修编任上。杜牧为岐阳公主作墓志铭。作品：《唐故岐阳公主墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（岐阳公主，即岐阳庄淑大长公主，唐宪宗女，懿安所生。下嫁杜悰。传见《新唐书》卷八三《诸帝公主》）</span><div id='poem_1374929' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374929' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374929?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故岐阳公主墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（839年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1374929'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374929'>宪宗皇帝即位八年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374929_comment'></div>出嫡女册封岐阳公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374929_comment'></div>下嫁于今工部尚书判度支杜公悰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374929_comment'></div>始宪宗时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374929_comment'></div>宰相权德舆有婿独孤郁为翰林学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374929_comment'></div>帝爱其才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374929_comment'></div>因命宰相曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374929_comment'></div>我嫡女既笄可嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374929_comment'></div>德舆得婿独孤郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374929_comment'></div>我岂不得耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374929_comment'></div>可求其比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374929_comment'></div>后丞相吉甫进言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374929_comment'></div>前所奉诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374929_comment'></div>臣谨搜其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374929_comment'></div>因名我烈祖司徒岐公曰有孙儿悰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374929_comment'></div>年始弱冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374929_comment'></div>有德行文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374929_comment'></div>秀朗严整。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374929_comment'></div>臣尝为司徒吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374929_comment'></div>熟其家事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374929_comment'></div>官族世婚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374929_comment'></div>习尚守治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374929_comment'></div>臣一皆忖度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374929_comment'></div>疑悰可以奉诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374929_comment'></div>帝即召尚书见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374929_comment'></div>与语大悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374929_comment'></div>授殿中少监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374929_comment'></div>服章金紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374929_comment'></div>以元和八年某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374929_comment'></div>主下嫁于杜氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374929_comment'></div>上御正殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374929_comment'></div>礼毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374929_comment'></div>由西朝堂出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374929_comment'></div>节幡鼓铎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374929_comment'></div>仪物毕备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374929_comment'></div>引就昌化里赐第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374929_comment'></div>上御延喜楼驻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374929_comment'></div>止主轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374929_comment'></div>尚书及宾侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374929_comment'></div>酒食金帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374929_comment'></div>奏内乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374929_comment'></div>降嫔御送行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374929_comment'></div>赐第堂有四庑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374929_comment'></div>缋椽藻栌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374929_comment'></div>丹白其壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374929_comment'></div>派龙首水为沼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374929_comment'></div>主外族因请愿以尚父汾阳王大通里亭沼为主别馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374929_comment'></div>当其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374929_comment'></div>隆贵显荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374929_comment'></div>莫与为比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374929_comment'></div>主实宪宗皇帝嫡女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374929_comment'></div>穆宗皇帝母妹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374929_comment'></div>敬宗皇帝今天子亲姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374929_comment'></div>尚父汾阳王子仪外曾孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374929_comment'></div>太皇太后始以正妃事宪宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374929_comment'></div>以太后太皇太后养爱三朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374929_comment'></div>凡四十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374929_comment'></div>德厚慈恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374929_comment'></div>化充六宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374929_comment'></div>主以一女之爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374929_comment'></div>降于杜氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374929_comment'></div>逮事舅姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374929_comment'></div>杜氏大族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374929_comment'></div>其他宜为妇礼者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374929_comment'></div>不翅数十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374929_comment'></div>主卑委怡顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374929_comment'></div>奉上抚下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374929_comment'></div>终日惕惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374929_comment'></div>屏息拜起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374929_comment'></div>一同家人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374929_comment'></div>礼度二十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374929_comment'></div>人未尝以丝发间指为贵骄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374929_comment'></div>始与尚书合谋曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374929_comment'></div>上所赐奴婢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374929_comment'></div>卒不肯穷屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374929_comment'></div>奏请纳之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374929_comment'></div>上嘉叹许可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374929_comment'></div>因锡其直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374929_comment'></div>悉自市寒贱可制指者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374929_comment'></div>自是闭门落然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374929_comment'></div>不闻人声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374929_comment'></div>尚书读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374929_comment'></div>考今古治乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374929_comment'></div>主职妇事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374929_comment'></div>承奉夫族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374929_comment'></div>时岁献馈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374929_comment'></div>吉凶赙助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374929_comment'></div>必亲自经手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374929_comment'></div>池塞馆陊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374929_comment'></div>辟毬场种树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374929_comment'></div>不数十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374929_comment'></div>搢绅间杂然称尚书有贤妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374929_comment'></div>尚书旋出为澧州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374929_comment'></div>主后尚书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374929_comment'></div>郡县闻主且至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374929_comment'></div>杀牛羊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374929_comment'></div>大为数百人供具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374929_comment'></div>主至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374929_comment'></div>从不二十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1374929_comment'></div>六七婢乘驴阘茸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1374929_comment'></div>约所至不得肉食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1374929_comment'></div>驿吏立门外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1374929_comment'></div>舁饭食以返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1374929_comment'></div>不数日间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1374929_comment'></div>闻于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1374929_comment'></div>众哗说以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_105_1374929", 1374929, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>异事</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1374929_comment'></div>尚书在澧州三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1374929_comment'></div>主始入后出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1374929_comment'></div>中间不识刺史厅屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1374929_comment'></div>尚书治澧州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1374929_comment'></div>考治行为天下第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1374929_comment'></div>后为大司徒京兆尹凤翔节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1374929_comment'></div>朝廷屈指比数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1374929_comment'></div>以为凡有中外重难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1374929_comment'></div>非尚书不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1374929_comment'></div>主贤益彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1374929_comment'></div>虽至宫闱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_116_1374929", 1374929, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>贵号</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1374929_comment'></div>亦加尊敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1374929_comment'></div>姑凉国太夫人寝疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1374929_comment'></div>比丧及葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1374929_comment'></div>主奉养蚤夜不解带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1374929_comment'></div>亲自尝药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1374929_comment'></div>粥饭不经心手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1374929_comment'></div>一不以进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1374929_comment'></div>既而哭泣哀号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1374929_comment'></div>感动他人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1374929_comment'></div>尚书后为忠武军节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1374929_comment'></div>所治许州创为节度府五十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1374929_comment'></div>南迫于蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1374929_comment'></div>屋室卑庳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1374929_comment'></div>主居无正堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1374929_comment'></div>处东支屋恬然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1374929_comment'></div>六年许军彊雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1374929_comment'></div>且撑剧寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1374929_comment'></div>自始多用武臣治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1374929_comment'></div>各出己部曲家人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1374929_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_136_1374929", 1374929, "Clauses/136/Comments/0")'>疵政</span>弛法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1374929_comment'></div>习为循常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1374929_comment'></div>有司用比边障远地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1374929_comment'></div>掷置不问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1374929_comment'></div>民亦甘心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1374929_comment'></div>尚书再治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1374929_comment'></div>老民相率两走阙下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1374929_comment'></div>遮丞相马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1374929_comment'></div>叩头乞留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1374929_comment'></div>请树生祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1374929_comment'></div>及诏追去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1374929_comment'></div>攀辕携扶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1374929_comment'></div>哭于道路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1374929_comment'></div>尚书治外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1374929_comment'></div>主治内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1374929_comment'></div>尚书所至必称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1374929_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_152_1374929", 1374929, "Clauses/152/Comments/0")'>崱崱</span>为名公伟人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1374929_comment'></div>主实有内助焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1374929_comment'></div>穆宗以太皇太后敬主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1374929_comment'></div>尤为亲信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1374929_comment'></div>俯首益卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1374929_comment'></div>车服侍使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1374929_comment'></div>愈自贬抑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1374929_comment'></div>觐谒温凊外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1374929_comment'></div>口不言他事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1374929_comment'></div>讫穆宗朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1374929_comment'></div>人不以亲贵称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1374929_comment'></div>当贞元时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1374929_comment'></div>德宗行姑息之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1374929_comment'></div>王武俊王士真张孝忠子联为国婿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1374929_comment'></div>宪宗初宠于頔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1374929_comment'></div>来朝以其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1374929_comment'></div>配以长女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1374929_comment'></div>皆挟恩佩势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1374929_comment'></div>聚少侠狗马为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1374929_comment'></div>日截驰道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1374929_comment'></div>纵击平人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1374929_comment'></div>豪取民物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1374929_comment'></div>官不敢问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1374929_comment'></div>戚里相尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1374929_comment'></div>不以为穷弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1374929_comment'></div>自主降于尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1374929_comment'></div>壁绝外之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1374929_comment'></div>初怒中笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1374929_comment'></div>后皆敬畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1374929_comment'></div>累圣亦指示主德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1374929_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_182_1374929", 1374929, "Clauses/182/Comments/0")'>诫警</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1374929_comment'></div>至于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1374929_comment'></div>以主尚书显重于中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1374929_comment'></div>戚里亦皆自检敛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1374929_comment'></div>随短长为善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1374929_comment'></div>于是旧俗灭不复有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1374929_comment'></div>尚书自许奉急追诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1374929_comment'></div>主有疾小愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1374929_comment'></div>强不肯留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1374929_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1374929_comment'></div>去朝兴庆宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1374929_comment'></div>纵死于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1374929_comment'></div>吾无恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1374929_comment'></div>以开成二年十一月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1374929_comment'></div>薨于汝州长桥驿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1374929_comment'></div>享年若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1374929_comment'></div>上废朝三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1374929_comment'></div>其年十二月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1374929_comment'></div>主丧至京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1374929_comment'></div>比及葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1374929_comment'></div>两宫吊问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1374929_comment'></div>相继于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1374929_comment'></div>开成三年某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1374929_comment'></div>上御正殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1374929_comment'></div>诏丞相嗣复摄中书令正衙宣册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1374929_comment'></div>谥曰庄淑大长公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1374929_comment'></div>某年某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1374929_comment'></div>祔葬于万年县洪原乡少陵原尚书先茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1374929_comment'></div>礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1374929_comment'></div>生男二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1374929_comment'></div>长曰辅九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1374929_comment'></div>年十岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1374929_comment'></div>次曰杨十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1374929_comment'></div>始二岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1374929_comment'></div>女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1374929_comment'></div>某于尚书为从父弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1374929_comment'></div>得以实铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1374929_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1374929_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_220_1374929'>章武皇帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1374929_comment'></div>唐中兴主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1374929_comment'></div>刑于正妃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1374929_comment'></div>教及嫡女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1374929_comment'></div>婉婉帝子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1374929_comment'></div>下嫁时贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1374929_comment'></div>影逐响答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1374929_comment'></div>随顺缠绵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1374929_comment'></div>杜氏大族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1374929_comment'></div>枝蔓蝉联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1374929_comment'></div>上有舅姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1374929_comment'></div>高堂俨然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1374929_comment'></div>螭绶龟章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1374929_comment'></div>玉佩金轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1374929_comment'></div>养色悦意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1374929_comment'></div>待后承前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1374929_comment'></div>人不我贵。<div id='poem_sentence_238_1374929_comment'></div>大小周旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1374929_comment'></div>馀二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1374929_comment'></div>谁兴间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1374929_comment'></div>贵不召骄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_242_1374929_comment'></div>富不期侈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_243_1374929_comment'></div>是此四者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_244_1374929_comment'></div>倏相首尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_245_1374929_comment'></div>自古名士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_246_1374929_comment'></div>或泥于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_247_1374929_comment'></div>孰谓帝子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_248_1374929_comment'></div>超脱摆弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_249_1374929_comment'></div>妇职是勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_250_1374929_comment'></div>夫言是指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_251_1374929_comment'></div>池荒馆陊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_252_1374929_comment'></div>屏外不履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_253_1374929_comment'></div>淑德柔风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_254_1374929_comment'></div>天下倾耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_255_1374929_comment'></div>宜乎寿考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_256_1374929_comment'></div>妇女婚子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_257_1374929_comment'></div>不锡全祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_258_1374929_comment'></div>孰提神纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1374929_comment'></div>幽石有志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1374929_comment'></div>显笔有史。<div
