ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年</a>　在长安，杜牧作文赠友人。作品：《与浙西卢大夫书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（浙西卢大夫乃卢简辞，字子策，诗人卢纶子，弘止、简求之兄，曾任浙西观察使。此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1374881' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374881' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374881?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与浙西卢大夫书</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374881")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374881_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374881'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374881'>某顿首再拜。某年二十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374881_comment'></div>由校书郎入沈公幕府。自应举得官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374881_comment'></div>凡半岁间。既非生知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374881_comment'></div>复未涉人事。齿少意锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374881_comment'></div>举止动作。一无所据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374881_comment'></div>至于报效施展。朋友与游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374881_comment'></div>吏事取舍之道。未知东西南北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374881_comment'></div>宜所趋向。此时郎中六官一顾怜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374881_comment'></div>手携指画。一一诱教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374881_comment'></div>丁宁纤悉。两府六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374881_comment'></div>不嫌不怠。使某无大过而粗知所以为守者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374881_comment'></div>实由郎中之力也。去岁乞假。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374881_comment'></div>路由汉上。员外七官以某尝获知于郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374881_comment'></div>惠然不疑。推置于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1374881", 1374881, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>肺肝</span>间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374881_comment'></div>某恃郎中之知。亦敢自道其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374881_comment'></div>公私谋议。各悉所怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374881_comment'></div>一俯一仰。如久而深者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374881_comment'></div>久欲资郎中员外之为阶级。远干尊重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374881_comment'></div>欲望收恤。舐笔伸纸以复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374881_comment'></div>踰于三四。因曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374881_comment'></div>既阶级矣。步欲升堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374881_comment'></div>与排闼而入者事不同日。式微诗曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374881_comment'></div>何其处也。必有与也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374881_comment'></div>言必有仁义与我。所以处而不去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374881_comment'></div>进退计忖。不宜得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374881_comment'></div>今敢谨写所为文十四首。编为一卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374881_comment'></div>继进于后。爱之不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374881_comment'></div>为之不已。不至于工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374881_comment'></div>今以为献。无任惭惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374881_comment'></div>然特为进说之端。非敢因此求知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374881_comment'></div>不胜攀恋惕惧之至。某再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374881_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1374881_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　杜牧出为黄州刺史，离长安。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='758ce8add44942ffba65fbf3afcf64ba_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("758ce8add44942ffba65fbf3afcf64ba");'><span id='758ce8add44942ffba65fbf3afcf64ba_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=850')">848-850年</a>，46-48岁</div><div id='758ce8add44942ffba65fbf3afcf64ba' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=848')">848年12月</a>　十二月，杜牧至长安,任司勋员外郎、史馆修撰。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=848')">848年12月</a>　在长安,任司勋员外郎、史馆修撰，杜牧上书周墀。作品：《上周相公启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此条活动具体创作地点不详，姑系于此；周墀，字德升，汝南人，宣宗朝宰相。传见《旧唐书》卷176、《新唐书》卷182。）</span><div id='poem_1374885' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374885' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374885?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上周相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（848年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374885")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374885_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374885'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374885'>某启。伏奉三月八日敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374885_comment'></div>除尚书司勋员外郎史馆修撰。承命荣惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374885_comment'></div>启处无地。伏以圣主顺上帝之则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374885_comment'></div>率四海以仁。神化风行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374885_comment'></div>家至日见。古先哲王之德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374885_comment'></div>有求必至。有开必先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374885_comment'></div>是以傅吕得于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1374885", 1374885, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>梦卜</span>。申甫降于山岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374885_comment'></div>伏惟相公待主乃用。为时而生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374885_comment'></div>当考室搆厦之时。膺笃绳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1374885", 1374885, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>削墨</span>之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374885_comment'></div>赞俊杰。遂贤良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374885_comment'></div>调阴阳。提纪律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374885_comment'></div>类能而使。度材授官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374885_comment'></div>常切如家之忧。每怀挞市之耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374885_comment'></div>是以朝廷礼乐。天下清明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374885_comment'></div>人不凋伤。神不怨怅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374885_comment'></div>万物由道。百度皆贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374885_comment'></div>虽周获仁人。商得元哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374885_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1374885", 1374885, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>梦卜</span>降岳之得。岂能逾焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374885_comment'></div>某朴𣙙之才。粪朽之贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374885_comment'></div>遭逢盛业。三带郡符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374885_comment'></div>自审事宜。实以逾忝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374885_comment'></div>伏以睦州治所在万山之中。终日昏氛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374885_comment'></div>侵染衰病。自量忝官已过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374885_comment'></div>不敢率然请告。唯念满岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374885_comment'></div>得保生还。不意相公拔自污泥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374885_comment'></div>升于霄汉。郤收斥锢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374885_comment'></div>令厕班行。仍授名曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374885_comment'></div>帖以重职。当受震骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374885_comment'></div>神魂飞扬。抚已自惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374885_comment'></div>喜过成泣。药肉白骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374885_comment'></div>香返游魂。言于重恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374885_comment'></div>无以过此。虽买臣怀绂郡邸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374885_comment'></div>萧育召拜扶风。杨仆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1374885", 1374885, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>三组</span>垂腰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374885_comment'></div>苏秦六印在手。校于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1374885", 1374885, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>荣忝</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374885_comment'></div>无以为踰。言念微生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374885_comment'></div>难酬殊造。伏以相公自数载已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374885_comment'></div>朝廷旧老。四海俊贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374885_comment'></div>皆因提挈。尽在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1374885", 1374885, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>门馆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374885_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1374885", 1374885, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>毗辅</span>圣主。巍为元勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374885_comment'></div>自有明神。以相百禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374885_comment'></div>顾唯贱末。报效无门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374885_comment'></div>感激血诚。涕泪迸溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374885_comment'></div>无任攀恋激切恳款之至。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374885_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1374885_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=848')">848年</a>　在长安，杜牧作诗寄友人张次宗。作品：《寄澧州张舍人笛》<span class='inlineComment2'>（张次宗此时守澧州。）</span><div id='poem_32269' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32269' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/32269?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄澧州张舍人笛</a><span class='authorDate'>（848年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32269")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_32269_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32269'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32269'>发匀肉好生春岭，截玉钻星寄使君。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32269_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32269'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_32269", 32269, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>檀的</span>染时痕半月，落梅飘处响穿云。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32269_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32269'>楼中威凤倾冠听，沙上惊鸿掠水分。<div id='poem_sentence_2_32269_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_32269'>遥想紫泥封诏罢，夜深应隔禁墙闻。<div id='poem_sentence_3_32269_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_32269'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_32269_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=849&endYear=849')">849年1月</a>　在长安，任尚书司勋员外郎、史馆修撰。正月，杜牧奉诏撰故江西观察使韦丹遗爱碑。作品：《唐故江西观察使武阳公韦公遗爱碑》<div id='poem_1374915' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374915' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374915?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故江西观察使武阳公韦公遗爱碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（849年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374915")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374915_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374915'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374915'>皇帝召丞相延英便殿讲议政事。及于循吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374915_comment'></div>且称元和中兴之盛。言理人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374915_comment'></div>谁居第一。丞相墀言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374915_comment'></div>臣尝守土江西。目睹观察使韦丹有大功德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374915_comment'></div>被于八州。殁四十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374915_comment'></div>稚老歌思。如丹尚存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374915_comment'></div>丞相敏中丞相植皆曰。臣知丹之为理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374915_comment'></div>所至人爱。所去人思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374915_comment'></div>江西之政。熟于听闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374915_comment'></div>乃命守臣覈于众。上丹之功状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374915_comment'></div>大中三年正月二十日。诏书授史臣尚书司勋员外郎杜牧曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374915_comment'></div>汝为丹序而铭之。以美大其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374915_comment'></div>臣某伏念天宝建中艰难之馀。根于河北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374915_comment'></div>枝蔓于齐鲁梁蔡。辟为章句书生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374915_comment'></div>以蜀叛。锜为宗室老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374915_comment'></div>以吴叛。其他高下其目跂而欲飞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374915_comment'></div>往往皆是。宪宗皇帝高听古议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374915_comment'></div>广谏益圣。任贤使能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374915_comment'></div>考校法度。号令未出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374915_comment'></div>威先雷霆。十有四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374915_comment'></div>擒殛凶狠。方行四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374915_comment'></div>罔不率伏。当是时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374915_comment'></div>凡五徵兵。解而复合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374915_comment'></div>仅八周岁。天下晏然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374915_comment'></div>不告劳苦。实以守土多循良吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374915_comment'></div>而丹居第一。周召伯治人于陜西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374915_comment'></div>召穆公有武功于宣王时。仲尼采甘棠江汉之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374915_comment'></div>弦而歌之。列于风雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374915_comment'></div>班固叙汉宣帝中兴名臣。言治人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374915_comment'></div>亦首述黄霸龚遂。次将相下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374915_comment'></div>今下明诏。刻丹治效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374915_comment'></div>令得与元和功臣。彰中兴得人之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374915_comment'></div>悬于无穷。用古道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374915_comment'></div>谨按韦氏。自汉丞相贤已降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374915_comment'></div>代有达官。孝宽有大功于后周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374915_comment'></div>封郧国公。郧公曾孙幼平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374915_comment'></div>为岐州参军。生抱贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374915_comment'></div>为梓州刺史。生政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374915_comment'></div>为汉州雒县丞。赠右谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374915_comment'></div>雒县生武阳公。公字文明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374915_comment'></div>以明五经登科。授校书郎咸阳尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374915_comment'></div>以监察御史殿中侍御史佐张献甫于邠宁府。徵为太子舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374915_comment'></div>迁起居郎检校吏部员外郎侍御史河阳行军司马。未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374915_comment'></div>改驾部员外郎。会新罗国以丧来告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374915_comment'></div>且请立君。拜司封郎中兼御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374915_comment'></div>章服金紫。吊册其嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374915_comment'></div>新罗再以丧告。不果行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374915_comment'></div>改容州经略使。筑州城环十三里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374915_comment'></div>因悉城管内十三州。教种茶麦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374915_comment'></div>多开屯田。黄贼畏服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374915_comment'></div>诏加大中大夫。贞元末拜河南少尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374915_comment'></div>连拜检校秘书监兼御史中丞郑滑行军司马。皆未至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374915_comment'></div>拜右谏议大夫。宪宗即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374915_comment'></div>刘辟以蜀叛。议者欲行贞元故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374915_comment'></div>请释不诛。公再上疏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374915_comment'></div>今不诛辟。则朝廷可以指臂而使者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374915_comment'></div>惟两京耳。此外而谁不为叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374915_comment'></div>因拜剑南东川节度使兼御史大夫。时刘辟急攻梓州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374915_comment'></div>公至汉中。表言攻急守坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374915_comment'></div>不可易帅。高崇文客军远斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374915_comment'></div>无所资。若与梓州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374915_comment'></div>缀其士心。必能有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374915_comment'></div>遂召拜晋慈隰三州观察使。不半岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374915_comment'></div>元和二年二月拜洪州观察使。洪据章江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374915_comment'></div>上控百越。为一都会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374915_comment'></div>屋居以茅竹为俗。人火之馀烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374915_comment'></div>日久风竹戛自焚。小至百家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374915_comment'></div>大至荡空。霖必江溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374915_comment'></div>燥必火作。火水夹攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374915_comment'></div>人无固志。倾摇懈怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374915_comment'></div>不为旬月生产计。公始至任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374915_comment'></div>计口取俸。除去冗事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374915_comment'></div>取公私钱。教人陶瓦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374915_comment'></div>伐山取材。堆謺亿计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374915_comment'></div>人能为屋。取官材瓦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374915_comment'></div>免其半赋。徐责其直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374915_comment'></div>自载酒食。以勉其劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374915_comment'></div>初若艰勤。日成月就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374915_comment'></div>不二周岁。凡为瓦屋万四千间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374915_comment'></div>楼四千二百间。县市营厩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374915_comment'></div>名为栋宇。无不创为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374915_comment'></div>派湖入江。节以斗门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374915_comment'></div>以走暴涨。辟开广衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374915_comment'></div>南北七里。荡渫污壅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374915_comment'></div>筑堤五尺。长十二里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374915_comment'></div>堤成明年。江与堤平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374915_comment'></div>凿六百陂塘。灌田一万顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374915_comment'></div>益劝桑苧。机织广狭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374915_comment'></div>俗所未习。教劝成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374915_comment'></div>凡三周年。成就生遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374915_comment'></div>手为目睹。无不如志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374915_comment'></div>公之为政。去害兴利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374915_comment'></div>机决势去。如孙吴乘敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374915_comment'></div>不可当向。辅以经术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374915_comment'></div>仁抚智诱。慈母之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374915_comment'></div>赤子之欲。求必得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374915_comment'></div>故人自尽力。所指必就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374915_comment'></div>子产治郑。未及三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374915_comment'></div>国人尚谤。黄霸治颍川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1374915_comment'></div>前后八年。始曰愈治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1374915_comment'></div>考二古人行事。与公相次第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1374915_comment'></div>不知如何。元和五年薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1374915_comment'></div>年五十八。其铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1374915_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_103_1374915'>章武皇帝。披攘经营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1374915_comment'></div>凡十四年。五大徵兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1374915_comment'></div>人不告病。肩于太宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1374915_comment'></div>将相是矣。岂无循良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1374915_comment'></div>考第理行。谁高武阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1374915_comment'></div>武阳所至。为人父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1374915_comment'></div>于洪之功。洞无前古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1374915_comment'></div>洪始有居。水火是苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1374915_comment'></div>二者夹攻。死无处所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1374915_comment'></div>曰天所然。不嗟不诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1374915_comment'></div>武阳始至。材瓦是聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1374915_comment'></div>公钱不足。以俸为助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1374915_comment'></div>能为居宇。贳贷付与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1374915_comment'></div>日载酒肴。如抚稚乳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1374915_comment'></div>不督不程。诱以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_117_1374915", 1374915, "Clauses/235/Comments/0")'>美语</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1374915_comment'></div>未二周星。创数万堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1374915_comment'></div>几半重楼。如诗翚羽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1374915_comment'></div>锢以长堤。缭四千步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1374915_comment'></div>明年水平。人始歌舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1374915_comment'></div>灾久事钜。一日除去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1374915_comment'></div>灌田万顷。益种桑苧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1374915_comment'></div>俗所未有。罔不完具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1374915_comment'></div>寂寥千年。谁守兹土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1374915_comment'></div>大中圣人。元和是师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1374915_comment'></div>图赞功劳。武阳岂遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1374915_comment'></div>乃命史臣。刻序碑辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1374915_comment'></div>宠假武阳。为人慰思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1374915_comment'></div>训劝守吏。勉于为治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1374915_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_131_1374915_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=849&endYear=849')">849年</a>　在长安，任尚书司勋员外郎、史馆修撰。杜牧与李商隐相识，李商隐有诗相赠。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=849&endYear=849')">849年</a>　在长安，任尚书司勋员外郎、史馆修撰。杜牧进撰故江西韦大夫遗爱碑文表。作品：《进撰故江西韦大夫遗爱碑文表》<div id='poem_1374844' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374844' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374844?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进撰故江西韦大夫遗爱碑文表</a><span class='authorDate'>（849年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374844")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374844_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374844'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374844'>右。臣奉某月日敕牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374844_comment'></div>令撰故江西观察使韦丹遗爱碑文。臣官卑人微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374844_comment'></div>素无文学。恩生望外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374844_comment'></div>事出非常。承命震惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374844_comment'></div>以荣为惧。伏以洪为州府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374844_comment'></div>逾于千年。言念疲羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374844_comment'></div>常患水火。风俗如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374844_comment'></div>改革无因。韦丹受朝廷分忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374844_comment'></div>为百姓去弊。不践旧迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374844_comment'></div>特建宏谋。凡三年苦心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374844_comment'></div>去千岁大患。兼之灌溉种莳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374844_comment'></div>丰其衣食。渤海颍川之治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374844_comment'></div>邵父杜母之恩。校之于丹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374844_comment'></div>未足为比。伏惟皇帝陛下陟降顺帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374844_comment'></div>施设如神。纳谏若转丸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374844_comment'></div>去恶如反掌。是以兵刑措寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374844_comment'></div>年谷丰登。而犹念切疲人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374844_comment'></div>及于循吏。缅韦丹已效之绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374844_comment'></div>慰江西去思之心。特与彰扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374844_comment'></div>创为碑记。是宜使内直学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374844_comment'></div>西掖辞臣。振发雄文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374844_comment'></div>流传后代。至于臣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374844_comment'></div>最为鄙陋。明命忽临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374844_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1374844", 1374844, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>牢让</span>无路。俯仰惭惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374844_comment'></div>神魂惊飞。臣不敢深引古文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374844_comment'></div>广徵朴学。但首叙元和中兴得人之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374844_comment'></div>次述韦丹在任为治之功。事必直书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374844_comment'></div>辞无华饰。所冀通衢一建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374844_comment'></div>百姓皆观。事事彰明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374844_comment'></div>人人晓会。但率诚朴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374844_comment'></div>不近文章。受曲被之恩私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374844_comment'></div>如生羽翼。报非次之拔擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374844_comment'></div>宜裂肝肠。无任感激恳悃血诚之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374844_comment'></div>其碑文本谨随状封进以闻。谨奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374844_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1374844_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=849&endYear=849')">849年</a>　在长安，任尚书司勋员外郎、史馆修撰。杜牧以所着《孙子注》献于宰相周墀。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=849&endYear=849')">849年5月</a>　五月，牛僧孺葬，杜牧作墓志铭。作品：《唐故太子少师奇章郡开国公赠太尉牛公墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此条活动具体月份不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1374919' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374919")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1374919_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1374919'>唐佐四帝十九年。宰相牛公讳某字某。八代祖宏。以德行儒学相隋氏。封奇章郡公。赠文安侯。文安后四世讳凤。及仕唐为中书门下侍郎。监修国史。于公为高祖。文安后五世集州剌史赠给事中讳休克。于公为曾祖。集州生太常博士赠太尉讳绍。太尉生华州郑县尉赠太保讳幼闻。太保生公。孤始七岁。长安南下杜樊乡东。文安有隋氏赐田数顷。书千卷尚存。公年十五。依以为学。不出一室。数年业就。名声入都中。故丞相韦公执谊以聪明气势。急于褒拔。如柳宗元刘禹锡辈。以文学秀才。皆在门下。韦公亟命柳刘于樊乡访公。曰愿得一相见。公乘驴至门。韦公曰是矣。东京李元礼为后进师。隋奇章公仁德禄位。二者包而有之。公登进士上第。元和四年应贤良直谏制。数强臣不奉法。忧天子炽于武功。诏下第一。授伊阙尉。以直被毁。周岁凡十府奏取不下。伊阙满岁。郤公士美以昭义军书记辟。凡三上请。诏除河南尉。拜监察御史。丁母夫人忧。制终复拜监察御史。转殿中侍御史。迁礼部员外郎都官员外郎兼侍御史知杂事。改考功员外郎集贤殿学士库部郎中知制诰。赐五品命服。半岁迁御史中丞。宿州剌史李直臣以赃数万败。穆宗得偏辞于中。称直臣冤。且言有才。宰相言格不用。公以具狱奏。上曰。直臣有才可惜。公曰。彼不才者。无饱食以足妻子。安足虑。本设法令。所以縳束有才者。禄山朱泚。是才过人而乱天下。上因可其奏曰善。赐章服金紫。迁户部侍郎。掌财赋事。上益亲重。欲相之。会中书令韩。宏男公武谋曰。大人守大梁二十年。齐蔡诛后始来朝。今不以财援中外。设有飞一辞者。谁与保曰。公武赍宏书。献公钱千万。公笑曰。此何名为。公亟持去。明年。宏公武继卒。主藏奴与吏讼于御史府。上怜宏大臣父子并死。稚孙将家事。走中使至第。尽取财簿自阅视。凡中外主权。多纳宏货。独朱勾细字曰。某年月日送户部牛侍郎钱千万不纳。上大喜。以指历簿。遍视旁侧曰。果然。吾不谬知人。言讫。殿上皆再拜呼万岁。寻以本官平章事。明年正位中书侍郎。加银青三品。兼集贤殿大学士。监修国史。敬宗即位。与武士畋宴无时。徵天下道士。言长生事。公亟谏曰。陛下不读元元皇帝五千言。以清静养生。彼道士皆庸人。徒誇欺虚荒。岂足师法。未一岁。请退不许。连四月日间以疾辞。乃以鄂岳六州建节。号武昌军。命公为礼部尚书平章事为节度使。公始至。问民疾苦。皆曰城土疏恶。岁输䉴竹为苫具。奸吏旁缘。主为侵取。费与税等。岁久。前后政欲画计策。讫无所施。公即除去冗长。用公私钱陶塼甃城。凡五年乃就。明年。文宗即位。就加吏部尚书。明年。急徵拜兵部尚书平章事。重拜中书侍郎宏文馆大学士。郑注怨宋丞相申锡。造言挟漳王为大逆。状迹牢密。上怒必杀。公曰。人臣不过宰相。今申锡已宰相。假使如所谋。岂复欲过宰相有他图乎。臣为中丞。爱申锡忠良。奏为御史。申锡之心。臣敢以死保之。上意解。由是宋不死。大和六年。西戎再遣大臣贽宝玉来朝。礼倍前时。尽罢东向守兵。用明臣附。李太尉德裕时殿剑南西川。上言维州降。今若使生羌三千人烧十三桥。捣戎腹心。可洗久耻。是韦皋二十年至死恨不能致。事下尚书省。百官聚议。皆如剑南奏。公独曰。西戎四面各万里。来责曰。何事失信。养马蔚茹川上平凉坂。万骑缀回中。怒气直辞。不三日至咸阳桥。西南远数千里。虽百维州。此时安可用。弃诚信有利无害。匹夫不忍为。况天子以诚信见责于夷狄。且有大患。上曰然。遂罢维州议。大和六年检校右仆射平章事淮南节度使。经六年至开成二年。连上章请休官。诏益不许。公曰。臣惟退罢。可以行志。夏五月。以兵付监军使。拜疏讫就道。除检校司空留守东都。明年拜左仆射。上恐公不起。诏曰。朕比有疾良已。思一面叙。公不得已至阙下一拜谢。闭门不出。明年检校司空平章事襄州节度使。出都门。赐黄彝樽龙杓凡六品。名出周礼。诏曰。精金古器。用以比况君子。非无意也。襄州七年饶假军人。入赋不一。公至。据地造籍。免贫弱四千万。均入豪强。皆曰甘心。不出一怨言。明年。武宗即位。就加司徒。会昌元年秋七月。汉水溢堤入郭。自汉阳王张柬之一百五十岁后。水为最大。李太尉德裕挟维州事。曰修利不至。罢为太子少师。未几检校司徒兼太子少保。明年以检校官兼太子太傅留守东都。刘祯以上党叛诛死。时李太尉专柄五年。多逐贤士。天下恨怨。以公德全畏之。言于武宗曰。上党轧左京。控山东。刘从谏父死。擅之十年。后来朝加宰相。纵去不留之。致祯叛。竭天下力乃能取。此皆公与李公宗闵为宰相时事。从谏以太和六年十二月十七日拜阙下。实以其月十九日节度淮南。明年正月。从谏以宰相东迁。河南少尹吕述。公恶其为人。述与李太尉书。言祯破报至。公出声叹恨。上见述书。复闻前纵从谏去。謺二怒不一参校。自十月至十二月。公凡三贬至循州员外长史。天下人为公挼手咤骂。公走万里瘴海上二年。恬泰若无一事。今天子即位。移衡州汝州长史。迁太子少保少师。凡四年复位。大中二年十月二十七日。薨于东都城南别墅。年六十九。天子恫伤。不朝两日。册赠太尉。天下善人。执手相吊哭。公忠厚仁恕。庄重敬慎。未尝以此八者自勉。而终身益笃。为宰相急于铨品。凡名清官。不忍持一资以假非其人。以道德谟于天子。每指古义为据。有言机利克迫。必鈲⿰(名刂)使之摧破。三大邦去苛碎条约。除大患。其轻巧吏欲贼公爱恶希向。所为浑然。终不能见。故所至必大治。衣冠单穷。出俸钱嫁其子女。月与食。岁与衣。资送其死丧。凡数百家。李太尉志必杀公。后南谪过汝州。公厚供具。哀其穷。为解说海上与中州少异。以勉安之。不出一言及于前事。镇武昌时。军容使仇士良为监军使。公律以礼敬。暑甚。大合军宴。拱手至暮。一不摇扇。益自俭克。平居非公事不出内屏。周三岁。语言举止。率有常度。仇军容开成末首议立武宗。权力震天下。每言至公。必合手加颡曰。清德可服人。但过吝官财。与人无一毫恩分耳。不肯引誉。不敢怨毁。淡居其中。公始自河南荐乡贡士为郎官。考吏部科目选。三开幕府中丞宰相外。凡取六十馀人。上至宰相。次布台阁。皆当时名士。每暇日宴语寮吏。必言古人脩身行事。旁诱曲指。微警教之。不以己所长人所不及裁量高下。以生重轻。后进归之。承望声光。得一言许可。必自矜重。夫人辛氏。以公封张掖郡。赠仆射秘之长女。士林称为妇师。凡三十年。前公八年殁。五男六女。长曰蔚。监察御史。次曰丛。浙南府协律郎。皆以文行登进士第。不藉公势。次曰奉倩。河南府洛阳尉。二人皆雅齿。长女嫁户部郎中上党苗愔。次女嫁河中节度副使检校郎中范阳张洙。次女嫁河南府户曹集贤校理常山张希复。次女嫁前进士邓叔。次女未笄。一人始数岁。以某年月日葬少陵南某乡某里。铭曰。</div><div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=849&endYear=849')">849年8月</a>　八月，河陇收复后，老幼千余人来长安，脱胡服，易汉服，宣宗登延喜门楼见之，皆舞蹈呼万岁。杜牧亲睹其盛，作诗歌颂。作品：《今皇帝陛下一诏征兵，不日功集，河湟诸郡次第归降，臣获睹圣功，辄献歌咏》<div id='poem_32131' id='poem_sentence_4_32193_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=849&endYear=849')">849年</a>　在长安，任尚书司勋员外郎、史馆修撰。杜牧送友人唐持赴容州任职，有诗一首。作品：《送容州中丞赴镇》<div id='poem_32232' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32232' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/32232?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送容州唐中丞赴镇<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（849年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32232")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_32232_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_32232_0'>① （一作送容州中丞赴镇）。（一作张泌诗）</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_32232'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3084, "poem_allusion_32232")'>马将军</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_32232_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32232'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32232'>交阯同星座，龙泉佩<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作似）</span>斗文。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32232_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32232'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_32232", 32232, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>烧香</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_32232", 32232, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>翠羽帐</span>，看舞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_32232", 32232, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>郁金裙</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32232_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32232'>鹢首冲泷浪，犀渠拂岭云。<div id='poem_sentence_2_32232_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_32232'>莫教铜柱北，空<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作祗）</span>说<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3084, "poem_sentence_3_32232")'>马将军</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_32232_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_32232'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_32232_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=849&endYear=849')">849年</a>　在长安，任尚书司勋员外郎、史馆修撰。杜牧有诗赠友人夏州崔常侍。作品：《夏州崔常侍自少常亚列出领麾幢十韵》<div id='poem_32324' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32324' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/32324?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夏州崔常侍自少常亚列出领麾幢十韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（849年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32324")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_32324_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_32324'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(429, "poem_allusion_32324")'>登坛</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1301, "poem_allusion_32324")'>作长城</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1489, "poem_allusion_32324")'>陈汤事</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8740, "poem_allusion_32324")'>魏绛</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_32324_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32324'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32324'>帝命诗书将，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(429, "poem_sentence_0_32324")'>登坛</span>礼乐卿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32324_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32324'>三边要高枕，万里得长城。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32324_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32324'>对客犹褒博，填门已旆旌。<div id='poem_sentence_2_32324_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_32324'>腰间五绶贵，天下一家荣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_32324_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_32324'>野水差<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_32324", 32324, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>新燕</span>，芳郊哢夏莺。<div id='poem_sentence_4_32324_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_32324'>别风嘶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_32324", 32324, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>玉勒</span>，残日望金茎。<div id='poem_sentence_5_32324_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_32324'>榆塞孤烟媚，银川绿草明。<div id='poem_sentence_6_32324_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_32324'>戈矛虓虎士，弓箭落雕兵。<div id='poem_sentence_7_32324_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_32324'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8740, "poem_sentence_8_32324")'>魏绛</span>言堪采，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1489, "poem_sentence_8_32324")'>陈汤事</span>偶成。<div id='poem_sentence_8_32324_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_32324'>若须垂竹帛，静胜是功名。<div id='poem_sentence_9_32324_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_32324'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_32324_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=849&endYear=849')">849年</a>　在长安，任尚书司勋员外郎、史馆修撰。杜牧奉诏撰故江西观察使韦丹神道碑。作品：《唐故江西观察使武阳公韦公神道碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（疑与《唐故江西观察使武阳公韦公遗爱碑》为同篇文章，题目记载不同。）</span><div id='poem_1374915' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374915' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374915?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故江西观察使武阳公韦公遗爱碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（849年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374915")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374915_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374915'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374915'>皇帝召丞相延英便殿讲议政事。及于循吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374915_comment'></div>且称元和中兴之盛。言理人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374915_comment'></div>谁居第一。丞相墀言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374915_comment'></div>臣尝守土江西。目睹观察使韦丹有大功德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374915_comment'></div>被于八州。殁四十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374915_comment'></div>稚老歌思。如丹尚存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374915_comment'></div>丞相敏中丞相植皆曰。臣知丹之为理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374915_comment'></div>所至人爱。所去人思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374915_comment'></div>江西之政。熟于听闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374915_comment'></div>乃命守臣覈于众。上丹之功状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374915_comment'></div>大中三年正月二十日。诏书授史臣尚书司勋员外郎杜牧曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374915_comment'></div>汝为丹序而铭之。以美大其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374915_comment'></div>臣某伏念天宝建中艰难之馀。根于河北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374915_comment'></div>枝蔓于齐鲁梁蔡。辟为章句书生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374915_comment'></div>以蜀叛。锜为宗室老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374915_comment'></div>以吴叛。其他高下其目跂而欲飞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374915_comment'></div>往往皆是。宪宗皇帝高听古议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374915_comment'></div>广谏益圣。任贤使能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374915_comment'></div>考校法度。号令未出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374915_comment'></div>威先雷霆。十有四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374915_comment'></div>擒殛凶狠。方行四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374915_comment'></div>罔不率伏。当是时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374915_comment'></div>凡五徵兵。解而复合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374915_comment'></div>仅八周岁。天下晏然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374915_comment'></div>不告劳苦。实以守土多循良吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374915_comment'></div>而丹居第一。周召伯治人于陜西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374915_comment'></div>召穆公有武功于宣王时。仲尼采甘棠江汉之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374915_comment'></div>弦而歌之。列于风雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374915_comment'></div>班固叙汉宣帝中兴名臣。言治人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374915_comment'></div>亦首述黄霸龚遂。次将相下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374915_comment'></div>今下明诏。刻丹治效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374915_comment'></div>令得与元和功臣。彰中兴得人之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374915_comment'></div>悬于无穷。用古道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374915_comment'></div>谨按韦氏。自汉丞相贤已降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374915_comment'></div>代有达官。孝宽有大功于后周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374915_comment'></div>封郧国公。郧公曾孙幼平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374915_comment'></div>为岐州参军。生抱贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374915_comment'></div>为梓州刺史。生政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374915_comment'></div>为汉州雒县丞。赠右谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374915_comment'></div>雒县生武阳公。公字文明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374915_comment'></div>以明五经登科。授校书郎咸阳尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374915_comment'></div>以监察御史殿中侍御史佐张献甫于邠宁府。徵为太子舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374915_comment'></div>迁起居郎检校吏部员外郎侍御史河阳行军司马。未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374915_comment'></div>改驾部员外郎。会新罗国以丧来告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374915_comment'></div>且请立君。拜司封郎中兼御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374915_comment'></div>章服金紫。吊册其嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374915_comment'></div>新罗再以丧告。不果行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374915_comment'></div>改容州经略使。筑州城环十三里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374915_comment'></div>因悉城管内十三州。教种茶麦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374915_comment'></div>多开屯田。黄贼畏服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374915_comment'></div>诏加大中大夫。贞元末拜河南少尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374915_comment'></div>连拜检校秘书监兼御史中丞郑滑行军司马。皆未至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374915_comment'></div>拜右谏议大夫。宪宗即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374915_comment'></div>刘辟以蜀叛。议者欲行贞元故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374915_comment'></div>请释不诛。公再上疏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374915_comment'></div>今不诛辟。则朝廷可以指臂而使者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374915_comment'></div>惟两京耳。此外而谁不为叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374915_comment'></div>因拜剑南东川节度使兼御史大夫。时刘辟急攻梓州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374915_comment'></div>公至汉中。表言攻急守坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374915_comment'></div>不可易帅。高崇文客军远斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374915_comment'></div>无所资。若与梓州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374915_comment'></div>缀其士心。必能有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374915_comment'></div>遂召拜晋慈隰三州观察使。不半岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374915_comment'></div>元和二年二月拜洪州观察使。洪据章江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374915_comment'></div>上控百越。为一都会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374915_comment'></div>屋居以茅竹为俗。人火之馀烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374915_comment'></div>日久风竹戛自焚。小至百家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374915_comment'></div>大至荡空。霖必江溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374915_comment'></div>燥必火作。火水夹攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374915_comment'></div>人无固志。倾摇懈怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374915_comment'></div>不为旬月生产计。公始至任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374915_comment'></div>计口取俸。除去冗事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374915_comment'></div>取公私钱。教人陶瓦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374915_comment'></div>伐山取材。堆謺亿计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374915_comment'></div>人能为屋。取官材瓦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374915_comment'></div>免其半赋。徐责其直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374915_comment'></div>自载酒食。以勉其劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374915_comment'></div>初若艰勤。日成月就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374915_comment'></div>不二周岁。凡为瓦屋万四千间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374915_comment'></div>楼四千二百间。县市营厩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374915_comment'></div>名为栋宇。无不创为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374915_comment'></div>派湖入江。节以斗门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374915_comment'></div>以走暴涨。辟开广衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374915_comment'></div>南北七里。荡渫污壅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374915_comment'></div>筑堤五尺。长十二里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374915_comment'></div>堤成明年。江与堤平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374915_comment'></div>凿六百陂塘。灌田一万顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374915_comment'></div>益劝桑苧。机织广狭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374915_comment'></div>俗所未习。教劝成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374915_comment'></div>凡三周年。成就生遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374915_comment'></div>手为目睹。无不如志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374915_comment'></div>公之为政。去害兴利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374915_comment'></div>机决势去。如孙吴乘敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374915_comment'></div>不可当向。辅以经术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374915_comment'></div>仁抚智诱。慈母之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374915_comment'></div>赤子之欲。求必得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374915_comment'></div>故人自尽力。所指必就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374915_comment'></div>子产治郑。未及三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374915_comment'></div>国人尚谤。黄霸治颍川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1374915_comment'></div>前后八年。始曰愈治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1374915_comment'></div>考二古人行事。与公相次第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1374915_comment'></div>不知如何。元和五年薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1374915_comment'></div>年五十八。其铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1374915_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_103_1374915'>章武皇帝。披攘经营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1374915_comment'></div>凡十四年。五大徵兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1374915_comment'></div>人不告病。肩于太宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1374915_comment'></div>将相是矣。岂无循良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1374915_comment'></div>考第理行。谁高武阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1374915_comment'></div>武阳所至。为人父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1374915_comment'></div>于洪之功。洞无前古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1374915_comment'></div>洪始有居。水火是苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1374915_comment'></div>二者夹攻。死无处所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1374915_comment'></div>曰天所然。不嗟不诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1374915_comment'></div>武阳始至。材瓦是聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1374915_comment'></div>公钱不足。以俸为助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1374915_comment'></div>能为居宇。贳贷付与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1374915_comment'></div>日载酒肴。如抚稚乳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1374915_comment'></div>不督不程。诱以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_117_1374915", 1374915, "Clauses/235/Comments/0")'>美语</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1374915_comment'></div>未二周星。创数万堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1374915_comment'></div>几半重楼。如诗翚羽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1374915_comment'></div>锢以长堤。缭四千步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1374915_comment'></div>明年水平。人始歌舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1374915_comment'></div>灾久事钜。一日除去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1374915_comment'></div>灌田万顷。益种桑苧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1374915_comment'></div>俗所未有。罔不完具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1374915_comment'></div>寂寥千年。谁守兹土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1374915_comment'></div>大中圣人。元和是师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1374915_comment'></div>图赞功劳。武阳岂遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1374915_comment'></div>乃命史臣。刻序碑辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1374915_comment'></div>宠假武阳。为人慰思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1374915_comment'></div>训劝守吏。勉于为治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1374915_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_131_1374915_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=849&endYear=849')">849年</a>　在长安，任尚书司勋员外郎、史馆修撰。杜牧上书周墀。作品：《上周相公书》<div id='poem_1374877' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374877' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374877?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上周相公书</a><span class='authorDate'>（849年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374877")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374877_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374877'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374877'>某再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374877_comment'></div>伏以大儒在位而未有不知兵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374877_comment'></div>未有不能制兵而能止暴乱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374877_comment'></div>未有暴乱不止而能活生人定国家者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374877_comment'></div>自生人已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374877_comment'></div>可以屈指而数也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374877_comment'></div>今兵之下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374877_comment'></div>莫若刺伐之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374877_comment'></div>诗大雅维清奏象舞之篇曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374877_comment'></div>维清缉熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374877_comment'></div>文王之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374877_comment'></div>迄用有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374877_comment'></div>维周之祯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374877_comment'></div>象者象武王伐纣刺伐之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374877_comment'></div>此乃文王受命<span class='inlineComment2'>（受殷王专征之命也）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374877_comment'></div>七年五伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374877_comment'></div>留战阵刺伐之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374877_comment'></div>遗之武王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374877_comment'></div>武王用以伐纣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374877_comment'></div>而有天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374877_comment'></div>致之清平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374877_comment'></div>为周家之祯祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374877_comment'></div>周公居摄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374877_comment'></div>祀文武于清庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374877_comment'></div>作此诗以歌舞文武之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374877_comment'></div>其次兵之尤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374877_comment'></div>莫若钩援冲壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374877_comment'></div>今之一卒之长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374877_comment'></div>不肯亲自为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374877_comment'></div>诗大雅周公皇矣美周之诗曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374877_comment'></div>以尔钩援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374877_comment'></div>与尔临冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374877_comment'></div>以伐崇墉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374877_comment'></div>临冲闲闲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374877_comment'></div>崇墉言言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374877_comment'></div>此实文王伐崇墉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374877_comment'></div>傅于其城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374877_comment'></div>以临车冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374877_comment'></div>钩援其城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374877_comment'></div>文王亲自为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374877_comment'></div>夫文王何人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374877_comment'></div>周公诗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374877_comment'></div>夫子删而取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374877_comment'></div>列于大雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374877_comment'></div>以美武王之功德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374877_comment'></div>手弦而口歌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374877_comment'></div>不知后代之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374877_comment'></div>何如此三圣人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374877_comment'></div>安有谋人之国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374877_comment'></div>有暴乱横起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374877_comment'></div>戎狄乘其边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374877_comment'></div>坐于庙堂之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374877_comment'></div>曰我儒者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374877_comment'></div>不能知兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374877_comment'></div>不知儒者竟不可知兵乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374877_comment'></div>竟可知兵乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374877_comment'></div>长庆兵起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374877_comment'></div>自始至终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374877_comment'></div>庙堂之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374877_comment'></div>指踪非其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374877_comment'></div>不可一二悉数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374877_comment'></div>高宗朝薛仁贵攻吐蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374877_comment'></div>大败于大非川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374877_comment'></div>仁贵曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374877_comment'></div>今年岁在庚午。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374877_comment'></div>不当有事于西方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374877_comment'></div>此乃钟邓伐蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374877_comment'></div>身诛不返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374877_comment'></div>昨者诛讨党羌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374877_comment'></div>徵关东兵用于西方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374877_comment'></div>是不知天道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374877_comment'></div>边地无积粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374877_comment'></div>师无见粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374877_comment'></div>不先屯田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374877_comment'></div>随日随饷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374877_comment'></div>是不知地利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374877_comment'></div>两汉伐虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374877_comment'></div>骑兵取于山东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374877_comment'></div>所谓冀之北土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374877_comment'></div>马之所生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374877_comment'></div>马良而多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374877_comment'></div>人习骑战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374877_comment'></div>非山东兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374877_comment'></div>不能伐虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374877_comment'></div>昨者以步骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374877_comment'></div>百不当一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374877_comment'></div>是不知人事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374877_comment'></div>天时地利人事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374877_comment'></div>此三者皆不先计量短长得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374877_comment'></div>故困竭天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374877_comment'></div>不能灭朴𣙙之虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374877_comment'></div>此乃不学之过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374877_comment'></div>不教人战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374877_comment'></div>是谓弃之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374877_comment'></div>则谋人之国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374877_comment'></div>不能料敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374877_comment'></div>不曰弃国可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374877_comment'></div>某所注孙武十三篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374877_comment'></div>虽不能上穷天时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1374877_comment'></div>下极人事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1374877_comment'></div>然上至周秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1374877_comment'></div>下至长庆宝历之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1374877_comment'></div>形势虚实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1374877_comment'></div>随句解析。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1374877_comment'></div>离为三编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1374877_comment'></div>辄敢献上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1374877_comment'></div>以备阅览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1374877_comment'></div>少希鉴悉苦心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1374877_comment'></div>即为至幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1374877_comment'></div>伏增惶惕之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1374877_comment'></div>某顿首再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_110_1374877_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=849&endYear=849')">849年闰11月</a>　闰十一月，因京官俸薄，不如刺史俸禄之厚，不能赡养病弟及孀妹，杜牧上书于宰相求杭州刺史。作品：《上宰相求杭州启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此时为相者乃白敏中、崔铉、魏扶。）</span><div id='poem_1374894' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374894' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374894?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上宰相求杭州启</a><span class='authorDate'>（849年闰11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374894")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374894_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374894'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374894'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374894_comment'></div>某于京中惟安仁旧第三十间支屋而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374894_comment'></div>长兄慥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374894_comment'></div>罢三原县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374894_comment'></div>閒居京城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374894_comment'></div>弟顗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374894_comment'></div>一举进士及第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374894_comment'></div>有文章时名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374894_comment'></div>不幸得痼疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374894_comment'></div>坐废十三年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374894_comment'></div>今与李氏孀妹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374894_comment'></div>寓居淮南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374894_comment'></div>并仰某微官以为糇命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374894_comment'></div>某前任刺史七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374894_comment'></div>给弟妹衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374894_comment'></div>有馀兼及长兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374894_comment'></div>亦救不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374894_comment'></div>是某一身作刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374894_comment'></div>一家骨肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374894_comment'></div>四处安活。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374894_comment'></div>自去年八月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374894_comment'></div>特蒙奖擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374894_comment'></div>授以名曹郎官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374894_comment'></div>史氏重职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374894_comment'></div>七年弃逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374894_comment'></div>再复官荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374894_comment'></div>归还故里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374894_comment'></div>重见亲戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374894_comment'></div>言于鄙微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374894_comment'></div>已满素志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374894_comment'></div>自去年十二月至京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374894_comment'></div>以旧第无屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374894_comment'></div>与长兄异居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374894_comment'></div>今秋已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374894_comment'></div>弟妹频以寒馁来告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374894_comment'></div>某一院家累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374894_comment'></div>亦四十口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374894_comment'></div>狗为朱马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374894_comment'></div>缊作由袍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374894_comment'></div>其于妻儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374894_comment'></div>固宜穷饿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374894_comment'></div>是作刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374894_comment'></div>则一家骨肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374894_comment'></div>四处皆泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374894_comment'></div>为京官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374894_comment'></div>则一家骨肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374894_comment'></div>四处皆困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374894_comment'></div>谋于知友曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374894_comment'></div>杭州大郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374894_comment'></div>今月满可求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374894_comment'></div>欲干告吾相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374894_comment'></div>以活家命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374894_comment'></div>以为如何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374894_comment'></div>皆曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374894_comment'></div>子七年三郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374894_comment'></div>今始归复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374894_comment'></div>相国知子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374894_comment'></div>必欲以次第叙用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374894_comment'></div>子今复求刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374894_comment'></div>得不生相国疑怪乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374894_comment'></div>某答曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374894_comment'></div>是何言与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374894_comment'></div>某唯恃吾相之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374894_comment'></div>始敢干求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374894_comment'></div>今天下以江淮为国命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374894_comment'></div>杭州户十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374894_comment'></div>税钱五十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374894_comment'></div>刺史之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374894_comment'></div>可以杀生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374894_comment'></div>而有厚禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374894_comment'></div>朝廷多用名曹正郎有名望而老于为政者而为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374894_comment'></div>某官为外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374894_comment'></div>是官位未至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374894_comment'></div>前三任刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374894_comment'></div>无异政闻于吾相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374894_comment'></div>是为政无所取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374894_comment'></div>今若得遂所求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374894_comment'></div>非唯超显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374894_comment'></div>兼活家私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374894_comment'></div>某若不恃吾相之知而求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374894_comment'></div>是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1374894", 1374894, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>狂躁</span>妄庸人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374894_comment'></div>坠井者求出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374894_comment'></div>执热者愿濯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374894_comment'></div>古人以此二者譬喻所切也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374894_comment'></div>某今所切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374894_comment'></div>是坠于绝壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374894_comment'></div>而衣挂于树杪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374894_comment'></div>覆在鼎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374894_comment'></div>下有热火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374894_comment'></div>而水将沸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374894_comment'></div>与古所喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374894_comment'></div>则复过之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374894_comment'></div>辄敢具疏血诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374894_comment'></div>上干尊重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374894_comment'></div>冀垂恩怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374894_comment'></div>或赐援拯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374894_comment'></div>慺慺丹恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374894_comment'></div>不胜惶惧恳悃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374894_comment'></div>谨启。</div><div id='poem_sentence_98_1374894_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=849&endYear=849')">849年</a>　在长安，任尚书司勋员外郎、史馆修撰。杜牧作文一篇。作品：《为中书门下请追尊号表》《谢许受江西送彩绢等状》<div id='poem_1374845' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374845' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374845?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为中书门下请追尊号表</a><span class='authorDate'>（849年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374845")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374845_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374845'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374845'>臣某等言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374845_comment'></div>伏以收复河湟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374845_comment'></div>廓开土宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374845_comment'></div>北绝梓岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374845_comment'></div>西过榆溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374845_comment'></div>壮中夏起塞之雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374845_comment'></div>夺西戎理弓之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374845_comment'></div>至使强虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374845_comment'></div>不敢触锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374845_comment'></div>山锁七关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374845_comment'></div>地辟千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374845_comment'></div>歌狸首而息射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374845_comment'></div>咏杕杜以劳旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374845_comment'></div>圣德神功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374845_comment'></div>超今越古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374845_comment'></div>某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374845_comment'></div>臣某等于延英殿面奉德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374845_comment'></div>陛下以尅定旧疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374845_comment'></div>获承先志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374845_comment'></div>归功祖考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374845_comment'></div>追尊鸿名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374845_comment'></div>臣等伏念国家之为治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374845_comment'></div>溢三皇之轨躅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374845_comment'></div>奋百代之上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374845_comment'></div>天宝之末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374845_comment'></div>天下泰宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374845_comment'></div>恃富庶而醉饱无虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374845_comment'></div>韬干戈而凶逆潜作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374845_comment'></div>大历贞元之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374845_comment'></div>河北河南之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374845_comment'></div>朝廷行姑息之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374845_comment'></div>郡国皆叛乱之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374845_comment'></div>苟且之令行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374845_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1374845", 1374845, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>画一之法</span>废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374845_comment'></div>月增日长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374845_comment'></div>雄唱雌和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374845_comment'></div>李锜宗子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374845_comment'></div>刘辟书生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374845_comment'></div>东据石头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374845_comment'></div>西断剑阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374845_comment'></div>朝廷所有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374845_comment'></div>唯止两京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374845_comment'></div>伏惟宪宗皇帝顺上帝之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374845_comment'></div>酌列圣之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374845_comment'></div>爵不踰等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374845_comment'></div>举不失贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374845_comment'></div>亲庄正之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374845_comment'></div>去侧媚之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374845_comment'></div>然后提挈纲纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374845_comment'></div>震謺雷霆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374845_comment'></div>诛夷群凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374845_comment'></div>洒扫四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374845_comment'></div>百度如律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374845_comment'></div>九功可歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374845_comment'></div>天业益张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374845_comment'></div>圣统无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374845_comment'></div>诗曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374845_comment'></div>惠我无疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374845_comment'></div>子孙保之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374845_comment'></div>复曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374845_comment'></div>周虽旧邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374845_comment'></div>其命维新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374845_comment'></div>伏惟元和之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374845_comment'></div>实开中兴之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374845_comment'></div>伏惟圣敬文思和武光孝皇帝陛下修先王之大道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374845_comment'></div>行天下之达德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374845_comment'></div>广问延谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374845_comment'></div>褒直尽下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374845_comment'></div>首雪冤狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374845_comment'></div>常对法官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374845_comment'></div>是则虞舜恤刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374845_comment'></div>文王慎罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374845_comment'></div>无以过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374845_comment'></div>开张聪明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374845_comment'></div>延纳谏诤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374845_comment'></div>守职业者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374845_comment'></div>无职不举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374845_comment'></div>被言责者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374845_comment'></div>无事不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374845_comment'></div>皆获甄升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374845_comment'></div>岂唯假借。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374845_comment'></div>夫仲尼以三人有我师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374845_comment'></div>大禹以愚夫能胜予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374845_comment'></div>是仲尼之好问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374845_comment'></div>大禹之拜言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374845_comment'></div>无以过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374845_comment'></div>是以百姓手足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374845_comment'></div>皆安于措置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374845_comment'></div>四海风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374845_comment'></div>益臻于平和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374845_comment'></div>尚犹午夜观书。<div id='poem_sentence_92_1374845_comment'></div>上求天瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374845_comment'></div>帝典曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374845_comment'></div>圣敬日跻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374845_comment'></div>汤铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374845_comment'></div>日日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374845_comment'></div>是陛下之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1374845_comment'></div>有以过之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1374845_comment'></div>仲尼曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1374845_comment'></div>禹立三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1374845_comment'></div>百姓以仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1374845_comment'></div>仰陛下之至理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1374845_comment'></div>知孔圣之可验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1374845_comment'></div>夫西戎强盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1374845_comment'></div>自古无之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1374845_comment'></div>包有引弓之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1374845_comment'></div>尽为跨马之国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1374845_comment'></div>天下献力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1374845_comment'></div>备边不充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1374845_comment'></div>四海输赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1374845_comment'></div>养兵不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1374845_comment'></div>广川荐草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1374845_comment'></div>尽为所有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1374845_comment'></div>健兵倅马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1374845_comment'></div>大业无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1374845_comment'></div>为而不有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1374845_comment'></div>归功先帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1374845_comment'></div>礼曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1374845_comment'></div>天子有善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1374845_comment'></div>能光祖考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1374845_comment'></div>今者陛下谦让之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1374845_comment'></div>符于礼经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1374845_comment'></div>继述之孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1374845_comment'></div>称于孔圣。<div id='poem_sentence_176_1374845_comment'></div>谨具太常追尊顺宗皇帝宪宗皇帝谥号如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1374845_comment'></div>伏听敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_178_1374845_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1374855' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374855' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374855?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢许受江西送撰韦丹碑䌽绢等状</a><span class='authorDate'>（849年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374855")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374855_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374855'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374855'>右。今月十八日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374855_comment'></div>中使某至。奉宣圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374855_comment'></div>令臣领江西观察使纥干众所寄撰韦丹遗爱碑文人事䌽绢三百疋者。恩随幸至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374855_comment'></div>荣与利并。抃跃惭惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374855_comment'></div>罔知所措。伏惟皇帝陛下皇天纵圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374855_comment'></div>赫日资明。大奖功劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374855_comment'></div>不计存没。举韦丹江西之绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374855_comment'></div>特令微臣撰碑。堕泪之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374855_comment'></div>岂惭羊祜。黄绢之妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374855_comment'></div>实愧蔡邕。今者更蒙恩私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374855_comment'></div>广受丝帛。捧戴兢惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374855_comment'></div>无地容身。不胜感恩惭悚之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_32123_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=850&endYear=850')">850年</a>　夏，杜牧上宰相启求知湖州。作品：《上宰相求湖州第一启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此时为相者乃白敏中、崔铉、崔龟从。）</span><div id='poem_1374891' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374891' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374891?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上宰相求湖州第一启</a><span class='authorDate'>（850年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374891")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374891_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374891'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374891'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374891_comment'></div>人有爱某者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374891_comment'></div>言于某曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374891_comment'></div>吏部员外郎例不为郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374891_comment'></div>子不可求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374891_comment'></div>假使已求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374891_comment'></div>慎勿坚恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374891_comment'></div>至于再三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374891_comment'></div>答曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374891_comment'></div>某虽不学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374891_comment'></div>按六典令式及诸故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374891_comment'></div>多无此例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374891_comment'></div>国史复无贤相名卿悬之以为格言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374891_comment'></div>此乃急于趋进之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374891_comment'></div>自为其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374891_comment'></div>若以例言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374891_comment'></div>贞元初故相国卢公迈由吏部员外郎出为滁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374891_comment'></div>近者澶王傅李凝为盐铁使江淮留后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374891_comment'></div>岂曰无例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374891_comment'></div>人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374891_comment'></div>卢事太远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374891_comment'></div>李为擢用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374891_comment'></div>此不足徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374891_comment'></div>某曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374891_comment'></div>不知今者视之古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374891_comment'></div>事在书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374891_comment'></div>取为今證。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374891_comment'></div>远自三代两汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374891_comment'></div>近至隋氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374891_comment'></div>国初尚可援引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374891_comment'></div>况前十五年名相故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374891_comment'></div>反不足为例乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374891_comment'></div>况卢公迈止以骨肉寒饿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374891_comment'></div>来守滁阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374891_comment'></div>非如某以亲弟废痼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374891_comment'></div>寒饿仍之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374891_comment'></div>是卢公有一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374891_comment'></div>某有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374891_comment'></div>与卢公所切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374891_comment'></div>复为不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374891_comment'></div>仲尼曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374891_comment'></div>雍也可使南面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374891_comment'></div>今刺史古之南面诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374891_comment'></div>行天子教化刑罚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374891_comment'></div>江淮盐铁留后求利小臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374891_comment'></div>校量重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374891_comment'></div>与刺史相悬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374891_comment'></div>求利小臣乃可吏部员外郎为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374891_comment'></div>十万户州天下根本之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374891_comment'></div>曰吏部员外郎不可为其刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374891_comment'></div>即是本末重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374891_comment'></div>颠倒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1374891", 1374891, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>乖戾</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374891_comment'></div>莫过于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374891_comment'></div>某弟顗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374891_comment'></div>世冑子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374891_comment'></div>二十一举进士及第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374891_comment'></div>尝为上裴相公书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374891_comment'></div>遒壮温润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374891_comment'></div>词理杰逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374891_comment'></div>贾生司马迁能为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374891_comment'></div>非班固刘向辈亹亹之词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374891_comment'></div>流于后辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374891_comment'></div>人皆藏之。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1374891_comment'></div>假使已求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374891_comment'></div>慎勿坚恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374891_comment'></div>至于再三。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1374891_comment'></div>按六典令式及诸故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374891_comment'></div>多无此例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374891_comment'></div>国史复无贤相名卿悬之以为格言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374891_comment'></div>此乃急于趋进之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374891_comment'></div>自为其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374891_comment'></div>若以例言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374891_comment'></div>贞元初故相国卢公迈由吏部员外郎出为滁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374891_comment'></div>近者澶王傅李凝为盐铁使江淮留后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374891_comment'></div>岂曰无例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374891_comment'></div>人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374891_comment'></div>卢事太远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374891_comment'></div>李为擢用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374891_comment'></div>此不足徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374891_comment'></div>某曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374891_comment'></div>不知今者视之古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374891_comment'></div>事在书。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1374891_comment'></div>近至隋氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374891_comment'></div>国初尚可援引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374891_comment'></div>况前十五年名相故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374891_comment'></div>反不足为例乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374891_comment'></div>况卢公迈止以骨肉寒饿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374891_comment'></div>来守滁阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374891_comment'></div>非如某以亲弟废痼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374891_comment'></div>寒饿仍之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374891_comment'></div>是卢公有一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374891_comment'></div>某有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374891_comment'></div>行天子教化刑罚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374891_comment'></div>江淮盐铁留后求利小臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374891_comment'></div>校量重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374891_comment'></div>与刺史相悬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374891_comment'></div>求利小臣乃可吏部员外郎为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374891_comment'></div>十万户州天下根本之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374891_comment'></div>曰吏部员外郎不可为其刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374891_comment'></div>即是本末重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374891_comment'></div>颠倒<span
