id='poem_sentence_42_1374891_comment'></div>行天子教化刑罚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374891_comment'></div>江淮盐铁留后求利小臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374891_comment'></div>校量重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374891_comment'></div>与刺史相悬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374891_comment'></div>求利小臣乃可吏部员外郎为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374891_comment'></div>十万户州天下根本之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374891_comment'></div>曰吏部员外郎不可为其刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374891_comment'></div>即是本末重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374891_comment'></div>颠倒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1374891", 1374891, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>乖戾</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374891_comment'></div>莫过于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374891_comment'></div>某弟顗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374891_comment'></div>世冑子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374891_comment'></div>二十一举进士及第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374891_comment'></div>尝为上裴相公书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374891_comment'></div>遒壮温润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374891_comment'></div>词理杰逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374891_comment'></div>贾生司马迁能为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374891_comment'></div>非班固刘向辈亹亹之词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374891_comment'></div>流于后辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374891_comment'></div>人皆藏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374891_comment'></div>朱崖李太尉迫以世旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374891_comment'></div>取为浙西团练使巡官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374891_comment'></div>李太尉贵骄多过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374891_comment'></div>凡有毫发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374891_comment'></div>顗必疏而言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374891_comment'></div>后谪袁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374891_comment'></div>于仓黄中言于亲曹官居实曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374891_comment'></div>如杜巡官爱我之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374891_comment'></div>若门下人尽能出之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374891_comment'></div>吾无今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374891_comment'></div>李太尉在袁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374891_comment'></div>顗客居淮南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374891_comment'></div>牛公欲辟为吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374891_comment'></div>顗谢曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374891_comment'></div>荀爽为李膺御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374891_comment'></div>以此显名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374891_comment'></div>今受命为幕府下执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374891_comment'></div>御李膺矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374891_comment'></div>然李公困谪远地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374891_comment'></div>未愿仕宦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374891_comment'></div>牛公叹美之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374891_comment'></div>聪明俊杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374891_comment'></div>非寻常人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374891_comment'></div>某自省事以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374891_comment'></div>未闻有后进名士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374891_comment'></div>丧明废弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374891_comment'></div>穷居海上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374891_comment'></div>如顗比者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374891_comment'></div>今有一兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374891_comment'></div>仰以为命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374891_comment'></div>复不得一郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374891_comment'></div>以饱其衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374891_comment'></div>尽其医药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374891_comment'></div>非今日海内无也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374891_comment'></div>言于所传闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374891_comment'></div>亦未有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1374891_comment'></div>自古言喜莫若虢国太子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1374891_comment'></div>以其死而复生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1374891_comment'></div>言恳莫若申包胥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1374891_comment'></div>求救于秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1374891_comment'></div>七日七夜哭声不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1374891_comment'></div>某今恳如包胥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1374891_comment'></div>但未哭尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1374891_comment'></div>若蒙恩悯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1374891_comment'></div>特遂血恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1374891_comment'></div>其喜也不下虢太子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1374891_comment'></div>词语烦碎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1374891_comment'></div>频干尊重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1374891_comment'></div>足及轩闼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1374891_comment'></div>神惊汗流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1374891_comment'></div>不胜忧恐恳悃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1374891_comment'></div>谨启。</div><div id='poem_sentence_114_1374891_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=850&endYear=850')">850年</a>　在长安，杜牧作文上李拭。作品：《上河阳李尚书书》<div id='poem_1374869' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374869' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374869?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上河阳李尚书书</a><span class='authorDate'>（850年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374869")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374869_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374869'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374869'>伏以三城所治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374869_comment'></div>兵精地要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374869_comment'></div>北锁太行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374869_comment'></div>东塞黎阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374869_comment'></div>左京河南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374869_comment'></div>指为重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374869_comment'></div>自艰难已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374869_comment'></div>儒生成名立功者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374869_comment'></div>盖寡于前代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374869_comment'></div>是以壮健不学之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374869_comment'></div>不知儒术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374869_comment'></div>不识大体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374869_comment'></div>取求微效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374869_comment'></div>终败大事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374869_comment'></div>不可一二悉数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374869_comment'></div>伏以尚书有才名德望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374869_comment'></div>知经义儒术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374869_comment'></div>加以俭克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374869_comment'></div>好立功名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374869_comment'></div>今横据要津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374869_comment'></div>重兵在手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374869_comment'></div>朝廷缙绅之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374869_comment'></div>屈指延颈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374869_comment'></div>伫观德政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374869_comment'></div>况圣主掀擢豪俊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374869_comment'></div>考校古今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374869_comment'></div>退朝之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374869_comment'></div>急于观书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374869_comment'></div>已筑七关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374869_comment'></div>取陇城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374869_comment'></div>缉为郡县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374869_comment'></div>今亲诛虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374869_comment'></div>收其土田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374869_comment'></div>取其良马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374869_comment'></div>为耕战之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374869_comment'></div>西复凉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374869_comment'></div>东取河朔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374869_comment'></div>平一天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374869_comment'></div>不使不贡不觐之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374869_comment'></div>敢自专擅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374869_comment'></div>此实圣主之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374869_comment'></div>事业已彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374869_comment'></div>臣下明明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374869_comment'></div>无不知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374869_comment'></div>伏自尚书树立锻鍊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374869_comment'></div>教训拣拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374869_comment'></div>法术尺寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374869_comment'></div>取于古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374869_comment'></div>若受指顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374869_comment'></div>必立大功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374869_comment'></div>使天下后学之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374869_comment'></div>知成功立事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374869_comment'></div>非大儒知今古成败者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374869_comment'></div>不能为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374869_comment'></div>复使儒生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1374869", 1374869, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>舒展</span>胸臆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374869_comment'></div>得以诲导壮健不学之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374869_comment'></div>指踪而使之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374869_comment'></div>令其心服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374869_comment'></div>正在今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374869_comment'></div>某多病早衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374869_comment'></div>志在耕钓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374869_comment'></div>得一二郡资其退休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374869_comment'></div>以活骨肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374869_comment'></div>亦能作为歌诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374869_comment'></div>以称道盛德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374869_comment'></div>其馀息心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374869_comment'></div>亦已久矣。<div class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374870")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374870_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374870'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374870'>伏以盐铁重务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374870_comment'></div>根本在于江淮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374870_comment'></div>今诸监院颇不得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374870_comment'></div>皆以权势干求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374870_comment'></div>固难悉议停替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374870_comment'></div>其于利病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374870_comment'></div>岂无中策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374870_comment'></div>某自池州睦州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374870_comment'></div>实见其弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374870_comment'></div>盖以江淮自废留后以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374870_comment'></div>凡有冤人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374870_comment'></div>无处告诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374870_comment'></div>每州皆有土豪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374870_comment'></div>百姓情愿把盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374870_comment'></div>每年纳利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374870_comment'></div>名曰土盐商。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374870_comment'></div>如此之流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374870_comment'></div>两税之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374870_comment'></div>州县不敢差役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374870_comment'></div>自罢江淮留后以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374870_comment'></div>破散将尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374870_comment'></div>以监院多是诛求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374870_comment'></div>一年之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374870_comment'></div>追呼无已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374870_comment'></div>至有身行不在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374870_comment'></div>须得父母妻儿锢身驱将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374870_comment'></div>得钱即放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374870_comment'></div>不二年内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374870_comment'></div>尽恐逃亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374870_comment'></div>今譬于常州百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374870_comment'></div>有屈身在苏州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374870_comment'></div>归家未得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374870_comment'></div>便可以苏州下状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374870_comment'></div>论理披诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374870_comment'></div>至如睦州百姓食临平监盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374870_comment'></div>其土盐商被临平监追呼求取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374870_comment'></div>直是睦州刺史亦与作主不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374870_comment'></div>非裹四千里粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374870_comment'></div>直入城役使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374870_comment'></div>即须破散奔走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374870_comment'></div>更无他图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374870_comment'></div>其间搜求胥徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374870_comment'></div>针抽缕取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374870_comment'></div>千计百校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374870_comment'></div>唯恐不多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374870_comment'></div>除非吞声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374870_comment'></div>别无赴诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374870_comment'></div>今有明长吏在上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374870_comment'></div>旁县百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374870_comment'></div>尚敢公为不法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374870_comment'></div>况诸监院皆是以货得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374870_comment'></div>恣为奸欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374870_comment'></div>人无语路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374870_comment'></div>况土盐商皆是州县大户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374870_comment'></div>言其根本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374870_comment'></div>实可痛心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374870_comment'></div>比初停罢留后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374870_comment'></div>众皆以为除烦去冗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374870_comment'></div>不知其弊及于疲羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374870_comment'></div>即是所利者至微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374870_comment'></div>所害者至大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374870_comment'></div>今若蒙侍郎改革前非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374870_comment'></div>于南省郎吏中择一清慎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374870_comment'></div>依前使为江淮留后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374870_comment'></div>减其胥吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374870_comment'></div>不必一如向前多置人数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374870_comment'></div>即自岭南至于汴宋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374870_comment'></div>凡有冤人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374870_comment'></div>有可控告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374870_comment'></div>奸赃之辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374870_comment'></div>动而有畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374870_comment'></div>数十州土盐商免至破灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374870_comment'></div>除江淮之大残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374870_comment'></div>为侍郎之阴德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374870_comment'></div>以某愚见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374870_comment'></div>莫过于斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374870_comment'></div>若问于盐铁吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374870_comment'></div>即不欲江淮别有留后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374870_comment'></div>若有留后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374870_comment'></div>其间百事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374870_comment'></div>自能申状咨呈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374870_comment'></div>安得货财表里计会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374870_comment'></div>分其权力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374870_comment'></div>言之可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374870_comment'></div>伏惟俯察愚衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374870_comment'></div>不赐罪责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374870_comment'></div>某再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_86_1374870_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=851&endYear=851')">851年9月</a>　九月，裴休除礼部尚书，裴谂除兵部侍郎，杜牧作文祝贺。作品：《裴休除礼部尚书，裴谂除兵部侍郎等制》<div id='poem_1374744' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374744' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374744?labeling=true' target='_blank'>裴休除礼部尚书裴谂除兵部侍郎等制</a><span class='authorDate'>（851年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374744")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374744_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374744'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374744'>敕。冉有仲由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374744_comment'></div>孔门之高弟也。尚曰处于小国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374744_comment'></div>可为具臣。况今照临百官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374744_comment'></div>抚御四海。绾牢笼漕挽之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374744_comment'></div>掌五兵六师之重。次第超擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374744_comment'></div>为吾大寮。若非佥谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374744_comment'></div>岂敢轻授。正议大夫守尚书兵部侍郎兼御史大夫统诸道盐铁转运等使上柱国河东县开国子食邑五百户赐紫金鱼袋裴休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374744_comment'></div>仁义礼乐。文行忠信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374744_comment'></div>积此八者。以为成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374744_comment'></div>前宣歙池等州都团练观察处置等使大中大夫检校左散骑常侍兼御史大夫上柱国河东县开国男食邑三百户赐紫金鱼袋裴谂。在元和代理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374744_comment'></div>惟帝念功。四夷九州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374744_comment'></div>文化武服。咨尔先父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374744_comment'></div>实著大勋。天必祚仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374744_comment'></div>门有令嗣。道直才富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374744_comment'></div>行备名高。文学而浃洽专精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374744_comment'></div>率履而清净恭俭。而皆周历华显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374744_comment'></div>践更台阁。处事可法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374744_comment'></div>出言成章。咸辍自纶闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374744_comment'></div>任寄方伯。教训以礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374744_comment'></div>生聚以仁。千里封疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374744_comment'></div>一口歌咏。休乃命以取士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374744_comment'></div>时称得人。用其公方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374744_comment'></div>委之管搉。事为之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374744_comment'></div>曲为之防钩校奸赃。末减赋取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374744_comment'></div>公财不耗。疲人乐生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374744_comment'></div>望为准绳。立作据依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374744_comment'></div>名实兼备。德位两高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374744_comment'></div>汉史曰。理行尤异者就加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374744_comment'></div>礼曰。有功于人者进律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374744_comment'></div>秩崇八座。官副夏卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374744_comment'></div>举以授之。予亦何吝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374744_comment'></div>夫宰相佐天子。公卿助宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374744_comment'></div>股肱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1374744", 1374744, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>指臂</span>。任同一身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374744_comment'></div>有事必言。未为越局。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374744_comment'></div>无自爱惜。勉荅宠荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374744_comment'></div>休可礼部尚书。依前统诸道盐铁转运等使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374744_comment'></div>谂可权知尚书兵部侍郎。散官勋封赐各如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374744_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1374744_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=851&endYear=851')">851年11月</a>　十一月，杜牧作文记沙州专使吴安正等人授官一事。作品：《沙州专使押衙吴安正等二十九人授官制》<div id='poem_1374836' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374836' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374836?labeling=true' target='_blank'>沙州专使押衙吴安正二十九人授官制</a><span class='authorDate'>（851年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374836")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374836_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374836'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374836'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374836_comment'></div>沙州专使衙前左厢都知押衙吴安正等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374836_comment'></div>自天宝以降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374836_comment'></div>中原多故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374836_comment'></div>莫大于虏盗取西陲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374836_comment'></div>男为戎臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374836_comment'></div>女为戎妾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374836_comment'></div>不暇吊伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374836_comment'></div>今将百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374836_comment'></div>自朕君临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374836_comment'></div>岂敢偷惰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374836_comment'></div>乃命将帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374836_comment'></div>收复七关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374836_comment'></div>爰披地图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374836_comment'></div>实得天险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374836_comment'></div>遂使朝廷声闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374836_comment'></div>闻于燉煌。<div id='poem_sentence_18_1374836_comment'></div>折昆夷之长角。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374836_comment'></div>窦融西河之故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374836_comment'></div>见于盛时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374836_comment'></div>李陵教射之奇兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374836_comment'></div>无非义旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374836_comment'></div>尔等咸能竭尽肝胆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374836_comment'></div>奉事长帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374836_comment'></div>将其诚命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374836_comment'></div>经历艰危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374836_comment'></div>言念忠劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374836_comment'></div>岂吝爵位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374836_comment'></div>官我武卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374836_comment'></div>仍峻阶级。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374836_comment'></div>以慰皇华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374836_comment'></div>用震殊俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374836_comment'></div>可依前件。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1374836_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=851&endYear=851')">851年12月</a>　十二月，杜牧在长安。李文举除睦州刺史，杜牧作文记之。作品：《李文举除睦州刺史制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见吴在庆《杜牧集系年校注》，中华书局2008年版,第1058-1059页，但时间标为852年4月。）</span><div id='poem_1374766' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374766' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374766?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李文举除睦州刺史制</a><span class='authorDate'>（851年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374766")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374766_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374766'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374766'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374766_comment'></div>夫三尺律令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374766_comment'></div>人情出于其中耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374766_comment'></div>苟情有不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374766_comment'></div>亦法无本条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374766_comment'></div>正议大夫权知宗正卿上柱国陇西县开国伯食邑七百户赐紫金鱼袋李文举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374766_comment'></div>宗室子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374766_comment'></div>初以地进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374766_comment'></div>累居官次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374766_comment'></div>皆著能名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374766_comment'></div>是以取自远藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374766_comment'></div>擢为宗正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374766_comment'></div>大则提举群吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374766_comment'></div>洒扫守奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374766_comment'></div>次则整训属族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374766_comment'></div>次第昭穆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374766_comment'></div>唯此二者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374766_comment'></div>尔之职焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374766_comment'></div>今则狂盗公然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374766_comment'></div>侵犯陵寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374766_comment'></div>毁椟之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374766_comment'></div>已坐首令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374766_comment'></div>责师之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374766_comment'></div>固难矜宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374766_comment'></div>勉于分忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374766_comment'></div>足以补过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374766_comment'></div>可使持节睦州诸军事守睦州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374766_comment'></div>散官勋封赐如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374766_comment'></div>仍驰驿赴任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1374766_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=851&endYear=851')">851年12月</a>　十二月，杜牧在长安。张直方授左骁卫将军制，杜牧作文记之。作品：《张直方授左骁卫将军制》<div id='poem_1374788' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374788' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374788?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张直方授左骁卫将军制</a><span class='authorDate'>（851年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374788")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374788_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374788'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374788'>敕。朕据南面之尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374788_comment'></div>制一代之命。先讲百官之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374788_comment'></div>后行四方之政。若有罪不问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374788_comment'></div>是倒持太阿。有顽不磨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374788_comment'></div>是废去砥石。则拱视天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374788_comment'></div>何以为理。云麾将军起复检校刑部尚书兼右羽林统军御史大夫张直方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374788_comment'></div>席其先人。任为边将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374788_comment'></div>披诚向阙。执玉来朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374788_comment'></div>近臣劳郊。大匠理第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374788_comment'></div>典兵于禁门之内。立侍于交戟之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374788_comment'></div>校其宠荣。无与等比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374788_comment'></div>而乃每轻法检。恣为遨荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374788_comment'></div>擅去宿卫。潜游异县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374788_comment'></div>有司问状。持舌不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374788_comment'></div>以至再三。姑引愆阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374788_comment'></div>古人有云。语人必于其伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374788_comment'></div>观过必于其党。念其生自戎旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374788_comment'></div>素不镌琢。既触<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1374788", 1374788, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>法网</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374788_comment'></div>亦可矜容。加膝坠泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374788_comment'></div>予常自慎。小惩大诫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374788_comment'></div>尔宜知恩。不失将军之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374788_comment'></div>仍有兼官之重。足得湔洗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374788_comment'></div>以俟甄升。可银青光禄大夫检校刑部尚书兼左骁卫将军御史大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374788_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1374788_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=851&endYear=851')">851年12月</a>　十二月，杜牧在长安。姜阅贬岳州司马，杜牧作文记之。作品：《姜阅贬岳州司马等制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《旧唐书·宣宗纪》中姜阅作“吴阅”，二者必有一误。）</span><div id='poem_1374826' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374826' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374826?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374826'>敕。朝议郎前守景陵台令上柱国姜阅等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374826_comment'></div>盗逆无状。辄犯陵寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374826_comment'></div>侵攘法物。闻之震惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374826_comment'></div>尔等官业。在于守奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374826_comment'></div>懈怠所致。是谁之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374826_comment'></div>言于末减。朕不敢议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374826_comment'></div>各宜佐官。用正典刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374826_comment'></div>可依前件。仍并驰驿发遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374826_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1374826_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=851&endYear=851')">851年12月</a>　十二月，杜牧在长安。朱能裕除景陵判官制，杜牧作文记之。作品：《朱能裕除景陵判官制》<div id='poem_1374830' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374830' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374830?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朱能裕除景陵判官制</a><span class='authorDate'>（851年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374830'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374830'>敕。新授景陵判官上骑都尉朱能裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374830_comment'></div>朕以桥山弓剑。渭北衣冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374830_comment'></div>霜露之心。悽感常切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374830_comment'></div>以汝端谨有守。操尚无尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374830_comment'></div>常在旁侧。备见忠孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374830_comment'></div>用是奖擢。爰资守奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374830_comment'></div>夙夜勤敬。无忝委任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374830_comment'></div>可将仕郎内侍省掖庭局宫教博士员外置同正员。馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374830_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1374830_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=851&endYear=851')">851年</a>　在长安，杜牧作文记敦煌郡僧正慧菀除临坛大德。作品：《敦煌郡僧正慧菀除临坛大德制》<div id='poem_1374837' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374837' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374837?labeling=true' target='_blank'>燉煌郡僧正慧菀除临坛大德制</a><span class='authorDate'>（851年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374837'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374837'>敕。燉煌管内释门都监察僧正兼州学博士僧慧菀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374837_comment'></div>燉煌大藩。久陷戎垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374837_comment'></div>气俗自异。果产名僧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374837_comment'></div>彼上人者。生于西土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374837_comment'></div>利根事佛。馀力通儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374837_comment'></div>悟执迷尘俗之身。譬喻火宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374837_comment'></div>举君臣父子之义。教尔青襟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374837_comment'></div>开张法门。显白三道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374837_comment'></div>遂使悍戾者好空恶杀。义勇者徇国忘家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374837_comment'></div>裨助至多。品地宜峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374837_comment'></div>领生徒坐于学校。贵服色举以临坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374837_comment'></div>若非出群之才。岂获兼荣之授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374837_comment'></div>勉宏两教。用化新邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374837_comment'></div>可充京城临坛大德。馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374837_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1374837_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=851&endYear=851')">851年</a>　在长安，杜牧作文一篇。作品：《权审除户部员外郎制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（本文作于本年九月后。）</span><div id='poem_1374752' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374752' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374752?labeling=true' target='_blank'>权审除户部员外郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（851年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_0_1374752_comment'></div>文林郎守尚书水部员外郎权审。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374752_comment'></div>湖岭旱暵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374752_comment'></div>百姓枵耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374752_comment'></div>老弱死道上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374752_comment'></div>强壮入贼中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374752_comment'></div>爰求使臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374752_comment'></div>以救其弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374752_comment'></div>执事者上言。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1374752_comment'></div>遂使乘驿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374752_comment'></div>视吾饥人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374752_comment'></div>果能临事知权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374752_comment'></div>大小轻重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374752_comment'></div>各合事宜。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374752_comment'></div>无以过焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374752_comment'></div>用超名曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374752_comment'></div>以酬往效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374752_comment'></div>无旷官业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374752_comment'></div>勉服休命。<div id='poem_sentence_30_1374752_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=852&endYear=852')">852年</a>　在长安，杜牧迁中书舍人。见温庭筠诗，赏之。温庭筠致书于杜牧，望其汲引。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=852&endYear=852')">852年</a>　在长安，中书舍人任上。杜牧过华清宫，有诗题咏。作品：《华清宫三十韵》<div id='poem_32306' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32306' class='poemTitle ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=852&endYear=852')">852年1月</a>　在长安，中书舍人任上。杜牧作文记薛逵除秦州刺史。作品：《薛逵除秦州刺史制》<div id='poem_1374770' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374770' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374770?labeling=true' target='_blank'>薛逵除秦州刺史制</a><span class='authorDate'>（852年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374770'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374770'>敕。兵者凶器也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374770_comment'></div>将者死官也。若不择才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374770_comment'></div>必有陷败。银青光禄大夫检校右散骑常侍使持节陇州诸军事兼陇州刺史御史大夫充本州防御使上柱国薛逵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374770_comment'></div>匈奴<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1374770", 1374770, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>犯塞</span>。李广逢时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374770_comment'></div>爪牙甚坚。翅翼颇健。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374770_comment'></div>任以陇。倚戎守封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374770_comment'></div>当赐辄分。军租不入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374770_comment'></div>士争为死。虏不敢犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374770_comment'></div>今以天水名郡。号为新都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374770_comment'></div>用汝守之。期于镇静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374770_comment'></div>无召戎生事。无玩兵邀功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374770_comment'></div>正封疆。守礼信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374770_comment'></div>险走集。严候伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374770_comment'></div>边将之道。莫过于斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374770_comment'></div>玉印貂冠。皆为荣秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374770_comment'></div>壮尔军旅。惟恐不多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374770_comment'></div>勉砺锋铓。以期报效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374770_comment'></div>可检校左散骑常侍使持节秦州诸军事兼秦州刺史御史大夫充天雄军使兼秦成两川经略及义宁军行营镇遏都知兵马使本道营田等使。散官勋如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374770_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_109_1374920_comment'></div>公鞭背降为下卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1374920_comment'></div>声北入魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1374920_comment'></div>皆曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1374920_comment'></div>周尚书文儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1374920_comment'></div>能治百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1374920_comment'></div>仁爱兵士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1374920_comment'></div>而复敢尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1374920_comment'></div>是岂可一犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1374920_comment'></div>九岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1374920_comment'></div>入拜兵部侍郎度支兼户部吏曹事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1374920_comment'></div>积边粮谷九十万石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1374920_comment'></div>今天子即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1374920_comment'></div>二年五月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1374920_comment'></div>以本官平章事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1374920_comment'></div>后一月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1374920_comment'></div>正位中书侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1374920_comment'></div>监修国史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1374920_comment'></div>就加刑部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1374920_comment'></div>因河湟事议不合旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1374920_comment'></div>以检校刑部尚书出为剑南东川节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1374920_comment'></div>明日入谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1374920_comment'></div>面加检校右仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1374920_comment'></div>公自举进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1374920_comment'></div>非其人不交言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1374920_comment'></div>旁睨后进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1374920_comment'></div>镌心镂志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1374920_comment'></div>及为将相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1374920_comment'></div>近取远挽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1374920_comment'></div>悉置于位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1374920_comment'></div>李太尉德裕会昌中以恩撰元和朝实录四十篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1374920_comment'></div>溢美其父吉甫为相事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1374920_comment'></div>公上言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1374920_comment'></div>人君惟不改史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1374920_comment'></div>人臣可改乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1374920_comment'></div>元和实录皆当时名士目书事实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1374920_comment'></div>今不信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1374920_comment'></div>而信德裕后三十年自名父功众所不知者而书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1374920_comment'></div>此若垂后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1374920_comment'></div>谁信史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1374920_comment'></div>竟废新本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1374920_comment'></div>并帅王宰铲所部财货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1374920_comment'></div>承事贵倖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1374920_comment'></div>自请来朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1374920_comment'></div>声言我取平章事镇大梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1374920_comment'></div>公上言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1374920_comment'></div>宰破太原取汴梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1374920_comment'></div>不知天下治所凡几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1374920_comment'></div>得如太原汴之大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1374920_comment'></div>可饱宰欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1374920_comment'></div>乞宰还镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1374920_comment'></div>自补其残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1374920_comment'></div>后二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1374920_comment'></div>还宰诏下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1374920_comment'></div>驸马都尉韦让求为京兆尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1374920_comment'></div>公言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1374920_comment'></div>尹坐堂上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1374920_comment'></div>阶下拜二赤县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1374920_comment'></div>属官将百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1374920_comment'></div>悉可笞辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1374920_comment'></div>非有德者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1374920_comment'></div>京兆不可为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1374920_comment'></div>岂止取吏事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1374920_comment'></div>让议竟寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1374920_comment'></div>自此非道求进者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1374920_comment'></div>鼠遁自屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1374920_comment'></div>及镇东蜀一岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1374920_comment'></div>欲归闲洛师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1374920_comment'></div>微得风恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1374920_comment'></div>公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1374920_comment'></div>我今去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1374920_comment'></div>是以疾去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1374920_comment'></div>疾愈去非晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1374920_comment'></div>大中五年岁在辛未二月十七日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1374920_comment'></div>薨于位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1374920_comment'></div>享年五十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1374920_comment'></div>讣至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1374920_comment'></div>废朝三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1374920_comment'></div>册赠司徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1374920_comment'></div>命谏议大夫卢懿吊恤其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1374920_comment'></div>公信于朋友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1374920_comment'></div>公于为官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1374920_comment'></div>事嫠姊出告反面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1374920_comment'></div>家事不敢自专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1374920_comment'></div>同曾祖兄弟入门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1374920_comment'></div>呵笞奴婢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1374920_comment'></div>衣服饮食无二等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1374920_comment'></div>免相位西去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1374920_comment'></div>送公还者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1374920_comment'></div>虽武将散秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1374920_comment'></div>叹息咨嗟曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1374920_comment'></div>周相公无私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1374920_comment'></div>我惜其去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1374920_comment'></div>岂有私乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1374920_comment'></div>夫人义兴蒋氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1374920_comment'></div>先公某年终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1374920_comment'></div>生二男一女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1374920_comment'></div>长曰宽饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1374920_comment'></div>崇入校书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1374920_comment'></div>次曰咸喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1374920_comment'></div>京兆参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1374920_comment'></div>皆孝谨有文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1374920_comment'></div>女嫁起居舍人薛蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1374920_comment'></div>大中六年岁次壬申二月十三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1374920_comment'></div>归葬先茔河南府河阳县谷阳乡立行里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1374920_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1374920_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_215_1374920'>姬之支封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1374920_comment'></div>国自为姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1374920_comment'></div>以周为氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1374920_comment'></div>入唐不盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1374920_comment'></div>烈后几世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1374920_comment'></div>厥生贤孙。<div id='poem_sentence_222_1374920_comment'></div>文思天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1374920_comment'></div>跨古为治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1374920_comment'></div>提起王道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1374920_comment'></div>以公为倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1374920_comment'></div>迒蹊隙窍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1374920_comment'></div>去者鸟驶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1374920_comment'></div>谁塞谁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1374920_comment'></div>劳公评指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1374920_comment'></div>三屏大邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1374920_comment'></div>骏壮武事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1374920_comment'></div>哺抚稚老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1374920_comment'></div>父母赤子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1374920_comment'></div>曰将曰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1374920_comment'></div>公其愧几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1374920_comment'></div>指古为比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1374920_comment'></div>公其无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1374920_comment'></div>以公遗唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1374920_comment'></div>而后公死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1374920_comment'></div>不锡寿考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1374920_comment'></div>谁其辨之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_242_1374920_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=852&endYear=852')">852年</a>　在长安，中书舍人任上。杜牧为其弟杜顗撰墓志铭。作品：《唐故淮南支使试大理评事兼监察御史杜君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1374925' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374925' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374925?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故淮南支使试大理评事兼监察御史杜君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（852年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374925")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374925_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374925'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374925'>君讳顗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374925_comment'></div>字胜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374925_comment'></div>曾祖凉州节度使襄阳公赠左仆射希望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374925_comment'></div>大父司徒平章事太保致仕岐国公赠太师佑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374925_comment'></div>皇考驾部员外郎赠礼部尚书从郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374925_comment'></div>君幼孤多疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374925_comment'></div>目视昏近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374925_comment'></div>先夫人不令就学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374925_comment'></div>年十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374925_comment'></div>读尚书十三篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374925_comment'></div>礼记七篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374925_comment'></div>汉书止贾谊传不复执卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374925_comment'></div>年二十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374925_comment'></div>明年当举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374925_comment'></div>始握笔茸阙下献书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374925_comment'></div>与裴丞相度书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374925_comment'></div>指言时事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374925_comment'></div>书成各数千字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374925_comment'></div>不半岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374925_comment'></div>遍传天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374925_comment'></div>进士崔歧有文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374925_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1374925", 1374925, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>峭涩</span>不许可人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374925_comment'></div>诣门赠君诗曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374925_comment'></div>贾马死来生杜顗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374925_comment'></div>中间寥落一千年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374925_comment'></div>年二十五举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374925_comment'></div>二十六一举登上第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374925_comment'></div>时贾相国餗为礼部之二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374925_comment'></div>朝士以进士干贾公不获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374925_comment'></div>有杰强毁嘲者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374925_comment'></div>贾公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374925_comment'></div>我祇以杜某敌数百辈足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374925_comment'></div>始命试秘书正字匦使判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374925_comment'></div>李丞相德裕出为镇海军节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374925_comment'></div>辟君试协律郎为巡官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374925_comment'></div>后贬袁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374925_comment'></div>语亲善曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374925_comment'></div>我闻杜巡官言晚十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374925_comment'></div>故有此行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374925_comment'></div>大和九年夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374925_comment'></div>君客扬州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374925_comment'></div>六月。<div id='poem_sentence_50_1374925_comment'></div>丞相奇章公僧儒请君入幕府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374925_comment'></div>君谢曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374925_comment'></div>李公在困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374925_comment'></div>未愿副知己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374925_comment'></div>开成二年春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374925_comment'></div>目益昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374925_comment'></div>冬遂丧明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374925_comment'></div>李为淮南节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374925_comment'></div>复请为试评事兼监察御史支使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374925_comment'></div>兄牧自冯翊迎医石至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374925_comment'></div>曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374925_comment'></div>是状脑脂下融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374925_comment'></div>名曰内障。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374925_comment'></div>如蜡塞管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374925_comment'></div>蜡去管明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374925_comment'></div>俟脂凝可以抉去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374925_comment'></div>无不愈者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374925_comment'></div>后二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374925_comment'></div>石曰可治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374925_comment'></div>治不效。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374925_comment'></div>障有赤脉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374925_comment'></div>如木根横去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374925_comment'></div>牢不可断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374925_comment'></div>是法名曰日脚内障。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374925_comment'></div>生日脚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374925_comment'></div>法不可治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374925_comment'></div>君因居淮南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374925_comment'></div>筑室治生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374925_comment'></div>不复言治眼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374925_comment'></div>事闻于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374925_comment'></div>无不嗟叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374925_comment'></div>君安泰自如。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374761_comment'></div>道可咨禀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374761_comment'></div>天命不助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374761_comment'></div>倏然去我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374761_comment'></div>宜加褒命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374761_comment'></div>以慰重泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374761_comment'></div>咨尔故淮南节度副大使知节度事管内营田观察处置等使金紫光禄大夫检校尚书右仆射兼扬州大都督府长史御史大夫上柱国赞皇县开国公食邑一千五百户李珏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374761_comment'></div>立德行道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374761_comment'></div>继长增高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374761_comment'></div>贵而益修。<div class='inline' "poem_title_1374890")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374890_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374890'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374890'>前渭南县令王宁。前件官实有吏才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374890_comment'></div>称于众口。年少强力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374890_comment'></div>一也。遇事必能裁割。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374890_comment'></div>二也。既蕴智能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374890_comment'></div>无头角誇诞。三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374890_comment'></div>廉直可保。四也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374890_comment'></div>处于骄将内臣之间。必能和同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374890_comment'></div>五也。今者边将生事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374890_comment'></div>杂虏起戎。不忧兵甲。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374750_comment'></div>止于代言。亦乃密参机要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374750_comment'></div>得执所见。若非贤彦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374750_comment'></div>岂膺选擢。将仕郎守起居舍人庾道蔚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374750_comment'></div>善行必备。重价无对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374750_comment'></div>尝自侯府。升为谏臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374750_comment'></div>每直言而尽诚。不违忠而偶意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374750_comment'></div>朝议郎行尚书礼部员外郎上柱国赐绯鱼袋李文儒。才行冠时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374750_comment'></div>名声哗众。扬历台阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374750_comment'></div>咸蕴贤人之操。久游安在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374750_comment'></div>相见何晚。礼曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374750_comment'></div>君子称人之美。则必爵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374750_comment'></div>我既言矣。亦能絷维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374750_comment'></div>宜尽忠谠。以酬宠遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374750_comment'></div>并可守本官充翰林学士。馀各如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374743_comment'></div>爵高天秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374743_comment'></div>仁义礼乐之是务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374743_comment'></div>克伐怨欲之不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374743_comment'></div>翱翔禁闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374743_comment'></div>出入讽议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374743_comment'></div>汲黯为郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374743_comment'></div>尝闻卧理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374743_comment'></div>下惠去国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374743_comment'></div>皆以直道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374743_comment'></div>洎宣室思贾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374743_comment'></div>甘泉召雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374743_comment'></div>造膝尽忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374743_comment'></div>代言稽古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374743_comment'></div>近以微恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374743_comment'></div>恳请自便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374743_comment'></div>君子之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374743_comment'></div>进退可观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374743_comment'></div>正议大夫前权知尚书户部侍郎上柱国博陵县开国子食邑五百户赐紫金鱼袋崔玙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374743_comment'></div>上知自得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374743_comment'></div>不器难名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374743_comment'></div>既擅高文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374743_comment'></div>兼通古学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374743_comment'></div>掌言纶阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374743_comment'></div>典贡春闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374743_comment'></div>词同三代之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374743_comment'></div>士掇一时之秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374743_comment'></div>振举职业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374743_comment'></div>昭宣令名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374743_comment'></div>诗曰多士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374743_comment'></div>文王以宁礼曰官备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374743_comment'></div>天子为乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374743_comment'></div>咨尔璪等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374743_comment'></div>实瑞清时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374743_comment'></div>予为尔之德邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374743_comment'></div>尔膺予之慎选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374743_comment'></div>典刑不忘于哀敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374743_comment'></div>提纲唯在于公勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374743_comment'></div>举司马法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374743_comment'></div>勿踵近习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374743_comment'></div>各膺重位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374743_comment'></div>企伫上酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374743_comment'></div>宜于夙夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374743_comment'></div>无孤官业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374743_comment'></div>璪可守刑部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374743_comment'></div>散官勋赐如故涤可行尚书左丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374743_comment'></div>散官封如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374743_comment'></div>玙可权知尚书兵部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374743_comment'></div>散官勋封赐如故。</div><div id='poem_sentence_80_1374743_comment'></div></div></div><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374746_comment'></div>昔贞观开元之为理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374746_comment'></div>远隐必见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374746_comment'></div>情伪必知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374746_comment'></div>天下如一家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374746_comment'></div>兆庶如一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374746_comment'></div>无他道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374746_comment'></div>纲目皆振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374746_comment'></div>法令必行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374746_comment'></div>祖宗在天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374746_comment'></div>方册在地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374746_comment'></div>人存政举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374746_comment'></div>行之非艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374746_comment'></div>故用正臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374746_comment'></div>委之邦宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374746_comment'></div>朝请大夫守尚书刑部侍郎上柱国赐紫金鱼袋韦有翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374746_comment'></div>戴仁而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374746_comment'></div>抱义以处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374746_comment'></div>墙仞里峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374746_comment'></div>坛宇外宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374746_comment'></div>介特守君子之强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374746_comment'></div>文学尽儒者之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374746_comment'></div>周历华贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374746_comment'></div>擢为诤臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374746_comment'></div>攻予甚专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374746_comment'></div>言事颇切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374746_comment'></div>愿试佐辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374746_comment'></div>移理陜郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374746_comment'></div>冯翊之恐失倪宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374746_comment'></div>颍川之意得黄霸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374746_comment'></div>壶浆迎路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374746_comment'></div>襁属攀车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374746_comment'></div>徵为公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374746_comment'></div>愈见风采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374746_comment'></div>恤刑慎罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374746_comment'></div>尔其念惠文弹理之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374746_comment'></div>思立秋授署之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374746_comment'></div>三尺律令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374746_comment'></div>四海纪纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374746_comment'></div>所宜公共。<div id='poem_sentence_46_1374746_comment'></div>凡为虎鼠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374746_comment'></div>计于用舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374746_comment'></div>今之倚任。<div class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374795?labeling=true' target='_blank'>韦宗立授检校仓部员外郎知盐铁庐寿院等制</a><span class='authorDate'>（852年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1374795_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374795'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374795'>敕。权知盐铁庐寿院事朝请郎侍御史内供奉韦宗立等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374795_comment'></div>近者恢复河湟。训定羌虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374795_comment'></div>江湖之间。人安而不扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374795_comment'></div>供馈之费。财有馀而力不蹙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374795_comment'></div>实由管榷。委之名臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374795_comment'></div>今者尚书休以尔宗立等上言。咸曰清白处已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374795_comment'></div>勤慎奉公。予安能知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374795_comment'></div>无不可者。暨颉与潜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374795_comment'></div>皆称名士。自有丞相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374795_comment'></div>为尔已知。守职佐藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374795_comment'></div>无忝新命。可依前件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374795_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1374795_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=852&endYear=852')">852年8月</a>　在长安，中书舍人任上。杜牧代裴休作文一篇。作品：《代裴相公让平章事表》<div id='poem_sentence_7_1374849_comment'></div>臣本书生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374849_comment'></div>仕逢圣代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374849_comment'></div>掌纶言于西掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374849_comment'></div>作藩守于名邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374849_comment'></div>自顾才能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374849_comment'></div>已是踰越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374849_comment'></div>陛下奖遇不次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374849_comment'></div>拔擢过分。<div id='poem_sentence_22_1374849_comment'></div>欲裨万一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374849_comment'></div>而才智疏拙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374849_comment'></div>不效涓尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374849_comment'></div>为人具瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374849_comment'></div>岂伊小臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374849_comment'></div>而膺大任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374849_comment'></div>今朝廷髦俊并作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374849_comment'></div>名德森然。<div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374764'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374764'>敕。仲尼以举贤才则理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374764_comment'></div>大禹以能官人则安。况西界浙河。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1374764_comment'></div>温良恭俭。齐庄中正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374764_comment'></div>实以君子之德。华以才人之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374764_comment'></div>拥茜旆而服元玉。化千里而有三军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374764_comment'></div>儒者之荣。莫过于此。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=852&endYear=852')">852年</a>　在长安，中书舍人任上。杜牧作文记卢籍除河东副史，李推贤殿中丞，高湜除湖南推官，薛廷杰桂管支使等。作品：《卢籍除河东副使，李推贤殿中丞，高湜除湖南推官，薛廷杰桂管支使等制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文作于大中五年九月后。）</span><div id='poem_1374804' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374804' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374804?labeling=true' target='_blank'>卢籍除河东副使李推贤除殿中丞高湜除湖南推官薛廷杰除桂管支使等制</a><span class='authorDate'>（852年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374804")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374804_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374804'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374804'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374804_comment'></div>河东节度副使朝散大夫检校大理少卿摄御史中丞上柱国卢籍等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374804_comment'></div>夫诸侯之任重矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374804_comment'></div>其行道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374804_comment'></div>得以阜俗变俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374804_comment'></div>其行法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374804_comment'></div>得以刑人赏人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374804_comment'></div>若张政化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374804_comment'></div>得以助业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374804_comment'></div>某等上言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374804_comment'></div>咸举可用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374804_comment'></div>籍等或负才器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374804_comment'></div>倜傥不群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374804_comment'></div>或以文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374804_comment'></div>策名俊秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374804_comment'></div>或有干局。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374804_comment'></div>可佐囹圄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374804_comment'></div>皆徇所请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374804_comment'></div>予安能知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374804_comment'></div>并州近胡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374804_comment'></div>王业兹始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374804_comment'></div>艰难已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374804_comment'></div>何战不会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374804_comment'></div>长沙始安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374804_comment'></div>颇闻旱秏。<div id='poem_sentence_26_1374804_comment'></div>夫直道枉道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374804_comment'></div>无他故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374804_comment'></div>取容尽节而已。<div id='poem_sentence_31_1374804_comment'></div>暨殿省佐僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374804_comment'></div>县道为郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374804_comment'></div>岂曰虚授。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=852&endYear=852')">852年10月</a>　在长安，中书舍人任上。杜牧作文记张直方贬恩州司户。作品：《张直方贬恩州司户制》<div id='poem_1374823' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374823' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374823?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张直方贬恩州司户制</a><span class='authorDate'>（852年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374823")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374823_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374823'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374823'>敕。朕闻先王之理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374823_comment'></div>设法误罹。虽大必赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374823_comment'></div>不忌故犯。纵小必诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374823_comment'></div>况乎凶狠不悛。罪戾日积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374823_comment'></div>更欲矜免。其如法何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374823_comment'></div>银青光禄大夫检校刑部尚书兼左骁卫大将军御史大夫张直方。念以来朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374823_comment'></div>嘉其慕善。付之宠禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374823_comment'></div>颇极尊荣。为执金吾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374823_comment'></div>鞭小过而至死。作禁军统。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374823_comment'></div>去异县而恣游。尚以生自边陲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374823_comment'></div>素乏教义。退之散秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374823_comment'></div>以惩非心。俟其抆拭旧痕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374823_comment'></div>湔洗前过。必欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1374823", 1374823, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>牵复</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374823_comment'></div>用存始终。岂暴虐得于天生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374823_comment'></div>险悍著于心本。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1374823", 1374823, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>抵冒</span>刑宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374823_comment'></div>纵恣胸臆。法所恶者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374823_comment'></div>尔皆为之。白昼九衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374823_comment'></div>指摘万手。作横日甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374823_comment'></div>而不自知。满于听闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374823_comment'></div>岂可悉数。礼曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374823_comment'></div>凡有罪恶。屏于四裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374823_comment'></div>不留中国。唯舜能之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374823_comment'></div>况坚顽有不移之姿。网罗无屡开之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374823_comment'></div>荒服作掾。犹曰宽恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374823_comment'></div>尔能自新。岂惜后命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374823_comment'></div>可守恩州司户参军员外置同正员。仍即驰驿发遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374823_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1374823_comment'></div></div></div><br class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374916_comment'></div>毕于角为第八宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374916_comment'></div>曰病厄宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374916_comment'></div>土星在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374916_comment'></div>火星继木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374916_comment'></div>星工杨晞曰。<div class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374767?labeling=true' target='_blank'>窦宏馀加官依前台州刺史苏庄除邓州刺史等制</a><span class='authorDate'>（852年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1374767_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374767'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374767'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374767_comment'></div>朝散大夫使持节台州诸军事守台州刺史上柱国窦宏馀朝议郎前使持节虔州诸军事守虔州刺史上柱国赐绯鱼袋苏庄等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374767_comment'></div>南郡盗作而萧育拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374767_comment'></div>河内政美而寇恂留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374767_comment'></div>为人择官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374767_comment'></div>因重而抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374767_comment'></div>考于两汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374767_comment'></div>行古道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374767_comment'></div>宏馀廉使上言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374767_comment'></div>父老有请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374767_comment'></div>其为政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374767_comment'></div>长育多方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374767_comment'></div>惠训不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374767_comment'></div>凡设教令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374767_comment'></div>皆有科指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374767_comment'></div>庄任南康。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1374767_comment'></div>节用爱人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374767_comment'></div>南阳古都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374767_comment'></div>近者小扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374767_comment'></div>临海越俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374767_comment'></div>尤惜良吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374767_comment'></div>就加超拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374767_comment'></div>各叶所宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374767_comment'></div>仕至二千石。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1374767_comment'></div>不自贵重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374767_comment'></div>副疲羸之望者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374767_comment'></div>须念始终。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=852&endYear=852')">852年</a>　在长安，中书舍人任上。杜牧作文一篇。作品：《李蔚除侍御史卢潘除殿中侍御史等制》《谢赐御札提举边将表》《代人举周敬复自代状》<div id='poem_1374755' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374755' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374755?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李蔚除侍御史卢潘除殿中侍御史等制</a><span class='authorDate'>（852年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374755")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374755_comment'></div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1374755_comment'></div>将仕郎守殿中侍御史李蔚剑南西川节度判官朝议郎检校尚书礼部员外郎兼侍御史上柱国赐绯鱼袋卢潘等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374755_comment'></div>夫法不立而化行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374755_comment'></div>恶不去而善进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374755_comment'></div>虽使尧舜在上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374755_comment'></div>未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374755_comment'></div>故御史之举职者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374755_comment'></div>前代有埋轮都亭之奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374755_comment'></div>国朝亦有戴豸正殿之劾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374755_comment'></div>若非端劲知名之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374755_comment'></div>不在斯选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374755_comment'></div>蔚以文行进用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374755_comment'></div>已著劳效。<div class='inline'
