class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374755_comment'></div>词旨颇公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374755_comment'></div>使吾纲目尽张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374755_comment'></div>堤防不坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374755_comment'></div>不在法吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374755_comment'></div>其在他乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374755_comment'></div>朕辟祇宫之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374755_comment'></div>开天下之口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374755_comment'></div>企以待理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374755_comment'></div>无有厚薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374755_comment'></div>尔等吐茹侮畏之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374755_comment'></div>能不愧于诗人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374755_comment'></div>斯塞职矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374755_comment'></div>可不勉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374755_comment'></div>蔚可侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374755_comment'></div>散官如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374755_comment'></div>潘可殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374755_comment'></div>散官勋如故。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1374755_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1374847' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374847' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374847?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢赐御札提举边将表</a><span class='authorDate'>（852年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374847")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374847_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374847'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374847'>伏奉宸翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374847_comment'></div>以边塞未静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374847_comment'></div>将帅乏才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374847_comment'></div>唯务诛求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374847_comment'></div>不谋兵食者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374847_comment'></div>伏以陛下自即位已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374847_comment'></div>正朝廷而举典法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374847_comment'></div>肥天下而寿群生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374847_comment'></div>故能不血刃以收河湟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374847_comment'></div>用文诰而降羌寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374847_comment'></div>干戈偃戢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374847_comment'></div>远迩安宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374847_comment'></div>今者尚以戌边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374847_comment'></div>未得高枕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374847_comment'></div>深忧将帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374847_comment'></div>不副忧勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374847_comment'></div>或但恣于侵贪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374847_comment'></div>或不事其兵食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374847_comment'></div>须有戒励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374847_comment'></div>形于诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374847_comment'></div>此乃周文小心克勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374847_comment'></div>大禹不自满假。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374847_comment'></div>比于圣德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374847_comment'></div>无以过焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374847_comment'></div>臣等备位鼎司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374847_comment'></div>亲奉睿旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374847_comment'></div>铭镂肝鬲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374847_comment'></div>专令防虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374847_comment'></div>无任忭跃屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1374847_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1374859' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374859' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374859?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代人举周敬复自代状</a><span class='authorDate'>（852年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374859")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374859_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374859'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374859'>前件官执德以进。向道而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374859_comment'></div>蔼有令名。备历清贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374859_comment'></div>掌纶言于西掖。才称<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1374859", 1374859, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>发挥</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374859_comment'></div>参密命于内庭。众推<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1374859", 1374859, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>忠慎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374859_comment'></div>自珥貂近侍。主钥东门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374859_comment'></div>声实益重于搢绅。磨涅始彰其坚白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374859_comment'></div>伏以南省实天下根本。两丞为百司管辖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374859_comment'></div>苟非其选。必致败官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374859_comment'></div>今若以臣所任。回授敬复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374859_comment'></div>庶能肃清台阁。提举纪纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374859_comment'></div>既曰陟明。实不虚受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374859_comment'></div>伏乞天恩。允臣所请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374859_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1374859_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=852&endYear=852')">852年</a>　在长安，中书舍人任上。杜牧作文荐韩乂。作品：《荐韩乂启》<div id='poem_1374887' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374887' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374887?labeling=true' target='_blank'>荐韩乂启</a><span class='authorDate'>（852年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374887")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374887_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374887'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374887'>昨日所启言韩拾遗事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374887_comment'></div>非与韩求衣食救饥寒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374887_comment'></div>御史亦岂为救饥寒之官乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374887_comment'></div>中丞必曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374887_comment'></div>大梁奏取韩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374887_comment'></div>以救饥寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374887_comment'></div>何不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374887_comment'></div>夫幕吏乃古之陪臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374887_comment'></div>以人为北面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374887_comment'></div>虽布衣无耻之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374887_comment'></div>亦宜访其乐与不乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374887_comment'></div>况有耻之君子乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374887_comment'></div>韩以旅寓洛中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374887_comment'></div>非不乐汴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374887_comment'></div>不甘不告之请耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374887_comment'></div>韩及第后归越中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374887_comment'></div>佐沈公江西宣城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374887_comment'></div>府罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374887_comment'></div>唐扶中丞辟于闽中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374887_comment'></div>罢府归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374887_comment'></div>路由建州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374887_comment'></div>妻与元晦同高祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374887_comment'></div>扶恶晦为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374887_comment'></div>不省之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374887_comment'></div>及晦得越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374887_comment'></div>乃弃产避之居常州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374887_comment'></div>殷俨者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374887_comment'></div>仰韩之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374887_comment'></div>自闽寄百缣遗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374887_comment'></div>及门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374887_comment'></div>不开书函而斥去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374887_comment'></div>某比两府同院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374887_comment'></div>但见其廉慎高洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374887_comment'></div>亦未知其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374887_comment'></div>太和八年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374887_comment'></div>自淮南有事至越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374887_comment'></div>见韩居于境上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374887_comment'></div>三亩宅两顷田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374887_comment'></div>树蔬钓鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374887_comment'></div>唯召名僧为侣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374887_comment'></div>馀力究易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374887_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1374887", 1374887, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>嬉嬉然</span>无日不自得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374887_comment'></div>未尝及身名出处之语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374887_comment'></div>未尝入公府造请与幕吏宴游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374887_comment'></div>因此不为搢绅所相见礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374887_comment'></div>萧高二连帅至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374887_comment'></div>即日造其庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374887_comment'></div>询其政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374887_comment'></div>称先人梓材有文学高名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374887_comment'></div>没于越之府幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374887_comment'></div>故不愿复为越宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374887_comment'></div>及高至许下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374887_comment'></div>厚礼辟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374887_comment'></div>其为人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374887_comment'></div>贞洁芳茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374887_comment'></div>非其人不与游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374887_comment'></div>非其食不敢食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374887_comment'></div>萧舍人考功崔员外是趋于韩交者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374887_comment'></div>某复趋于萧崔二君子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374887_comment'></div>即韩之去某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374887_comment'></div>其间不啻容数十人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374887_comment'></div>某安得知其贤而言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374887_comment'></div>复不僭乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374887_comment'></div>伏恐中丞谓韩求官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374887_comment'></div>以衣食干交朋者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374887_comment'></div>中丞初在宪府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374887_comment'></div>固宜慎选御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374887_comment'></div>御史固非救饥寒之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374887_comment'></div>某久承恩知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374887_comment'></div>但欲荐贤于盛时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374887_comment'></div>虽至浅陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374887_comment'></div>亦知不可以交友饥寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374887_comment'></div>求清秩以干大君子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374887_comment'></div>伏恐未审诚恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374887_comment'></div>故此具陈本末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374887_comment'></div>伏惟照察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374887_comment'></div>谨启。</div><div id='poem_sentence_76_1374887_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=852&endYear=852')">852年1月</a>　在长安，中书舍人任上。杜牧作诗一首。作品：《岁日朝廻》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗当与《岁日朝回口号》为同一诗作，题目记载不同。）</span><div id='poem_31943' class='_poem'><div -----title
澄城

<div class='label1' id='c6c27087c6554498a269b4e940ac623f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c6c27087c6554498a269b4e940ac623f");'><span id='c6c27087c6554498a269b4e940ac623f_link' 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>春，杜牧游同州澄城县，遇谭宪，谈其兄谭忠事，作文以记之。作品：《燕将录》<div id='poem_1374934' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374934' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374934?labeling=true' target='_blank'>燕将录</a><span class='authorDate'>（827年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1374934'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374934'>谭忠者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374934_comment'></div>绛人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374934_comment'></div>祖瑶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374934_comment'></div>天宝末令内黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374934_comment'></div>死燕寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374934_comment'></div>忠豪健喜兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374934_comment'></div>始去燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374934_comment'></div>燕牧刘济与二千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374934_comment'></div>障白狼口<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注山名契丹路）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374934_comment'></div>后将渔阳军留范阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374934_comment'></div>元和五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374934_comment'></div>中黄门出禁兵伐赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374934_comment'></div>魏牧田季安令其徒曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374934_comment'></div>师不跨河二十五年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374934_comment'></div>今一旦越魏伐赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374934_comment'></div>赵诚虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374934_comment'></div>魏亦虏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374934_comment'></div>计为之奈何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374934_comment'></div>其徒有超佐伍而言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374934_comment'></div>愿借骑五千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374934_comment'></div>以除君忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374934_comment'></div>季安大呼曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374934_comment'></div>壮夫哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374934_comment'></div>兵决出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374934_comment'></div>格沮者斩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374934_comment'></div>忠其时为燕使魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374934_comment'></div>知其谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374934_comment'></div>乃入谓季安曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374934_comment'></div>某之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374934_comment'></div>是引天下之兵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374934_comment'></div>何者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374934_comment'></div>往年王师取蜀取夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374934_comment'></div>算不失一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374934_comment'></div>是相臣之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374934_comment'></div>今王师越魏伐赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374934_comment'></div>不使耆臣宿将而专付<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1374934", 1374934, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>中臣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374934_comment'></div>不输天下之甲而多出禁甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374934_comment'></div>君知谁为之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374934_comment'></div>此乃天子自为之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374934_comment'></div>欲将誇服于臣下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1374934_comment'></div>忠弟宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1374934_comment'></div>前范阳安次令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1374934_comment'></div>持兄丧归葬于绛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1374934_comment'></div>常往来长安间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1374934_comment'></div>元年孟夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1374934_comment'></div>某遇于冯翊属县北徵中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1374934_comment'></div>因吐其兄之状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1374934_comment'></div>某因直书其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1374934_comment'></div>至于褒贬之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1374934_comment'></div>俟学春秋者焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_270_1374934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1374934'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_165_1374934_0'>⑴ 原注德州管平原安陵长河棣州管厌次滴河阳信蓨平昌将陵蒲台渤海</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1374934_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>春，在同州澄城县。杜牧因访问地方风俗，民生疾苦，深慨法令隳弛，权豪势要扰害平民，作文一篇。作品：《同州澄城县户工仓尉厅壁记》<div id='poem_1374902' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374902' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374902?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同州澄城县户工仓尉厅壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（827年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374902")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374902_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374902'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374902'>县之所重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374902_comment'></div>其举秀贡贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374902_comment'></div>今之自外诸侯之儒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374902_comment'></div>旷不能升一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374902_comment'></div>况尉乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374902_comment'></div>次乃户税而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374902_comment'></div>史记河渠书曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374902_comment'></div>自徵引洛水至商颜下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374902_comment'></div>凿井深者四十馀丈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374902_comment'></div>即此地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374902_comment'></div>徵者俗讹为澄耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374902_comment'></div>其地西北山环之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374902_comment'></div>县境笼其趾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374902_comment'></div>沙石相礡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374902_comment'></div>岁雨如注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374902_comment'></div>他皆淫滟不测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374902_comment'></div>徵之土适润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374902_comment'></div>苗则大穫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374902_comment'></div>天或旬而不雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374902_comment'></div>民则蒿然四望失矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374902_comment'></div>是以年多薄稔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374902_comment'></div>复绝丝麻蔬果之饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374902_comment'></div>固无豪族富室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374902_comment'></div>大抵民户高下相差埒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374902_comment'></div>然岁入官赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374902_comment'></div>未尝期表鞭一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374902_comment'></div>因徵其来由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374902_comment'></div>耆老咸曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374902_comment'></div>西四十里即畿郊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374902_comment'></div>至如禁司东西军禽坊龙厩彩工梓匠善声巧手之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374902_comment'></div>第番上下户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374902_comment'></div>互来进取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374902_comment'></div>挟公为首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374902_comment'></div>缘以一括十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374902_comment'></div>民之晨炊夜舂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374902_comment'></div>岁时不敢尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374902_comment'></div>悉以仰奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374902_comment'></div>父伏子走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374902_comment'></div>尚不能当其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374902_comment'></div>往往击辱而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374902_comment'></div>长吏固不敢援复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374902_comment'></div>况其养秩安禄者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374902_comment'></div>加以御女官多盘冗其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374902_comment'></div>递相占附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374902_comment'></div>比急热如手足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374902_comment'></div>自丞相御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374902_comment'></div>咸不能与之角逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374902_comment'></div>县令固无有为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374902_comment'></div>非豪吏真工联纽相姻戚者率解去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374902_comment'></div>是以县赋益逋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374902_comment'></div>徵民幸脱此苦者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374902_comment'></div>盖以西有通涧巨壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374902_comment'></div>义牙交吞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374902_comment'></div>小山峭径。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374902_comment'></div>驰鞍马张机罝者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374902_comment'></div>不便于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374902_comment'></div>是以绝迹不到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374902_comment'></div>兼之土田枯卤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374902_comment'></div>树植不茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374902_comment'></div>无秀润气象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374902_comment'></div>咸恶之而不家焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374902_comment'></div>民所以安活输赋者殆由此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374902_comment'></div>傥使徵亦中其苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374902_comment'></div>则墟矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374902_comment'></div>尚安敢比之于他邑乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374902_comment'></div>嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374902_comment'></div>国家设法禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374902_comment'></div>百官持而行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374902_comment'></div>有尺寸害民者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374902_comment'></div>率有尺寸之刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374902_comment'></div>今此咸堕地不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374902_comment'></div>反使民以山之涧壑自为防限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374902_comment'></div>可不悲哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374902_comment'></div>使民恃险而不恃法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374902_comment'></div>则划土者宜乎墙山堑河而自守矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374902_comment'></div>燕赵之盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374902_comment'></div>复何可多怪乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374902_comment'></div>书其西壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374902_comment'></div>俟得言者览焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1374902_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
澧县
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='6c840832230d44718ce82ebdca6ff8d0_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("6c840832230d44718ce82ebdca6ff8d0");'><span id='6c840832230d44718ce82ebdca6ff8d0_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=827&endYear=827')">827年</a>，25岁</div><div id='6c840832230d44718ce82ebdca6ff8d0' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>杜牧游涔阳。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在澧州。杜牧登澧州驿楼寄京兆韦尹。作品：《登澧州驿楼寄京兆韦尹》<span class='inlineComment2'>（吴在庆《杜牧集系年校注》，中华书局2008年版，第1263页疑为伪诗。）</span><div id='poem_32080' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32080' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/32080?labeling=true' target='_blank'>登澧州驿楼寄京兆韦尹<span class='inlineComment2'>（尹曾典此郡）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（827年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32080")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_32080_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32080'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32080'>一话涔阳旧使君，郡人回首望青云。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32080'>政声长与江声在，自到津楼日夜闻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32080'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_32080_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
松滋
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='7559016f8d584c65b0cd0fd4910aa3c4_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("7559016f8d584c65b0cd0fd4910aa3c4");'><span id='7559016f8d584c65b0cd0fd4910aa3c4_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=827&endYear=827')">827年</a>，25岁</div><div id='7559016f8d584c65b0cd0fd4910aa3c4' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=827&endYear=827')">827年</a>　路出荆州松滋县，摄令王淇为杜牧言窦桂娘事，杜牧作文记之。作品：《窦列女传》<div id='poem_1374933' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374933' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374933?labeling=true' target='_blank'>窦烈女传</a><span class='authorDate'>（827年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374933")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374933_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374933'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374933'>烈女姓窦氏。小字桂娘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374933_comment'></div>父良。建中初为汴州户曹掾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374933_comment'></div>桂娘美颜色。读书甚有文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374933_comment'></div>李希烈破汴州。使甲士至良门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374933_comment'></div>取桂娘以去。将出门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374933_comment'></div>顾其父曰。慎无戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374933_comment'></div>必能灭贼。使大人取富贵于天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374933_comment'></div>桂娘既以才色在希烈侧。复能巧曲取信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374933_comment'></div>凡希烈之密。虽妻子不知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374933_comment'></div>悉皆得闻。希烈归蔡州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374933_comment'></div>桂娘谓希烈曰忠而勇。一军莫如陈先奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374933_comment'></div>其妻窦氏。先奇宠且信之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374933_comment'></div>愿得相往来。以姊妹叙齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374933_comment'></div>因徐说之。使坚先奇之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374933_comment'></div>希烈然之。桂娘因以姊事先奇妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374933_comment'></div>尝间曰。为贼凶残不道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374933_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1374933", 1374933, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>迟晚</span>必败。姊宜早图遗种之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374933_comment'></div>先奇妻然之。兴元元年四月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374933_comment'></div>希烈暴死。其子不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1374933", 1374933, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>发丧</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374933_comment'></div>欲尽诛老将校。以卑少者代之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374933_comment'></div>计未决。有献含桃者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374933_comment'></div>桂娘白希烈子。请分遗先奇妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374933_comment'></div>且以示无事于外。因为蜡帛书曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374933_comment'></div>前日已死。殡在后堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374933_comment'></div>欲诛大臣。须自为计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374933_comment'></div>以朱染帛。丸如含桃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374933_comment'></div>先奇发丸见之。言于薛育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374933_comment'></div>育曰。两日希烈称疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374933_comment'></div>但怪乐曲杂发。昼夜不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374933_comment'></div>此乃有谋未定。示暇于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374933_comment'></div>事不疑矣。明日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374933_comment'></div>先奇薛育各以所部兵噪于牙门。请见希烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374933_comment'></div>希烈子迫出拜曰。愿去伪号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374933_comment'></div>一如李纳。先奇曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374933_comment'></div>尔父悖逆。天子有命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374933_comment'></div>因斩希烈及妻子。函匕首以献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374933_comment'></div>暴其尸于市。后两月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374933_comment'></div>吴少诚杀先奇。知桂娘谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374933_comment'></div>因亦杀之。请试论之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374933_comment'></div>希烈妇桂娘者。但劫之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374933_comment'></div>希烈僭而桂娘妃。复宠信之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374933_comment'></div>于女子心。始终希烈可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374933_comment'></div>此诚知所去所就。逆顺轻重之理明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374933_comment'></div>能得希烈。权也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374933_comment'></div>姊先奇妻。智也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374933_comment'></div>终能灭贼。不顾其私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374933_comment'></div>烈也。六尺男子有禄位者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374933_comment'></div>当希烈叛。与之上下者众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374933_comment'></div>岂才力不足耶。盖义理苟至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374933_comment'></div>虽一女子。可以有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374933_comment'></div>大和元年。予客游涔阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374933_comment'></div>路出荆州松滋县。摄令王淇为某言桂娘事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374933_comment'></div>淇年十一岁能念五经。举童子及第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374933_comment'></div>时年七十五。尚可日记千言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374933_comment'></div>当建中乱。希烈与李纳田悦朱泚朱滔等僭诏书檄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374933_comment'></div>争战胜败。地名人名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374933_comment'></div>悉能记之。听说如一日前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374933_comment'></div>言窦良出于王氏。实淇之堂姑子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374933_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_58_1374933_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
湖南
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='51165d83bee0472eb2dafeae1c84bb86_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("51165d83bee0472eb2dafeae1c84bb86");'><span id='51165d83bee0472eb2dafeae1c84bb86_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=827&endYear=827')">827年</a>，25岁</div><div id='51165d83bee0472eb2dafeae1c84bb86' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=827&endYear=827')">827年</a>　杜牧南游湖南，有诗酬友人。作品：《酬王秀才桃花园见寄》<span class='inlineComment2'>（今湖南桃源县有杜牧题壁诗，诗题与诗歌内容与此诗略有不同，诗题作《酬王秀才桃园见寄》，尾句作“晋人何因入洞来”；此条活动具体时间地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_32087' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32087' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/32087?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬王秀才桃花园见寄</a><span class='authorDate'>（827年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32087")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_32087_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_32087'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(733, "poem_allusion_32087")'>不知有汉</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_32087_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32087'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32087'>桃满西园淑景催，几多红艳浅深开。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32087'>此花不逐溪流出，晋客无因入洞来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32087'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_32087_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
洛阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='b61c1561abf54370807daadfbc07c83d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b61c1561abf54370807daadfbc07c83d");'><span id='b61c1561abf54370807daadfbc07c83d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=828&endYear=828')">828年</a>，26岁</div><div id='b61c1561abf54370807daadfbc07c83d' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>春，在洛阳。杜牧应进士举，以第五人及第，礼部侍郎崔郾主试。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>杜牧及第后，作诗寄友人。作品：《及第后寄长安友人》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此条活动具体时间不详，据诗歌“已将春色入关来”一句，推断为作于春日，姑系于此。吴在庆《杜牧集系年校注》，中华书局2008年版，将该诗题记为《及第后寄长安故人》，二者推断为同一诗作。）</span><div id='poem_31911' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_31911' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/31911?labeling=true' target='_blank'>及第后寄长安故人</a><span class='authorDate'>（828年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_31911")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_31911_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_31911'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_31911'>东都<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_31911", 31911, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>放榜</span>未花开，三十三人走马回。<div id='poem_sentence_0_31911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_31911'>秦地少年多酿<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作办）</span>酒，已<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作即）</span>将春色入关来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_31911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_31911'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_31911_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='43619f8b56c24505a0e29951394a6efa_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=836')">835-836年</a>，33-34岁</div><div id='43619f8b56c24505a0e29951394a6efa' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年7月</a>　秋七月，侍御史李甘因反对郑注、李训，被贬为封州司马，杜牧即移疾，分司东都。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年</a>　在洛阳，杜牧与李戡相识。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年</a>　在洛阳，杜牧在洛阳东城遇江西歌妓张好好，感旧伤怀，作诗一首。作品：《张好好诗》<div id='poem_32343' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32343' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/32343?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张好好诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（835年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32343")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_32343_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_32343'>牧太和三年，佐故吏部沈公江西幕。好好年十三，始以善歌来乐籍中。后一岁，公移镇宣城，复置好好于宣城籍中。后二岁，为沈著作述师以双鬟纳之。后二岁，于洛阳东城，重睹好好。感旧伤怀，故题诗赠之。</div><div id='poem_preface_32343_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_32343'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1349, "poem_allusion_32343")'>相如</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3295, "poem_allusion_32343")'>高阳徒</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(11003, "poem_allusion_32343")'>紫云车</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_32343_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32343'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32343'>君为豫章姝，十三才有馀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32343'>翠茁凤生尾，丹叶莲含跗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32343'>高阁倚天半，章江联碧虚。<div id='poem_sentence_2_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_32343'>此地试君唱，特使华筵铺。<div id='poem_sentence_3_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_32343'>主人<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作公）</span>顾四座，始讶来踟蹰。<div id='poem_sentence_4_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_32343'>吴娃起<span id='poem_sentence_8_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_32343'>众音不能逐，袅袅穿云衢。<div id='poem_sentence_9_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_32343'>主人<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作公）</span>再三叹，谓言天下殊。<div id='poem_sentence_10_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_32343'>霜凋谢楼树，沙暖句溪蒲。<div id='poem_sentence_17_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_32343'>身外任尘土，樽前极欢娱。<div id='poem_sentence_22_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_32343'>洛城重相见，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_32343", 32343, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>婥婥</span>为当垆。<div id='poem_sentence_23_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_32343'>怪我苦何事，少年垂白须。<div id='poem_sentence_24_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_32343'>朋游今在否，落拓更能无。<div id='poem_sentence_25_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_32343'>门馆恸哭后，水云秋景初。<div id='poem_sentence_26_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_32343'>斜日挂衰柳，凉风生座隅。<div id='poem_sentence_27_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_32343'>洒尽满襟泪，短歌聊一书。<div id='poem_sentence_28_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_32343'></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_32343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_32343'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(32343)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年</a>　在洛阳，杜牧为沈传师作行状一篇。作品：《唐故尚书吏部侍郎赠吏部尚书沈公行状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（约作于此年前后。）</span><div id='poem_1374931' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374931' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374931?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故尚书吏部侍郎赠吏部尚书沈公行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（835年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374931")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374931_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374931'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374931'>公曾祖某。皇任泉州司户参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374931_comment'></div>祖某。皇任婺州武义县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374931_comment'></div>赠屯田员外郎。父某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374931_comment'></div>皇任尚书礼部员外郎。赠太子少保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374931_comment'></div>公讳某字某。明春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374931_comment'></div>能文攻书。未冠知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374931_comment'></div>我烈祖司徒岐公与公先少保友善。一见公喜曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374931_comment'></div>沈氏有子。吾无恨矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374931_comment'></div>因以冯氏表甥女妻之。贞元末举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374931_comment'></div>时许公孟容为给事中。权文公为礼部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374931_comment'></div>时称权许。进士中否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374931_comment'></div>二公未尝不相闻于其间者。其年礼部毕事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374931_comment'></div>文公诣许曰。亦有遗恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374931_comment'></div>曰为谁。曰沈某一人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374931_comment'></div>许曰。谁家子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374931_comment'></div>某不之知。文公因具言先少保名字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374931_comment'></div>许曰。若如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374931_comment'></div>我故人子。后数日径诣公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374931_comment'></div>且责不相见。公谢曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374931_comment'></div>闻于丈人。或援致中第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374931_comment'></div>是累丈人公举矣。某孤进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374931_comment'></div>故不敢自达。许曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374931_comment'></div>如公者。可使我急贤诣公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374931_comment'></div>不可使公因旧造我。明年中第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374931_comment'></div>文公门生七十人。时人比公为颜子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374931_comment'></div>联中制策科。授太子校书鄠县尉直史馆左拾遗左补阙史馆修撰翰林学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374931_comment'></div>历尚书司门员外郎司勋兵部郎中中书舍人。命服朱紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374931_comment'></div>时穆宗皇帝亲任学士。时事机秘多考决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374931_comment'></div>在内必取其长。循为宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374931_comment'></div>公密补宏多。同列每欲面陈拜章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374931_comment'></div>互来告公。必取规议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374931_comment'></div>用为进退。岁久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374931_comment'></div>当为其长者凡再。公皆逡巡不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374931_comment'></div>上欲面授之。公奏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374931_comment'></div>学士院长参议大政。出为宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374931_comment'></div>臣自知必不能为。凡宰相之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374931_comment'></div>非能尽知天下物情。苟为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374931_comment'></div>必致败挠。况今百姓甚困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374931_comment'></div>燕赵适乱。臣以死不敢当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374931_comment'></div>愿得治人一方。为陛下长养之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374931_comment'></div>因出称疾。特降中使刘泰伦起之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374931_comment'></div>公称益笃。故相国李公德裕与公同列友善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374931_comment'></div>亦欲公之起。辞说甚切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374931_comment'></div>公终不出。因诏以本官兼史职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374931_comment'></div>出归纶阁。久处密近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374931_comment'></div>思效用于外。恳请于丞相不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374931_comment'></div>由是出为湖南观察使兼御史大夫。凡二岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374931_comment'></div>转为人困事繁。恶易滋长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374931_comment'></div>官人调授。少得防冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374931_comment'></div>疏通蹊径。人情物理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374931_comment'></div>无不曲尽。吏欲为欺于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374931_comment'></div>照验之端。必明于彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374931_comment'></div>民有未伸于彼。开张之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374931_comment'></div>必在于此。亹亹循环。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374931_comment'></div>皆极根本。尤重刑罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374931_comment'></div>杖十五至死者。每有一犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374931_comment'></div>必具狱断刑之后。遍示幕府吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374931_comment'></div>虽十人有一人以为小未可者。必再详究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374931_comment'></div>经费游宴。约事裁节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374931_comment'></div>岁有水旱。不可减于常贡者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374931_comment'></div>必为代之。江西宣州联岁水灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374931_comment'></div>所贷万计。公善养情性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374931_comment'></div>自居方伯生杀之任。喜怒好恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374931_comment'></div>是四者闭覆浑然。虽终岁伺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374931_comment'></div>不见毫发。故黠吏欲贼公之所向高下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374931_comment'></div>其事终不可得。每处一事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374931_comment'></div>未尝不从容尽理。故所至之处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374931_comment'></div>富庶欢康。理行第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374931_comment'></div>每去任。人吏泣送出境不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374931_comment'></div>自宣城入为吏部侍郎二年。考覈搜举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374931_comment'></div>品第伦比。时称精能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374931_comment'></div>宰物之望。属于佥议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374931_comment'></div>公每愿用所长。复理于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374931_comment'></div>及薨于位。知与不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374931_comment'></div>莫不相吊。上悼惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374931_comment'></div>辍朝一日。赠吏部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374931_comment'></div>公与先少保俱掌国史。撰宪宗实录未竟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374931_comment'></div>出镇河南。诏以随之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374931_comment'></div>成于理所。时论荣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374931_comment'></div>公生得灵粹。沛然而仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374931_comment'></div>自幼及长。未尝须臾间汲汲牵率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374931_comment'></div>欲及于道。温良恭俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374931_comment'></div>明智忠信。内积<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1374931", 1374931, "Clauses/165/Comments/0")'>外溢</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374931_comment'></div>自然相随。自布衣至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1374931", 1374931, "Clauses/167/Comments/0")'>达宦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374931_comment'></div>凡所交友。皆当时名公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374931_comment'></div>奖美所长。复救所不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374931_comment'></div>三十年间。无有携间者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374931_comment'></div>公常居中。虽有重名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374931_comment'></div>每苦于饥寒。两求廉镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374931_comment'></div>时宰许之。皆先要公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374931_comment'></div>欲用某为从事可乎。公必拒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374931_comment'></div>至有怒者。公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374931_comment'></div>诚如此。愿息所请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374931_comment'></div>故二镇幕府。皆取孤进之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374931_comment'></div>未尝有吏一人因权势入。尝择邸吏尹伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374931_comment'></div>戆滞阙事。寮佐皆患之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374931_comment'></div>因请易之。公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374931_comment'></div>某出京师。面诫伦曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374931_comment'></div>止可阙事。不可多事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1374931_comment'></div>是伦适能如此。受不虚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1374931_comment'></div>故二镇号为富饶。凡十年间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1374931_comment'></div>权势贵倖之风。不及于公耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1374931_comment'></div>苞苴宝玉之赂。亦不至于权门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1374931_comment'></div>虽有怒者。亦不敢以言议公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1374931_comment'></div>公然侵公。其为守道自得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1374931_comment'></div>皆如此类。在家无杖笞呵责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1374931_comment'></div>家人自化。兄弟甥侄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1374931_comment'></div>虽绝服者入门。饮食衣服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1374931_comment'></div>指使其奴婢无二等。亲戚故旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1374931_comment'></div>周给所得。皆出俸钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1374931_comment'></div>不以家为。于京师开化里致第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1374931_comment'></div>价钱三百万。讫二镇牵率满之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1374931_comment'></div>及在床之日。周身之饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1374931_comment'></div>易以任器。京师士人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1374931_comment'></div>杂然言议。以为非今日之有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1374931_comment'></div>指为异事。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1374931_comment'></div>公之德行。可以称古君子矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1374931_comment'></div>牧分实通家。义推先执。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1374931_comment'></div>复以孱昧。叨在宾席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1374931_comment'></div>幼熟懿行。长奉指教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1374931_comment'></div>泣涕撰记。以备遗阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1374931_comment'></div>以附于史氏云尔。谨状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1374931_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_122_1374931_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_31968'>华堂今日绮筵开，谁唤<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作召）</span>分司御史来。<div id='poem_sentence_0_31968_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_31968'>偶<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作忽）</span>发<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_31968", 31968, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>狂言</span>惊满坐，三重粉面<span class='inlineComment2'>（纪事作两行红粉）</span>一时回<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_31968_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_31968'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_31968_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_31968'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_31968_1'>⑴ 牧为御史，分务雒阳。时李司徒愿罢镇闲居，声伎豪侈，雒中名士咸谒之。李高会朝客，以杜持宪，不敢邀致，杜遣座客达意，愿与斯会，不得已邀之。杜独坐南向，瞪目注视，引满三卮，问李云：“闻有紫云者孰是？”李指之。杜凝睇良久曰：“名不虚传，宜以见惠。”李俯而笑。诸妓亦回首破颜。杜又自饮二爵，朗吟此诗而起，意气闲逸，旁若无人。杜不拘细行，故诗有“十年一觉扬州梦，赢得青楼薄倖名”</div></div></div><div -----title
宣州（宣城）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='84d5cfd69c884212a5fb8aac01dd9c4d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("84d5cfd69c884212a5fb8aac01dd9c4d");'><span id='84d5cfd69c884212a5fb8aac01dd9c4d_link' class='inlineComment2'>（此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1374740' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374740' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374740?labeling=true' target='_blank'>望故园赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（830年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374740")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374740_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374740'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374740'>余固秦人兮。故园秦地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374740_comment'></div>念归途之几里。䜣余心之未归兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374740_comment'></div>虽系日而安至。既操心之大谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374740_comment'></div>欲当时之奏技。技固薄兮岂易售。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374740_comment'></div>矧将来之岁几。人固有尚珠金印节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374740_comment'></div>人固有为背憎面悦。击短扶长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374740_comment'></div>曲邀横结。吐片言兮千口莫穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374740_comment'></div>触一机而百关俱发。嗟小人之颛蒙兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374740_comment'></div>尚何念于逸越。余之思归兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374740_comment'></div>走杜陵之西道。岩曲天深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374740_comment'></div>地平木老。陇云秦树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374740_comment'></div>风高霜早。周台汉园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374740_comment'></div>斜阳暮草。寂寥四望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374740_comment'></div>蜀峰联嶂。葱茏气佳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374740_comment'></div>蟠联地壮。缭粉堞于绮城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374740_comment'></div>矗未央于天上。月出东山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374740_comment'></div>苔扉向关。长烟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1374740", 1374740, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>苒惹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374740_comment'></div>寒水注湾。远林鸡犬兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374740_comment'></div>樵夫夕还。织有桑兮耕有土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374740_comment'></div>昆令季强兮乡党附。怅余心兮舍兹而何去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374740_comment'></div>忧岂无念。念至谓何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374740_comment'></div>愤愠悽悄。顾我则多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374740_comment'></div>万世在上兮百世居后。中有一生兮孰为寿夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374740_comment'></div>生既不足以纫佩兮。顾他务之纤小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374740_comment'></div>赋言归兮余之志。世徒为兮纷扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374740_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1374740_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='2dc1187855ca46eba991646dc2985038_label'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=831&endYear=831')">831年10月</a>　在宣州幕中。十月，杜牧为亡友李贺诗集作序。作品：《李贺集序》<div id='poem_1374896' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374896' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_1374896_comment'></div>舍外有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1374896", 1374896, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>疾呼</span>传缄书者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374896_comment'></div>某曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374896_comment'></div>必有异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374896_comment'></div>亟取火来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374896_comment'></div>及发之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374896_comment'></div>果集贤学士沈公子明书一通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374896_comment'></div>曰吾亡友李贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374896_comment'></div>元和中义爱甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374896_comment'></div>日夕相与起居饮食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374896_comment'></div>贺且死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374896_comment'></div>尝授我生平所著歌诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374896_comment'></div>杂为四编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374896_comment'></div>凡若干首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374896_comment'></div>数年来东西南北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374896_comment'></div>良为已失去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374896_comment'></div>今夕醉解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374896_comment'></div>不复得寐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374896_comment'></div>即阅理箧帙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374896_comment'></div>忽得贺诗前所授我者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374896_comment'></div>思理往事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374896_comment'></div>凡与贺话言嬉游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374896_comment'></div>一处所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374896_comment'></div>一物候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374896_comment'></div>一日夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374896_comment'></div>一觞一饭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374896_comment'></div>显显焉无有忘弃者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374896_comment'></div>不觉出涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374896_comment'></div>贺复无家室子弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374896_comment'></div>得以给养恤问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374896_comment'></div>常恨想其人咏其言止矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374896_comment'></div>子厚于我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374896_comment'></div>与我为贺集序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374896_comment'></div>尽道其所由来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374896_comment'></div>亦少解我意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374896_comment'></div>某其夕不果以书道其不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374896_comment'></div>明日就公谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374896_comment'></div>且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374896_comment'></div>世谓贺才绝出于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374896_comment'></div>让居数日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374896_comment'></div>某深惟公曰公于诗为深妙奇博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374896_comment'></div>且复尽知贺之得失短长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374896_comment'></div>今实叙贺不让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374896_comment'></div>必不能当公意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374896_comment'></div>如何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374896_comment'></div>复就谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374896_comment'></div>极道所不敢叙贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374896_comment'></div>公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374896_comment'></div>子固若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374896_comment'></div>是当慢我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374896_comment'></div>某因不敢复辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374896_comment'></div>勉为贺序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374896_comment'></div>终甚惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374896_comment'></div>贺唐皇诸孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374896_comment'></div>字长吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374896_comment'></div>元和中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374896_comment'></div>韩吏部亦颇道其歌诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374896_comment'></div>云烟绵联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374896_comment'></div>不足为其态也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374896_comment'></div>水之迢迢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374896_comment'></div>不足为其情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374896_comment'></div>春之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1374896", 1374896, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>盎盎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374896_comment'></div>不足为其和也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374896_comment'></div>秋之明洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374896_comment'></div>不足为其格也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374896_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1374896", 1374896, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>风樯阵马</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374896_comment'></div>不足为其勇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374896_comment'></div>瓦棺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1374896", 1374896, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>篆鼎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374896_comment'></div>不足为其古也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374896_comment'></div>时花美女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374896_comment'></div>不足为其色也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374896_comment'></div>荒国陊殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374896_comment'></div>梗莽邱垄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374896_comment'></div>不足为其恨怨悲愁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374896_comment'></div>鲸呿鳌掷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374896_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1374896", 1374896, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>诞幻</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374896_comment'></div>盖骚之苗裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374896_comment'></div>理虽不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374896_comment'></div>辞或过之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374896_comment'></div>骚有感怨刺怼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374896_comment'></div>言及君臣理乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374896_comment'></div>时有以激发人意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374896_comment'></div>乃贺所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374896_comment'></div>无得有是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374896_comment'></div>贺复能探寻前事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374896_comment'></div>所以深叹恨古今未尝经道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374896_comment'></div>如金铜仙人辞汉歌补梁庾肩吾宫体谣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374896_comment'></div>求取情状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374896_comment'></div>离绝远去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374896_comment'></div>笔墨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1374896", 1374896, ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=837&endYear=837')">837年9月</a>　秋末，杜牧应宣歙观察使崔郸之辟，为团练判官、殿中侍御史内供奉，携弟杜顗同往宣州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=837&endYear=837')">837年</a>　崔郾卒，杜牧为其作行状文一篇。作品：《唐故银青光禄大夫检校礼部尚书御史大夫充浙江西道都团练观察处置等使上柱国清河郡开国公食邑二千户赠吏部尚书崔公行状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（崔郾，字广略，进士及第，累官吏部郎中、谏议大夫、给事中、中书舍人，开成二年卒。大和二年为礼部侍郎主持科举考试，杜牧即于是年进士及第，为崔郾门生。崔郸为崔郾之弟，该文疑为其在宣州时邀杜牧所作。此条活动具体时间不详，姑系于此；约作于此年。）</span><div id='poem_1374930' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374930' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374930?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故银青光禄大夫检校礼部尚书御史大夫充浙江西道都团练观察处置等使上柱国清河郡开国公食邑二千户赠吏部尚书崔公行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374930")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374930_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374930'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374930'>公曾祖综。皇任醴泉县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374930_comment'></div>祖佶。皇任太子中允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374930_comment'></div>赠右散骑常侍。父陲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374930_comment'></div>皇任检校吏部郎中兼御史中丞袁州刺史。赠太师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374930_comment'></div>公讳郾。字广略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374930_comment'></div>威仪秀伟。神气深厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374930_comment'></div>即之如鉴。望之如春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374930_comment'></div>既冠。识者知不容于风尘矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374930_comment'></div>贞元十二年中第。十六年平判入等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374930_comment'></div>授集贤殿校书郎。陜虢观察使崔公琮愿公为宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374930_comment'></div>而不乐之。挈辞载币。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374930_comment'></div>使者数返。公徐为起之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374930_comment'></div>且曰。不关上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374930_comment'></div>摄职可也。受署为观察巡官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374930_comment'></div>后转京兆府鄠县尉。迁监察御史殿中侍御史刑部员外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374930_comment'></div>丁邠国太夫人忧。杖而能起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374930_comment'></div>人有闻焉。外除拜吏部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374930_comment'></div>判南曹事。千人百族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374930_comment'></div>必应进而进。公亲自挟格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374930_comment'></div>肖法必留。戾程必黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374930_comment'></div>每悬榜举牍。富室权家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374930_comment'></div>汗而仰视。不敢出口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374930_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1374930", 1374930, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>宿吏</span>逡巡。缚手系舌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374930_comment'></div>愿措一奸。不能得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374930_comment'></div>凡二年。迁左司郎中吏部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374930_comment'></div>加朝散大夫。旋拜谏议大夫兼知匦使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374930_comment'></div>穆宗皇帝春秋富盛。稍以畋游声色为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374930_comment'></div>公晨朝正殿。挥同列进而言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374930_comment'></div>十一圣之功德。四海之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374930_comment'></div>万国之众。之治之乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374930_comment'></div>悬于陛下。自山以东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374930_comment'></div>百城千里。昨日得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374930_comment'></div>今日失之。西望戎垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374930_comment'></div>距宗庙十舍。百姓憔悴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374930_comment'></div>蓄积无有。愿陛下稍亲政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374930_comment'></div>天下幸甚。诚至气直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374930_comment'></div>天子为之动容敛袖。慰而谢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374930_comment'></div>迁给事中。敬宗皇帝始即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374930_comment'></div>旁求师臣。今相国奇章公上言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374930_comment'></div>非公不可。遂以本官充翰林侍讲学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374930_comment'></div>命服金紫。旋拜中书舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374930_comment'></div>仍兼旧职。侍帝郊天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374930_comment'></div>加银青光禄大夫。高承简罢郑滑节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374930_comment'></div>滑人叩阙。乞为承简树德政碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374930_comment'></div>内官进曰。翰林故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374930_comment'></div>职由掌诏学士。上曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374930_comment'></div>承简功臣允也。治吾咽喉地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374930_comment'></div>克有善政。罢而请纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374930_comment'></div>入人深矣。吾以师臣之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374930_comment'></div>且宠异焉。居数月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374930_comment'></div>魏博节度使史宪诚拜章为故帅田季安树神道碑。内官执请亦如前辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374930_comment'></div>上曰。魏北燕赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374930_comment'></div>南控成皋。天下形胜地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374930_comment'></div>吾以师臣之辞。且慰安焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374930_comment'></div>居数月。陈许节度使王沛拜章乞为亡父树神道碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374930_comment'></div>内官执请亦如前辞。上曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374930_comment'></div>许昌天下精兵处也。俗忠风厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374930_comment'></div>沛能抚之。吾视如臂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374930_comment'></div>吾以师臣之辞。而彰其忠孝焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374930_comment'></div>是三者皆御札命公。令刻其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374930_comment'></div>恩礼亲重。无与为比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374930_comment'></div>历岁。愿出守本官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374930_comment'></div>辞恳而礼部缺侍郎。上曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374930_comment'></div>公可也。遂以命之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374930_comment'></div>二年选士七十馀人。大扺后浮华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374930_comment'></div>先材实。转兵部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374930_comment'></div>今上即位四年。公亟请于丞相閤曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374930_comment'></div>愿得一方疲人而治之。除陜虢观察使兼御史大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374930_comment'></div>先是陜之官人。人必月尅俸钱五千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374930_comment'></div>助输贡于京师者。岁至八十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374930_comment'></div>公曰。官人不能赡私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374930_comment'></div>安能恤民。吾不能独治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374930_comment'></div>安可自封。即以常给廉使杂费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374930_comment'></div>下至于盐酪膏薪之品。十去其九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374930_comment'></div>可得八十万。岁为代之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374930_comment'></div>官人感悦。随治短长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374930_comment'></div>不忍为欺。万国西走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374930_comment'></div>陜实其冲。复有江淮梁徐许蔡之戍兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374930_comment'></div>北出朔方上郡回中陇间。践更往来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374930_comment'></div>不虚一时。民之供亿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374930_comment'></div>吏须必应。生活之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374930_comment'></div>至于瓶缶匕匙。常碎于四方之手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374930_comment'></div>公曰。此犹束炬以焚民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374930_comment'></div>于是节宴赏。截浮费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374930_comment'></div>凡金漆陶木丝枲之用。悉为具之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374930_comment'></div>可飨数千人。民一不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374930_comment'></div>复有诏旨支税粟输大仓者。岁数万斛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374930_comment'></div>始敛民也。远远近近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374930_comment'></div>就积佛寺。终输于河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374930_comment'></div>复籍民而载之。民之巨牛大车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374930_comment'></div>半顿于路。前政咸知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374930_comment'></div>计不能出。公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374930_comment'></div>管仲曰。粟行五百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374930_comment'></div>民有饥色。斯言粟重物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374930_comment'></div>不可推迁。民受其毙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374930_comment'></div>况今迂直之计。有不翅习试五百里乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374930_comment'></div>公乃大索有无。亲执筹而计之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374930_comment'></div>北临黄河。树仓四十间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374930_comment'></div>穴仓为漕。下注于舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1374930_comment'></div>因隙赏直。不败时务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1374930_comment'></div>自此壮者斛。幼者斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1374930_comment'></div>负挈橐裹。委仓而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1374930_comment'></div>不知有输。他境之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1374930_comment'></div>越逸奔走。軿轸争斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1374930_comment'></div>愿为陜民。政成化行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1374930_comment'></div>上国下国。更口赞颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1374930_comment'></div>凡二年。改岳鄂安黄蕲申等州观察使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1374930_comment'></div>囊山带江。三十馀城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1374930_comment'></div>缭绕数千里。洞庭百越巴蜀荆汉而会注焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1374930_comment'></div>五十馀年。北有蔡盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1374930_comment'></div>于是安锁三关。鄂练万卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1374930_comment'></div>皆伧楚善战。寖有战风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1374930_comment'></div>称为难治。有自来矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1374930_comment'></div>公始临之。简服伍旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1374930_comment'></div>修理械用。亲之以文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1374930_comment'></div>齐之以武。大创厅事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1374930_comment'></div>以张威容。造蒙冲小舰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1374930_comment'></div>上下千里。武士用命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1374930_comment'></div>尽得群盗。公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1374930_comment'></div>劫于水者。以尽杀为习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1374930_comment'></div>虽值童耇。而无舍焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1374930_comment'></div>比附他盗。刑不可等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1374930_comment'></div>于是一死之内。必累加之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1374930_comment'></div>盗相诫曰。公之未去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1374930_comment'></div>勿触其境。然后黜弃奸冒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1374930_comment'></div>用公法也。升陟廉能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1374930_comment'></div>用公举也。抚护穷约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1374930_comment'></div>用公惠也。豪商大贾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1374930_comment'></div>不得轻役。不得隐田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1374930_comment'></div>父子兄弟。不得同贩于阖境之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1374930_comment'></div>有馀不足。自公而均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1374930_comment'></div>复建立儒宫。置博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1374930_comment'></div>设生徒。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_132_1374930", 1374930, "Clauses/265/Comments/0")'>廪饩</span>必具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1374930_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_133_1374930", 1374930, "Clauses/266/Comments/0")'>顽惰</span>必迁。敬让之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1374930_comment'></div>人知家习。八年秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1374930_comment'></div>江水涨溢。公曰安得长堤而御之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1374930_comment'></div>言讫。军士齐民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1374930_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_137_1374930", 1374930, "Clauses/274/Comments/0")'>云锸雨杵</span>。一挥立就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1374930_comment'></div>令行恩结。有如此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1374930_comment'></div>千里之内。如视堂庑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1374930_comment'></div>虽僻左下里。岁腊男子必以鸡黍贺馈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1374930_comment'></div>女子能以簪瑱相问遗。富乐欢康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1374930_comment'></div>肩于治古。凡五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1374930_comment'></div>迁浙江观察使。加礼部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1374930_comment'></div>公曰。三吴者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1374930_comment'></div>国用半在焉。因高为旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1374930_comment'></div>因下为水者六岁矣。轻赋兵役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1374930_comment'></div>不减于民。上田沃土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1374930_comment'></div>多归豪强。荀悦所谓公家之惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1374930_comment'></div>优于三代。豪强之酷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1374930_comment'></div>甚于亡秦。今其是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1374930_comment'></div>于是料民等第。籍地沃瘠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1374930_comment'></div>均其征赋。一其徭役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1374930_comment'></div>经费宴赏。约事裁节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1374930_comment'></div>民有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_154_1374930", 1374930, "Clauses/308/Comments/0")'>宿逋</span>不可减于上供者。必代而输之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1374930_comment'></div>诚祷山川。岁获大稔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1374930_comment'></div>复曰。衣冠者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1374930_comment'></div>民之主也。自艰难已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1374930_comment'></div>军士得以气加之。商贾得以财侮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1374930_comment'></div>不能自奋者。多栖于吴土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1374930_comment'></div>遂立延宾馆以待之。苟有一善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1374930_comment'></div>必接尽礼。因访里闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1374930_comment'></div>益知民之疾苦。随以治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1374930_comment'></div>才逾期岁。而吴民复振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1374930_comment'></div>开成元年十月二十日。薨于治所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1374930_comment'></div>多士相吊曰。使公相天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1374930_comment'></div>贞观开元之俗。可期而见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1374930_comment'></div>岂公不幸。实生民之不幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1374930_comment'></div>主上<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_168_1374930", 1374930, "Clauses/336/Comments/0")'>痛悼</span>。辍朝一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1374930_comment'></div>赠吏部尚书。公生得灵和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1374930_comment'></div>自干名立朝。为公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1374930_comment'></div>为侯伯。未尝须臾间汲汲牵率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1374930_comment'></div>欲显名于合道。而仁义忠信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1374930_comment'></div>明智恭俭。郁积发溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1374930_comment'></div>自然相随。不立约结而善人自亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1374930_comment'></div>不设沟垒而不肖自远。不志于荣达而官位自及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1374930_comment'></div>公内外阀阅。源派清显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1374930_comment'></div>拔于甲族。而复甲焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1374930_comment'></div>亲昆仲六人。皆至达官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1374930_comment'></div>公与伯兄季弟。五司礼闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1374930_comment'></div>再入吏部。自国朝已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1374930_comment'></div>未之有也。上至公相方伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1374930_comment'></div>下及再命一命。幕府陪吏之属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1374930_comment'></div>遍满内外。皆公门生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1374930_comment'></div>公俯首益恭。如孤臣客卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1374930_comment'></div>惕惕而多畏也。自为重镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1374930_comment'></div>苞苴金币之货。不至权门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1374930_comment'></div>亲戚故旧。周给衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1374930_comment'></div>毕其婚丧。悉出俸钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1374930_comment'></div>不以家为。在家怡然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1374930_comment'></div>未尝训勉。子弟自化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1374930_comment'></div>皆为名人。居室卑庳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1374930_comment'></div>不设步廊。宾至值雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1374930_comment'></div>则张盖蹑屐而就于外位。初镇于陜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1374930_comment'></div>或束挺经月。不鞭一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1374930_comment'></div>至于驿马令五岁幸全。则为代之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1374930_comment'></div>著为定制。曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1374930_comment'></div>致一物于必穷之地。君子不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1374930_comment'></div>其为仁爱而臻于此。及迁镇鄂渚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1374930_comment'></div>严峻刑法。至于诛罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1374930_comment'></div>未尝贳一等后一刻。或问于公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1374930_comment'></div>陜鄂之政不一。俱臻于治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1374930_comment'></div>何也。公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1374930_comment'></div>陜之土塉民劳。吾抚之不暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1374930_comment'></div>尚恐其惊。鄂之土沃民剽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1374930_comment'></div>杂以夷俗。非用威刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1374930_comment'></div>莫能致理。政贵知变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1374930_comment'></div>盖为此也。闻者服焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1374930_comment'></div>呜呼。公之德行材器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1374930_comment'></div>真哲人君子。没而不朽者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1374930_comment'></div>易名定谥。为国常典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1374930_comment'></div>敢书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_211_1374930", 1374930, "Clauses/422/Comments/0")'>先烈</span>。达于执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1374930_comment'></div>附于史氏云尔。谨状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1374930_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_213_1374930_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_4_32340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_32340'>画堂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_32340", 32340, -----title
扬州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='174061be5951477e8f527dd6dd8c6983_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("174061be5951477e8f527dd6dd8c6983");'><span id='174061be5951477e8f527dd6dd8c6983_link'
