ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=833')">833年</a>　春，杜牧奉沈传师命至扬州聘淮南节度使牛僧孺。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='e90ff7b1951746fa8024d403ecc9539d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e90ff7b1951746fa8024d403ecc9539d");'><span id='e90ff7b1951746fa8024d403ecc9539d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=834')">833-834年</a>，31-32岁</div><div id='e90ff7b1951746fa8024d403ecc9539d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=833')">833年4月</a>　四月，沈传师内召为吏部侍郎。杜牧应牛僧孺之辟，赴扬州，为淮南节度推官、监察御史里行，转掌书记。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=833')">833年</a>　在扬州，杜牧作文一篇论兵法。作品：《战论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此；此诗约作于833前后。）</span>《守论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此；此诗约作于833前后。）</span><div id='poem_1374906' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374906' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374906?labeling=true' target='_blank'>战论</a><span class='authorDate'>（833年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374906")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374906_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1374906'>兵非危也。谷非殚也。而战必挫北。是曰不循其道也。故作战论焉。</div><div id='poem_preface_1374906_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374906'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374906'>论曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374906_comment'></div>河北视天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374906_comment'></div>犹珠玑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374906_comment'></div>天下视河北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374906_comment'></div>犹四支也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374906_comment'></div>珠玑苟无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374906_comment'></div>岂不活身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374906_comment'></div>四支苟去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374906_comment'></div>吾不知其为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374906_comment'></div>何以言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374906_comment'></div>夫河北者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374906_comment'></div>俗俭风浑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374906_comment'></div>淫巧不生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374906_comment'></div>朴毅坚强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374906_comment'></div>果于战耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374906_comment'></div>名城坚垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374906_comment'></div>峉嶭相贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374906_comment'></div>高山大河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374906_comment'></div>盘互<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1374906", 1374906, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>交锁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374906_comment'></div>加以土息健马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374906_comment'></div>便于驰敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374906_comment'></div>是以出则胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374906_comment'></div>处则饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374906_comment'></div>不窥天下之产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374906_comment'></div>自可封殖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374906_comment'></div>亦犹大农之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374906_comment'></div>不待珠玑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374906_comment'></div>然后以为富也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374906_comment'></div>天下无河北则不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374906_comment'></div>河北既虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374906_comment'></div>则精甲锐卒利刀良弓健马无有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374906_comment'></div>卒然夷狄惊四边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374906_comment'></div>摩封疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374906_comment'></div>出表里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374906_comment'></div>吾何以御之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374906_comment'></div>是天下一支兵去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374906_comment'></div>河东盟津滑台大梁彭城东平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374906_comment'></div>尽宿厚兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374906_comment'></div>以塞虏冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374906_comment'></div>是六郡之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374906_comment'></div>严饬护疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374906_comment'></div>不可他使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374906_comment'></div>是天下二支兵去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374906_comment'></div>六郡之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374906_comment'></div>厥数三亿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374906_comment'></div>低首仰给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374906_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1374906", 1374906, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>横拱</span>不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374906_comment'></div>则沿淮已北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374906_comment'></div>循河之南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374906_comment'></div>东尽海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374906_comment'></div>西叩洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374906_comment'></div>经数千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374906_comment'></div>赤地尽取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374906_comment'></div>才能应费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374906_comment'></div>是天下三支财去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374906_comment'></div>咸阳西北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374906_comment'></div>戎夷大屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374906_comment'></div>吓呼膻臊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374906_comment'></div>彻于帝居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374906_comment'></div>周秦单师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374906_comment'></div>不能排辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374906_comment'></div>于是尽铲吴越荆楚之饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374906_comment'></div>以啖戍兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374906_comment'></div>是天下四支财去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374906_comment'></div>乃使吾用度不周。<div id='poem_sentence_66_1374906_comment'></div>无以接四夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374906_comment'></div>礼乐刑政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374906_comment'></div>不暇修治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374906_comment'></div>其自以能久为安乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374906_comment'></div>今者诚能治其五败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374906_comment'></div>则一战可定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374906_comment'></div>四支可生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374906_comment'></div>夫天下无事之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374906_comment'></div>殿閤大臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374906_comment'></div>偷处荣逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374906_comment'></div>为家治具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374906_comment'></div>战士离落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374906_comment'></div>兵甲钝弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374906_comment'></div>车马<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1374906", 1374906, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>刓弱</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374906_comment'></div>而未尝为之简帖整饬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374906_comment'></div>天下杂然盗发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374906_comment'></div>则疾驱疾战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374906_comment'></div>此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1374906", 1374906, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>宿败</span>之师也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374906_comment'></div>何为而不北乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374906_comment'></div>是不蒐练之过者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374906_comment'></div>其败一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374906_comment'></div>夫百人荷戈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374906_comment'></div>仰食县官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374906_comment'></div>则挟千夫之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374906_comment'></div>大将小裨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374906_comment'></div>操其馀赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374906_comment'></div>以虏壮为幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1374906_comment'></div>以师老为娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1374906_comment'></div>是执兵者常少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1374906_comment'></div>糜食者常多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1374906_comment'></div>筑垒未乾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1374906_comment'></div>公囊已虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1374906_comment'></div>此不责实科食之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1374906_comment'></div>其败二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1374906_comment'></div>夫战辄小胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1374906_comment'></div>则张皇其功。<div id='poem_sentence_113_1374906_comment'></div>爵命极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1374906_comment'></div>田宅广矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1374906_comment'></div>金缯溢矣。<div id='poem_sentence_118_1374906_comment'></div>此赏厚之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1374906_comment'></div>其败三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1374906_comment'></div>夫多丧兵士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1374906_comment'></div>颠翻大都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1374906_comment'></div>则跳身而来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1374906_comment'></div>刺邦而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1374906_comment'></div>回视刀锯菜色甚安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1374906_comment'></div>一岁未更。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1374906_comment'></div>旋已立于坛墀之上矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1374906_comment'></div>此轻罚之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1374906_comment'></div>其败四也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1374906_comment'></div>夫大将将兵柄不得专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1374906_comment'></div>恩臣诘责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1374906_comment'></div>第来挥之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1374906_comment'></div>至如堂然将阵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1374906_comment'></div>殷然将鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1374906_comment'></div>一则曰必为偃月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1374906_comment'></div>一则曰必为鱼丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1374906_comment'></div>三军万夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1374906_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_138_1374906", 1374906, "Clauses/138/Comments/0")'>环旋</span>翔佯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1374906_comment'></div>愰骇之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1374906_comment'></div>虏骑乘之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1374906_comment'></div>遂取吾之鼓旗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1374906_comment'></div>此不专任责成之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1374906_comment'></div>其败五也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1374906_comment'></div>元和时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1374906_comment'></div>天子急太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1374906_comment'></div>严约以律下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1374906_comment'></div>常团兵数十万以诛蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1374906_comment'></div>天下乾耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1374906_comment'></div>四岁然后能取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1374906_comment'></div>此盖五败不去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1374906_comment'></div>长庆初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1374906_comment'></div>盗据子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1374906_comment'></div>悉来走命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1374906_comment'></div>是内地无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1374906_comment'></div>天子宽禁厚恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1374906_comment'></div>与人休息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1374906_comment'></div>未几而燕赵甚乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1374906_comment'></div>引师起将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1374906_comment'></div>五败益甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1374906_comment'></div>登坛注意之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1374906_comment'></div>死窜且不暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1374906_comment'></div>复焉能加威于反虏哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1374906_comment'></div>今者诚欲调持干戈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1374906_comment'></div>洒扫垢污。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1374906_comment'></div>以为万世安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1374906_comment'></div>而乃踵前非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1374906_comment'></div>是不可为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1374906_comment'></div>古之政有不善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1374906_comment'></div>士传言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1374906_comment'></div>庶人谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1374906_comment'></div>发是论者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1374906_comment'></div>亦且将书于谤木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1374906_comment'></div>传于士大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1374906_comment'></div>非偶言而巳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_174_1374906_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1374907' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374907' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374907?labeling=true' target='_blank'>守论</a><span class='authorDate'>（833年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374907")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374907_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1374907'>往年两河盗起。屠囚大臣。劫戮二千石。国家不议诛洗。束兵自守。反修大历贞元故事。而行始息之政。是使逆辈益横。终倡患祸。故作守论焉。</div><div id='poem_preface_1374907_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374907'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374907'>论曰。厥今天下何如哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374907_comment'></div>干戈朽。鈇钺钝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374907_comment'></div>含宏混贷。煦育逆孽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374907_comment'></div>殆为故常。而执事大人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374907_comment'></div>曾不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1374907", 1374907, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>历算</span>周思。以为宿谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374907_comment'></div>方且嵬岸抑扬。自以为广大繁昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374907_comment'></div>莫已若也。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374907_comment'></div>其不知乎。其俟蹇顿颠倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374907_comment'></div>而后为之支计乎。且天下几里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374907_comment'></div>列郡几所。而自河以北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374907_comment'></div>蟠城数百。金坚蔓织。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374907_comment'></div>角奔为寇。伺吾人之憔悴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374907_comment'></div>天时之不利。则将与其朋伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374907_comment'></div>罗络郡国。将骇乱吾民于掌股之上耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374907_comment'></div>今者及吾之壮。不图擒取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374907_comment'></div>而乃偷处恬逸。第第相付。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374907_comment'></div>以为后世子孙背胁疽根。此复何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374907_comment'></div>今之议者咸曰。夫倔强之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374907_comment'></div>吾以良将劲兵以为衔策。高位美爵充饱其肠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374907_comment'></div>安而不挠。外而不拘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374907_comment'></div>亦犹豢扰虎狼而不拂其心。则忿气不萌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374907_comment'></div>此大历贞元所以守邦也。亦何必疾战焚煎吾民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374907_comment'></div>然后以为快也。愚曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374907_comment'></div>大历贞元之间。适以此为祸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374907_comment'></div>当是之时。有城数十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374907_comment'></div>千百卒夫。则朝廷待之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374907_comment'></div>贷以法故。于是乎阔视大言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374907_comment'></div>自树一家。破制削法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374907_comment'></div>角为尊奢。天子养威而不问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374907_comment'></div>有司守恬而不呵。王侯通爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374907_comment'></div>越录受之。觐聘不来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374907_comment'></div>凡杖扶之。逆息虏允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374907_comment'></div>皇子嫔之。装缘采饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374907_comment'></div>无不备之。是以地益广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374907_comment'></div>兵益强。僭拟益甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374907_comment'></div>侈心益昌。于是土田名器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374907_comment'></div>分划殆尽。而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1374907", 1374907, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>贼夫</span>贪心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374907_comment'></div>未及畔岸。遂有淫名<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1374907", 1374907, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>越号</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374907_comment'></div>或帝或王。盟诅自立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374907_comment'></div>恬淡不畏。走兵四略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374907_comment'></div>以饱其志者也。是以赵魏燕齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374907_comment'></div>卓起大倡。梁蔡吴蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374907_comment'></div>蹑而和之。其馀混澒轩嚣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374907_comment'></div>欲相效者。往往而是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374907_comment'></div>运遭孝武。宵旰不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374907_comment'></div>前英后杰。夕思朝议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374907_comment'></div>故能大者诛锄。小者惠来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374907_comment'></div>不然。周秦之郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374907_comment'></div>几为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1374907", 1374907, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>犯猎</span>哉。大抵生人油然多欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374907_comment'></div>欲而不得则怒。怒则争乱随之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374907_comment'></div>是以教笞于家。刑罚于国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374907_comment'></div>征伐于天下。此所以裁其欲而塞其争也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374907_comment'></div>大历贞元之閒。尽反此道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374907_comment'></div>提区区之有。而塞无涯之争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374907_comment'></div>是以首尾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1374907", 1374907, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>指支</span>。几不能相运掉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374907_comment'></div>今者不知非此。而反用以为经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374907_comment'></div>愚见为盗者非止于河北而已。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374907_comment'></div>大历贞元守邦之术。永戒之哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374907_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_58_1374907_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年10月</a>　在扬州，在淮南幕中。杜牧作文一篇。作品：《淮南监军使院厅壁记》<div id='poem_1374903' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374903' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374903?labeling=true' target='_blank'>淮南监军使院厅壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（834年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374903")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374903_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374903'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374903'>淮南军西蔽蔡壁寿春。有团练使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374903_comment'></div>北蔽齐壁山阳。有团练使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374903_comment'></div>节度使为军三万五千人。居中统制二处一千里三十八城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374903_comment'></div>护天下饷道。为诸道府军事最重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374903_comment'></div>然倚海堑江淮。深津横冈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374903_comment'></div>备守坚险。自艰难已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374903_comment'></div>未尝受兵。故命节度使皆以道德儒学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374903_comment'></div>来罢宰相。去登宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374903_comment'></div>命监军使皆以贤良勤劳内外有功。来自禁军中尉枢密使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374903_comment'></div>去为禁军中尉枢密使。自贞元元和已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374903_comment'></div>大抵多如此。今上即位六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374903_comment'></div>命内侍宋公出监淮南。诸开府将军皆以内侍贤良有材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374903_comment'></div>不宜使居外。上以为内侍自元和已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374903_comment'></div>诛齐诛蔡。再伐赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374903_comment'></div>前年诛沧。旁击赵魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374903_comment'></div>且徵师。且抚师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374903_comment'></div>且诰且谕。勤劳危险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374903_comment'></div>终日马上。往监青州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374903_comment'></div>新附。卧未尝安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374903_comment'></div>复监滑州。边魏穷狭多事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374903_comment'></div>今监淮南。是且使之休息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374903_comment'></div>亦不久之。故内侍至焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374903_comment'></div>监军四年。如始至日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374903_comment'></div>简约宽泰。明白清净。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374903_comment'></div>恕惜军吏。礼爱宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374903_comment'></div>举止作动。无非典故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374903_comment'></div>暇日唯召儒生讲书道士治药而巳。内侍旧部将校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374903_comment'></div>多禁兵子弟。京师少侠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374903_comment'></div>出入闾里间。俛首唯唯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374903_comment'></div>受吏约束。故上至相国奇章公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374903_comment'></div>下至于百姓。无不道说内侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374903_comment'></div>称为贤人。此不虚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374903_comment'></div>宜其侍卫六朝。声光富贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374903_comment'></div>某谬为相国奇章公幕府掌书记。奉内侍命为厅壁记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374903_comment'></div>某再谢不才不足记序。内侍曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374903_comment'></div>掌书记为监军使厅壁记。宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374903_comment'></div>某惭惶而书。时太和八年十月二十一日记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374903_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1374903_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='5f30e1000d2e423c8fccd1fbc9e897ff_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5f30e1000d2e423c8fccd1fbc9e897ff");'><span id='5f30e1000d2e423c8fccd1fbc9e897ff_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=835')">834-835年</a>，32-33岁</div><div id='5f30e1000d2e423c8fccd1fbc9e897ff' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年</a>　在扬州，淮南幕中。杜牧愤河北三镇之桀骜，而朝廷专事姑息，乃作文陈述削平河北三镇之策略。作品：《罪言》<div id='poem_1374912' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374912' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374912?labeling=true' target='_blank'>罪言</a><span class='authorDate'>（834年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374912")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374912_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374912'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374912'>国家大事。牧不当言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374912_comment'></div>言之实有罪。故作罪言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374912_comment'></div>生人常病兵。兵祖于山东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374912_comment'></div>允于天下。不得山东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374912_comment'></div>兵不可死。山东之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374912_comment'></div>禹画九土。一曰冀州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374912_comment'></div>舜以其分野太大。离为幽州为并州程其水土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374912_comment'></div>与河南等。常重十一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374912_comment'></div>故其人沉鸷多材力。重<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1374912", 1374912, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>许可</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374912_comment'></div>能辛苦。自魏晋已下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374912_comment'></div>衍浮羡淫。工机纤杂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374912_comment'></div>意态百出。俗益卑蔽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374912_comment'></div>人益<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1374912", 1374912, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>脆弱</span>。唯山东敦五种本兵矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374912_comment'></div>他不能荡而自若也。复产<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1374912", 1374912, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>健马</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374912_comment'></div>下者日驰二百里。所以兵常当天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374912_comment'></div>冀州以其恃强不循理。冀其必破弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374912_comment'></div>虽已破弱。冀其复强大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374912_comment'></div>并州力足以并吞也。幽州幽阴惨杀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374912_comment'></div>故圣人因其风俗。以为之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374912_comment'></div>黄帝时。蚩尤为兵阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374912_comment'></div>自后帝王多居其地。岂尚其俗都之邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374912_comment'></div>自周劣。齐霸不一世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374912_comment'></div>晋文常佣役诸侯。至秦萃锐三晋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374912_comment'></div>经六世乃能得韩。遂折天下脊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374912_comment'></div>复得赵。因拾取诸国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374912_comment'></div>秦未韩信联齐有之。故蒯通知汉楚轻重在信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374912_comment'></div>光武始于上谷成于鄗。魏武举官渡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374912_comment'></div>三分天下有其二。晋乱胡作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374912_comment'></div>至宋武号为英雄。得蜀得关中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374912_comment'></div>尽得河南地。十分天下有其八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374912_comment'></div>然不能使一人渡河以窥胡。至于高齐荒荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374912_comment'></div>宇文取得。隋文因以灭陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374912_comment'></div>五百年间。天下乃一家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374912_comment'></div>隋文非宋武敌也。是宋不得山东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374912_comment'></div>隋得山东。故隋为王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374912_comment'></div>宋为霸。由此言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374912_comment'></div>山东王者不得。不可为王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374912_comment'></div>霸者不得。不可为霸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374912_comment'></div>猾贼得之。是以致天下不安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374912_comment'></div>国家天宝末。燕盗徐起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374912_comment'></div>出入成皋函潼间。若涉无人地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374912_comment'></div>郭李辈常以兵五十万不能过邺。自尔一百馀城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374912_comment'></div>天下力尽。不得尺寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374912_comment'></div>人望之若回鹘吐蕃。义无有敢窥者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374912_comment'></div>国家因之畦河修障戍。塞其街蹊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374912_comment'></div>齐鲁梁蔡。被其风流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374912_comment'></div>因亦为寇。以里拓表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374912_comment'></div>以表撑里。混澒回转。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374912_comment'></div>颠倒横斜。未尝五年间不战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374912_comment'></div>生人日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1374912", 1374912, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>顿委</span>。四夷日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1374912", 1374912, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>猖炽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374912_comment'></div>天子因之幸陜幸汉中。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1374912", 1374912, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>焦焦</span>然七十馀年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374912_comment'></div>呜呼。运遭孝武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374912_comment'></div>浣衣一肉。不畋不乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374912_comment'></div>自卑冗中拔取将相。凡十三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374912_comment'></div>乃能尽得河南山西地。洗削更革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374912_comment'></div>罔不顺适。唯山东不服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374912_comment'></div>亦再攻之。皆不利以返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374912_comment'></div>岂天使生人未至于帖泰耶。岂其人谋未至耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374912_comment'></div>何其艰哉。何其艰哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374912_comment'></div>今日天子圣明。超出古昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374912_comment'></div>志于理平。若欲悉使生人无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374912_comment'></div>其要在先去兵。不得山东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374912_comment'></div>兵不可去。是兵杀人无有已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374912_comment'></div>今者上策莫如自治。何者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374912_comment'></div>当贞元时。山东有燕赵魏叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374912_comment'></div>河南有齐蔡叛。梁徐陈汝白马津盟津襄邓安黄寿春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374912_comment'></div>皆戍厚兵。凡此十馀所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374912_comment'></div>才足自护治所。实不辍一人以他使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374912_comment'></div>遂使我力解势弛。熟视不轨者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374912_comment'></div>无可柰何。阶此蜀亦叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374912_comment'></div>吴亦叛。其他未叛者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374912_comment'></div>皆迎时上下。不可保信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374912_comment'></div>自元和初至今二十九年间。得蜀得吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374912_comment'></div>得蔡得齐。凡收郡县二百馀城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374912_comment'></div>所未能得。唯山东百城耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374912_comment'></div>土地人户。财物甲兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374912_comment'></div>校之往年。岂不绰绰乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374912_comment'></div>亦足自以为治也。法令制度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374912_comment'></div>品式条章。果自治乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374912_comment'></div>贤才奸恶。搜选置舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374912_comment'></div>果自治乎。障戊镇守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374912_comment'></div>干戈车马。果自治乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374912_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1374912", 1374912, "Clauses/164/Comments/0")'>井闾</span>阡陌。仓廪财赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374912_comment'></div>果自治乎。如不果自治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374912_comment'></div>是助虏为虐。环土三千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374912_comment'></div>植根七十年。复有天下阴为之助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374912_comment'></div>则安可以取。故曰上策莫如自治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374912_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1374912", 1374912, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>中策</span>莫如取魏。魏于山东最重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374912_comment'></div>于河南亦最重。何者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374912_comment'></div>魏在山东。以其能遮赵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374912_comment'></div>既不可越魏以取赵。固不可越赵以取燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374912_comment'></div>是燕赵常重于魏。魏常操燕赵之性命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374912_comment'></div>故魏在山东最重。黎阳距白马津三十里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374912_comment'></div>新乡距盟津一百五十里。陴垒相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374912_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1374912", 1374912, "Clauses/188/Comments/0")'>朝驾</span>暮战。是二津虏能溃一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374912_comment'></div>则驰入城皋。不数日间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374912_comment'></div>故魏于河南间亦最重。今者愿以近事明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374912_comment'></div>元和中。纂天下兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374912_comment'></div>诛蔡诛齐。顿之五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1374912_comment'></div>无山东忧者。以能得魏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1374912_comment'></div>昨日诛沧。顿之三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1374912_comment'></div>无山东忧者。亦以其能得魏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1374912_comment'></div>长庆初诛赵。一日五诸侯兵四出溃解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1374912_comment'></div>以失魏也。昨日诛赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1374912_comment'></div>一日罢如长庆时。亦以失魏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1374912_comment'></div>故河南山东之轻重。常悬在魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1374912_comment'></div>明白可知也。非魏强大能致如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1374912_comment'></div>地形使然也。故曰取魏为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_107_1374912", 1374912, "Clauses/215/Comments/0")'>中策</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1374912_comment'></div>最下策为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_108_1374912", 1374912, "Clauses/216/Comments/0")'>浪战</span>。不计地势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1374912_comment'></div>不审攻守是也。兵多粟多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1374912_comment'></div>驱人使战者。便于守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1374912_comment'></div>兵少粟少。人不驱自战者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1374912_comment'></div>便于战。故我尝失于战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1374912_comment'></div>虏常困于守。山东之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1374912_comment'></div>叛且三五世矣。今之后生所见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1374912_comment'></div>言语举止。无非叛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1374912_comment'></div>以为事理正当如此。沉酣入骨髓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1374912_comment'></div>无以为非者。指示顺向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1374912_comment'></div>诋侵族脔。语曰叛去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1374912_comment'></div>酋酋起矣。至于有围急食尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1374912_comment'></div>餤尸以战。以此为俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1374912_comment'></div>又岂可与决一胜一负哉。自十馀年来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1374912_comment'></div>凡三收赵。食尽且下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1374912_comment'></div>尧山败。赵复振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1374912_comment'></div>下博败。赵复振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1374912_comment'></div>馆陶败。赵复振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1374912_comment'></div>故曰不计地势不审攻守为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_126_1374912", 1374912, "Clauses/252/Comments/0")'>浪战</span>。最下策也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1374912_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_127_1374912_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年</a>　在扬州，淮南幕中。杜牧作文一篇论兵。作品：《原十六卫》<div id='poem_1374913' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374913' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374913?labeling=true' target='_blank'>原十六卫</a><span class='authorDate'>（834年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374913")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374913_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374913'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374913'>国家始踵隋制。开十六卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374913_comment'></div>将军总三十员。属官总一百二十八员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374913_comment'></div>署守分部。夹峙禁省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374913_comment'></div>厥初历今。未始替削。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374913_comment'></div>然自今观之。设官言无谓者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374913_comment'></div>其十六卫乎。本原事迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374913_comment'></div>其实天下之大命也。始自贞观中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374913_comment'></div>既武遂文。内以十六卫畜养戎臣之开折冲果毅府五百七十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374913_comment'></div>以储兵伍。或有不幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374913_comment'></div>方二三千里为寇土。数十百万人为寇兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374913_comment'></div>蛮夷戎狄。践踏四作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374913_comment'></div>此时戎臣当提兵居外。至如天下平一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374913_comment'></div>暴勃消削。单车一符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374913_comment'></div>将命四走。莫不信顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374913_comment'></div>此时戎臣当提兵居内。当其居内也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374913_comment'></div>官为将军。绶有朱紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374913_comment'></div>章有金银。千百骑趋奉朝谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374913_comment'></div>第观车马。歌儿舞女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374913_comment'></div>念功赏劳。出于曲赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374913_comment'></div>所部之兵。散舍诸府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374913_comment'></div>上府不越一千二百人。三时耕稼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374913_comment'></div>袯襫耞耒。一时治武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374913_comment'></div>骑剑兵矢。裨卫以课。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374913_comment'></div>父兄相言。不得业他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374913_comment'></div>籍藏将府。伍散田亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374913_comment'></div>力解势破。人人自爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374913_comment'></div>虽有蚩尤为师帅。雅亦不可使为乱耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374913_comment'></div>及其当居外也。缘部之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374913_comment'></div>被檄乃来。受命于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374913_comment'></div>不见妻子。斧钺在前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374913_comment'></div>爵赏在后。以首争首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374913_comment'></div>以力搏力。飘暴<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1374913", 1374913, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>交捽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374913_comment'></div>岂暇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1374913", 1374913, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>异略</span>。虽有蚩尤为师帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374913_comment'></div>雅亦无能为叛也。自贞观至于开元末百三十年间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374913_comment'></div>戎臣兵伍。未始逆篡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374913_comment'></div>此圣人所能柄统轻重。制障表里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374913_comment'></div>圣算神术也。至于开元末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374913_comment'></div>愚儒奏章曰。天下文胜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374913_comment'></div>请罢府兵。诏曰可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374913_comment'></div>武夫奏章曰。天下力强矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374913_comment'></div>请搏四夷。诏曰可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374913_comment'></div>于是府兵内铲。边兵外作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374913_comment'></div>戎臣兵伍。湍奔矢往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374913_comment'></div>内无一人矣。起辽走蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374913_comment'></div>缭络万里。事五强寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374913_comment'></div>十馀年中。亡百万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374913_comment'></div>尾大中乾。成燕偏重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374913_comment'></div>而天下掀然。根萌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1374913", 1374913, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>烬燃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374913_comment'></div>七圣旰食。求欲除之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374913_comment'></div>且不能也。由此观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374913_comment'></div>戎臣兵伍。岂可一日使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1374913", 1374913, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>出落</span>钤键哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374913_comment'></div>然为国者。不能无也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374913_comment'></div>居外则叛。居内则篡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374913_comment'></div>使外不叛。内不篡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374913_comment'></div>兵不离伍。无自焚之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374913_comment'></div>将保颈领。无烹狗之谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374913_comment'></div>古今已还。法术最长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374913_comment'></div>其置府立卫乎。近代已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374913_comment'></div>于其将也。弊复为甚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374913_comment'></div>人嚣曰。廷诏命将矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374913_comment'></div>名出视之。率市儿辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374913_comment'></div>盖多赂金玉。负倚幽阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374913_comment'></div>折券交赀所能也。绝不识父兄礼义之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374913_comment'></div>复无慷慨感槩之气。百城千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374913_comment'></div>一朝得之。其强杰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1374913", 1374913, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>愎勃</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374913_comment'></div>则挠削法制。不使缚已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374913_comment'></div>斩族忠良。不使违已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374913_comment'></div>力壹势便。罔不为寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374913_comment'></div>其阴泥巧狡者。亦能家算口敛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374913_comment'></div>委于邪倖。由卿市公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374913_comment'></div>去郡得都。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1374913", 1374913, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>四履</span>所治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374913_comment'></div>指为别馆。或一夫不幸而寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374913_comment'></div>则戛割生人。略匝天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374913_comment'></div>是以天下每每。兵乱涌溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374913_comment'></div>齐人乾耗。乡党风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374913_comment'></div>淫窳衰薄。教化恩泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374913_comment'></div>壅抑不下。召来灾殄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374913_comment'></div>被及牛马。嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374913_comment'></div>自愚而知之。人其尽知之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374913_comment'></div>且武者任诛。如天时有秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374913_comment'></div>文者任治。如天时有春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374913_comment'></div>是天不能倒春秋。是豪杰不能总文武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374913_comment'></div>是此辈受钺诛暴乎。曰于是乎在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374913_comment'></div>某人行教乎。曰于是乎在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374913_comment'></div>欲祸蠹不作者。未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374913_comment'></div>伏惟文皇帝十六卫之旨。谁复而原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374913_comment'></div>其实天下之大命也。故作原十六卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374913_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_87_1374913_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_22_32318_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年</a>　在扬州，淮南幕中。杜牧作文呈沈传师。作品：《上知己文章启》<div id='poem_1374888' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374888' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374888?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上知己文章启</a><span class='authorDate'>（834年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374888")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374888_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374888'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374888'>某启。某少小好为文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374888_comment'></div>伏以待郎文师也。是敢谨贡七篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374888_comment'></div>以为视听之污。伏以元和功德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374888_comment'></div>凡人尽当咏歌纪叙之。故作燕将录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374888_comment'></div>往年吊伐之道。未甚得所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374888_comment'></div>故作罪言。自艰难来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374888_comment'></div>以卒伍佣役辈。多据兵为天子诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374888_comment'></div>故作原十六卫。诸侯或恃功不识古道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374888_comment'></div>以至于反侧叛乱。故作与刘司徒书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374888_comment'></div>处士之名。即古之巢由伊吕辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374888_comment'></div>近者往往自名之。故作送薛处士序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374888_comment'></div>宝历大起<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1374888", 1374888, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>宫室</span>。广声色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374888_comment'></div>故作阿房宫赋。有庐终南山下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374888_comment'></div>尝有耕田著书志。故作望故园赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374888_comment'></div>虽未能尽窥古人。得与揖让笑言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374888_comment'></div>亦或的的分其壮貌矣。自四年来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374888_comment'></div>在大君子门下。恭承指顾约束于政理簿书间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374888_comment'></div>永不执卷。上都有旧第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374888_comment'></div>唯书万卷。终南山下有旧庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374888_comment'></div>颇有水树。当有耒耜笔砚归其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374888_comment'></div>及发齿甚壮。冀有成立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374888_comment'></div>他日捧持。一游门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374888_comment'></div>为拜谒之先。或希一奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374888_comment'></div>今者所献。但有轻黩尊严之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374888_comment'></div>亦何所取。伏希少暇诛责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374888_comment'></div>生死幸甚。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374888_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1374888_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年</a>　春，杜牧过隋苑，作诗怀古。作品：《隋苑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_32068' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32068' class='inlineComment2'>（一作初开）</span>睡脸新。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32068'>却笑<span class='link' "poem_allusion_32210")'>九牛一毛</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_32210_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32210'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32210'>洛桥风暖细翻衣，春引仙官去玉墀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32210_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32210'>独鹤初冲太虚日，九牛新落一毛时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32210_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32210'>行开教化期君是，卧病神祇祷我知。<div id='poem_sentence_2_32210_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_32210_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>杜牧作文一篇送友人崔郸。作品：《投知己书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（崔郸开成二年为宣歙观察使，有意延揽杜牧入幕，此时杜牧正因乞假百日去职，有意寻觅新职。此条活动具体时间不详，姑系于此；崔郸，清河武城人，崔郾之弟，新旧唐书均有传。）</span><div id='poem_1374867' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374867' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374867?labeling=true' target='_blank'>投知己书</a><span class='authorDate'>（837年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374867")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374867_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374867'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374867'>夫子曰。不怨天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374867_comment'></div>不尤人。下学而上达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374867_comment'></div>知我者其天乎。复曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374867_comment'></div>知我者以春秋。罪我者亦以春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374867_comment'></div>此圣人操心不顾世人之是非也。柱厉叔事莒敖公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374867_comment'></div>莒敖公不知。及莒敖公有难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374867_comment'></div>柱厉叔死之。不知我则己反以死报之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374867_comment'></div>盖怨不知之深也。豫让谓赵襄子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374867_comment'></div>智伯以国士待我。我以国士报之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374867_comment'></div>此乃烈士义夫。有才感其知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374867_comment'></div>不顾其生也。行无坚明之异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374867_comment'></div>才无尺寸之用。泛泛然求知于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374867_comment'></div>知则不能有所报。不知则怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374867_comment'></div>此乃众人之心也。圣贤义烈之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374867_comment'></div>既不可到。小生有异于众人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374867_comment'></div>审已切也。审已之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374867_comment'></div>审已之才。皆不出众人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374867_comment'></div>亦不求知于人。已或有知之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374867_comment'></div>则藏缩退避。唯恐知之深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374867_comment'></div>盖自度无可以为报效也。或有因缘他事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374867_comment'></div>不得已求知于人者。苟不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374867_comment'></div>未尝退有怼言怨色。形于妻子之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374867_comment'></div>此乃比于众人。唯审已求知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374867_comment'></div>太和二年。小生应进士举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374867_comment'></div>当其时。先进之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374867_comment'></div>以小生行可与进。业可与修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374867_comment'></div>喧而誉之。争为知己者不啻二十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374867_comment'></div>小生迩来十年江湖间。时时以家事一抵京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374867_comment'></div>事已即返。尝所谓喧而誉之为知已者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374867_comment'></div>多已显贵。未尝一到其门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374867_comment'></div>何者。自十年来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374867_comment'></div>行不益进。业不益修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374867_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1374867", 1374867, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>中夜</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1374867", 1374867, "Clauses/64/Comments/1")'>忖量</span>。自愧于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374867_comment'></div>欲持何说复于知已之前。为进拜之资乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374867_comment'></div>默默藏缩。苟免寒饥为幸耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374867_comment'></div>昨李巡官至。忽传閤下旨意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374867_comment'></div>似知姓名。或欲异日必录在门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374867_comment'></div>閤下为世之伟人钜德。小生一获进谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374867_comment'></div>一陪宴享。则亦荣矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374867_comment'></div>况欲异日终置之于榻席之上。齿于数子之列乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374867_comment'></div>无攀缘丝发之因。出特达倜傥之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374867_comment'></div>小生自度。宜为何才可以塞閤下之求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374867_comment'></div>宜为何道可以报閤下之德。是以自承命以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374867_comment'></div>审己愈切。抚心独惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374867_comment'></div>忽忽思之。而不自知其然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374867_comment'></div>若蒙待之以众人之地。求之以众人之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374867_comment'></div>责之以众人之报。亦庶几异日受约束指顾于簿书之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374867_comment'></div>知无不为。为不及私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374867_comment'></div>亦或能提笔伸纸。作咏歌以发盛德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374867_comment'></div>止此而已。其他望于古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374867_comment'></div>责以不及。非小生之所堪任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374867_comment'></div>伏恐閤下听闻之过。求取之异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374867_comment'></div>敢不特自发明。导说其衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374867_comment'></div>一开閤下视听。其他感激发愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374867_comment'></div>怀愧恩德。临纸汗发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374867_comment'></div>不知所裁。某恐惧再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374867_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1374867_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>杜牧假满百日，依例去官。将离扬州，有诗题禅智寺。作品：《将赴宣州留题扬州禅智寺》<span class='inlineComment2'>（按唐制：职事官假满百日，即合停解；禅智寺遗址在今扬州市维扬区邗沟中学内。）</span><div id='poem_32010' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32010' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/32010?labeling=true' target='_blank'>将赴宣州留题扬州禅智寺</a><span class='authorDate'>（837年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32010")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_32010_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32010'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32010'>故里溪头松柏双，来时尽日倚松窗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32010'>杜陵隋苑已绝国，秋晚南游更渡江。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32010'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_32010_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
镇江
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='4b83e24421ed41bebe3fa89de2f16dc2_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4b83e24421ed41bebe3fa89de2f16dc2");'><span id='4b83e24421ed41bebe3fa89de2f16dc2_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=833')">833年</a>，31岁</div><div id='4b83e24421ed41bebe3fa89de2f16dc2' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=833')">833年</a>　往来于润州，闻杜秋娘流落事，作诗有感。作品：《杜秋娘诗》<div id='poem_32347' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32347' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/32347?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杜秋娘诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（833年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32347")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_32347_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_32347'>「杜秋，金陵女也年十五为李锜妾。后锜叛灭，籍之入宫，有宠于景陵。穆宗即位，命秋为皇子傅姆。皇子壮，封漳王，郑注用事，诬丞相欲去已者，指王为根，王被罪废削。秋因赐归故乡，予过金陵，感其穷且老，为之赋诗。」</div><div id='poem_preface_32347_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_32347", 32347, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>鸱夷</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_35_32347_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_32347'>织室<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8729, "poem_sentence_36_32347")'>魏豹俘</span>，作汉太平基。<div id='poem_sentence_36_32347_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_32347'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9030, "poem_sentence_37_32347")'>误置代籍</span>中，两朝尊<span class='link' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_32347'>珊瑚破高齐，作婢舂黄糜。<div id='poem_sentence_39_32347_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_32347'><span class='link' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_32347'>秦因<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_32347", 32347, "Clauses/88/Comments/1")'><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_48_32347_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_32347'>主张既难测，翻覆亦其宜。<div id='poem_sentence_49_32347_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_32347'>地尽有何物，天外<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作高）</span>复何之。<div id='poem_sentence_50_32347_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_32347'>指何为而捉，足何为而驰。<div id='poem_sentence_51_32347_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_32347'>耳何为而听，目何为而窥。<div id='poem_sentence_52_32347_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_32347'>己身不自晓，此外何思惟。<div id='poem_sentence_53_32347_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_32347'>因倾一樽酒，题作<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_32347", 32347, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>杜秋</span>诗。<div id='poem_sentence_54_32347_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_32347'>愁来独<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_32347", 32347, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>长咏</span>，聊可以自怡。<div id='poem_sentence_55_32347_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_32347'></div><div id='poem_sentence_56_32347_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_32347'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_32347_0'>⑴ 劝君莫惜金缕衣，劝君须惜少年时。花开堪折直须折，莫待无花空折枝。李锜长唱此辞</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_32347_0'>⑵ 《晋书》：“盗开凉州张骏冢，得紫玉箫。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_32347_comment'></div><div 绍兴

-----title
丽水
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='5368239cca0d40f1b8ec8b056dabcde4_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5368239cca0d40f1b8ec8b056dabcde4");'><span id='5368239cca0d40f1b8ec8b056dabcde4_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年</a>，32岁</div><div id='5368239cca0d40f1b8ec8b056dabcde4' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年</a>　在处州，杜牧作文一篇。作品：《书处州韩吏部孔子庙碑阴》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文约作于834年。）</span><div id='poem_1374914' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374914' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374914?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书处州韩吏部孔子庙碑阴</a><span class='authorDate'>（834年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374914")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374914_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374914'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374914'>天不生夫子于中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374914_comment'></div>中国当何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374914_comment'></div>曰不夷狄如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374914_comment'></div>荀卿祖夫子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374914_comment'></div>李斯师荀卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374914_comment'></div>一日宰天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374914_comment'></div>尽诱天子之徒与书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374914_comment'></div>坑而焚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374914_comment'></div>曰徒能乱人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374914_comment'></div>不若刑名狱吏治世之贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374914_comment'></div>彼商鞅者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374914_comment'></div>能耕能战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374914_comment'></div>能行其法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374914_comment'></div>基秦为强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374914_comment'></div>曰彼仁义<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1374914", 1374914, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>虱官</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374914_comment'></div>可以置之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374914_comment'></div>自董仲舒刘向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374914_comment'></div>皆言司马迁良史也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374914_comment'></div>而迁以儒分之为九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374914_comment'></div>曰博而寡要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374914_comment'></div>劳而无功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374914_comment'></div>不如道家者流也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374914_comment'></div>自有天地以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374914_comment'></div>人无有不死者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374914_comment'></div>海上迂怪之士特出言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374914_comment'></div>黄帝鍊丹砂为黄金以饵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374914_comment'></div>昼日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1374914", 1374914, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>乘龙</span>上天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374914_comment'></div>诚得其药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374914_comment'></div>可如黄帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374914_comment'></div>以燕昭王之贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374914_comment'></div>破强齐几于霸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374914_comment'></div>秦始皇汉武帝之雄材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374914_comment'></div>灭六强擗四夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374914_comment'></div>尽非凡主也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374914_comment'></div>皆甘其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374914_comment'></div>耗天下捐骨肉而不辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374914_comment'></div>至死而不悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374914_comment'></div>莫尊于天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374914_comment'></div>莫严于宗庙社稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374914_comment'></div>梁武帝起为梁国者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374914_comment'></div>以笋脯面牲为荐祀之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374914_comment'></div>曰佛之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374914_comment'></div>牲不可杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374914_comment'></div>以天子之尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374914_comment'></div>舍身为其奴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374914_comment'></div>散发布地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374914_comment'></div>亲命其徒践之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374914_comment'></div>有天地日月为之主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374914_comment'></div>阴阳鬼神为之佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374914_comment'></div>夫子巍然统而辩之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374914_comment'></div>复引尧舜禹汤文武周公为之助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374914_comment'></div>则其徒不为劣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374914_comment'></div>其治不为僻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374914_comment'></div>彼四君二臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374914_comment'></div>不为无知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374914_comment'></div>一旦不信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374914_comment'></div>背而之他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374914_comment'></div>仍族灭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374914_comment'></div>傥不生夫子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374914_comment'></div>纷纭冥昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374914_comment'></div>百家斗起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374914_comment'></div>是已所是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374914_comment'></div>非已所非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374914_comment'></div>天下随其时而宗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374914_comment'></div>谁敢非之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374914_comment'></div>纵有非之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374914_comment'></div>欲何所依据而为其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374914_comment'></div>是杨墨骈慎已降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374914_comment'></div>百家之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374914_comment'></div>庙貌而血食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374914_comment'></div>十年一变法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374914_comment'></div>百年一改教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374914_comment'></div>横斜高下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374914_comment'></div>不知止泊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374914_comment'></div>彼夷狄者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374914_comment'></div>为夷狄之俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374914_comment'></div>一定而不易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374914_comment'></div>若不生夫子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374914_comment'></div>是知其必不夷狄如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374914_comment'></div>韩吏部夫子庙碑曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374914_comment'></div>天下通祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374914_comment'></div>惟社稷与夫子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374914_comment'></div>社稷坛而不屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374914_comment'></div>取异代为配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374914_comment'></div>未若夫子巍然当座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374914_comment'></div>用王者礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374914_comment'></div>以门人为配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374914_comment'></div>自天子至于庶人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374914_comment'></div>亲北面而师之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374914_comment'></div>夫子以德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374914_comment'></div>社稷以功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374914_comment'></div>固有次第哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374914_comment'></div>因引孟子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374914_comment'></div>生人已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374914_comment'></div>未有如夫子者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374914_comment'></div>自古称夫子者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374914_comment'></div>称夫子之德莫如孟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374914_comment'></div>称夫子之尊莫如韩吏部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374914_comment'></div>故书其碑阴云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_98_1374914_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

id='poem_content_31908'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_31908'>早入商山百里云，蓝溪桥下水声分。<div id='poem_sentence_0_31908_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_31908'>流水旧声人旧耳，此回呜咽不堪闻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_31908_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_31908'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_31908_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　杜牧过商州。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
蕲春
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ed7ec7f91c794592b566af3c583d9ed7_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ed7ec7f91c794592b566af3c583d9ed7");'><span id='ed7ec7f91c794592b566af3c583d9ed7_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年</a>，39岁</div><div id='ed7ec7f91c794592b566af3c583d9ed7' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年4月</a>　四月，从兄杜慥自江州刺史迁蕲州刺史，杜牧与弟杜顗均随至蕲州。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='94b9ef545af84ebbbf3cde2e811c5103_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("94b9ef545af84ebbbf3cde2e811c5103");'><span id='94b9ef545af84ebbbf3cde2e811c5103_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>，40岁</div><div id='94b9ef545af84ebbbf3cde2e811c5103' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>杜牧遣人迎同州眼医周师达至蕲州，为弟凯视眼疾，周不能治。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>杜牧与弟杜顗商议，秋，杜顗赴扬州依从兄杜悰，时悰为淮南节度使。<br /></div>
-----end

-----title
安陆
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='9071315a16ea4b98b34b9323a98f95f4_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9071315a16ea4b98b34b9323a98f95f4");'><span id='9071315a16ea4b98b34b9323a98f95f4_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>，40岁</div><div id='9071315a16ea4b98b34b9323a98f95f4' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　春夏间，杜牧自京赴黄州刺史任，途经安州，游浮云寺，有诗寄友人。作品：《题安州浮云寺楼寄湖州张郎中》<div id='poem_32376' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32376' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/32376?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题安州浮云寺楼寄湖州张郎中</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32376")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_32376_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32376'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32376'>去夏疏雨馀，同倚朱阑语。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32376'>当时楼下水，今日到何处？<div id='poem_sentence_1_32376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32376'>恨如春草多，事与孤鸿去。<div id='poem_sentence_2_32376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_32376'>楚岸柳何穷，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_32376", 32376, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>别愁</span>纷若絮。<div id='poem_sentence_3_32376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_32376'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_32376_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
黄冈
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='cad1d89dd5f547b9bd041d86be903104_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("cad1d89dd5f547b9bd041d86be903104");'><span id='cad1d89dd5f547b9bd041d86be903104_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>，40岁</div><div id='cad1d89dd5f547b9bd041d86be903104' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年4月</a>　杜牧至黄州，出为黄州刺史。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='e433ad4c598145dcb254c902eb56e2ab_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e433ad4c598145dcb254c902eb56e2ab");'><span id='e433ad4c598145dcb254c902eb56e2ab_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=844')">842-844年</a>，40-42岁</div><div id='e433ad4c598145dcb254c902eb56e2ab' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　在黄州，黄州刺史任上。杜牧作文一篇。作品：《黄州刺史谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（按唐制，官员抵州任后不久即得上表朝廷谢恩。）</span><div id='poem_1374842' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374842' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374842?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄州刺史谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374842")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374842_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374842'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374842'>臣某言。臣伏奉某月日敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374842_comment'></div>自某官授臣黄州刺史。以其月日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374842_comment'></div>臣某诚惶诚恐顿首顿首。臣某自出身已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374842_comment'></div>任职使府。虽有官业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374842_comment'></div>不亲治人。及登朝二任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374842_comment'></div>皆参台阁。优游无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374842_comment'></div>止奉朝谒。今者蒙恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374842_comment'></div>擢授刺史。专断刑罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374842_comment'></div>施行诏条。政之善恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374842_comment'></div>唯臣所系。素不更练。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374842_comment'></div>兼之昧愚。一自到任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374842_comment'></div>忧惕不胜。动作举止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374842_comment'></div>唯恐罪悔。伏以黄州在大江之侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374842_comment'></div>云梦泽南。古有夷风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374842_comment'></div>今尽华俗。户不满二万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374842_comment'></div>税钱才三万贯。风俗谨朴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374842_comment'></div>法令明具。久无水旱疾疫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374842_comment'></div>人业不耗。谨奉贡赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374842_comment'></div>不为罪恶。臣虽不肖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374842_comment'></div>亦能守之。然臣观东汉光武明帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374842_comment'></div>称为明主。不信德教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374842_comment'></div>专任刑名。二主相继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374842_comment'></div>联续五十年。当时以深刻刺举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374842_comment'></div>号为称职。治古之风废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374842_comment'></div>俗吏之课高。于此时循吏卫飒任延王景鲁恭刘宽陈宠之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374842_comment'></div>止一县宰。独能不徇时俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374842_comment'></div>自行教化。唯德是务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374842_comment'></div>爱人如子。废鞭笞责削之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374842_comment'></div>用忠恕抚字之道。百里之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374842_comment'></div>勃生古风。凡违众背时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374842_comment'></div>徇古非今。王者公侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374842_comment'></div>尚难其事。岂一县宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374842_comment'></div>能移其俗。此盖汉人之为治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374842_comment'></div>以古人之法。为一时之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374842_comment'></div>以治古之教教之。即治古之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374842_comment'></div>以一时之法齐之。即一时之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374842_comment'></div>国家自有天下已来。二百三十馀年间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374842_comment'></div>专用仁恕。每后刑罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374842_comment'></div>是以内难外难。作者相继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374842_comment'></div>土地甲兵。权柄号令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374842_comment'></div>尽非我有。终能擒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374842_comment'></div>此实恩泽慈爱。入人骨髓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374842_comment'></div>俗厚风古。不可摇动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374842_comment'></div>今自陛下即位已来。重罪不杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374842_comment'></div>小过不问。普天之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374842_comment'></div>蛮貊之邦。有罹艰凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374842_comment'></div>一皆存恤。圣明睿哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374842_comment'></div>广大慈恕。远僻隐阨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374842_comment'></div>无不欢戴。受十四圣之生育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374842_comment'></div>张二百四十年之基宇。臣于此际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374842_comment'></div>为吏长人。敢不遵行国风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374842_comment'></div>彰扬至化。小大之狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374842_comment'></div>必以情恕。孤独鳏寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374842_comment'></div>必躬问抚。庶使一州之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374842_comment'></div>知上有仁圣天子所遣刺史。不为虚受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374842_comment'></div>蒸其和风。感其欢心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374842_comment'></div>庶为瑞为祥。为歌为咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374842_comment'></div>以裨盛业。流乎无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374842_comment'></div>在臣之心则然。岂材术之能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374842_comment'></div>无任感激悃恳血诚之至。谨奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374842_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1374842_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　在黄州，黄州刺史任上。杜牧作诗抒抑郁不平之意。作品：《郡斋独酌》<div id='poem_32362' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32362' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/32362?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郡斋独酌<span class='inlineComment2'>（黄州作）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32362")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_32362_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_32362'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3260, "poem_allusion_32362")'>甘英穷西海</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4151, "poem_allusion_32362")'>画万国</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6653, "poem_allusion_32362")'>彭殇</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7975, "poem_allusion_32362")'>舜衣裳</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9388, "poem_allusion_32362")'>腥膻</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10599, "poem_allusion_32362")'>政如水</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_32362_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32362'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32362'>前年鬓生雪，今年须带霜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32362'>时节序鳞次，古今同雁行。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32362'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3260, "poem_sentence_2_32362")'>甘英穷西海</span>，四万到洛阳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_32362'>东南我所见，北可计幽荒。<div id='poem_sentence_3_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_32362'>中画一万国，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_32362", 32362, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>角角</span>棋布方。<div id='poem_sentence_4_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_32362'>地顽压不穴，天迥老不僵。<div id='poem_sentence_5_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_32362'>屈指百万世，过如霹雳忙。<div id='poem_sentence_6_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_32362'>人生落其内，何者为<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6653, "poem_sentence_7_32362")'>彭殇</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_32362'>促束自系缚，儒衣宽且长。<div id='poem_sentence_8_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_32362'>旗亭雪中过，敢问当垆娘。<div id='poem_sentence_9_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_32362'>我爱李侍中，标标七尺强。<div id='poem_sentence_10_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_32362'>白羽八扎弓，䏶压绿檀枪。<div id='poem_sentence_11_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_32362'>风前略横阵，紫髯分两傍。<div id='poem_sentence_12_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_32362'>淮西万虎士，怒目不敢当。<div id='poem_sentence_13_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_32362'>功成赐宴<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_32362", 32362, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>麟德殿</span>，猿超鹘掠广毬场。<div id='poem_sentence_14_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_32362'>三千<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_32362", 32362, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>宫女</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_32362", 32362, "Clauses/30/Comments/1")'>侧头</span>看，相排踏碎双明珰。<div id='poem_sentence_15_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_32362'>旌竿幖幖旗㸌㸌，意气横鞭归故乡。<div id='poem_sentence_16_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_32362'>我爱朱处士，三吴当中央。<div id='poem_sentence_17_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_32362'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_32362", 32362, "Clauses/36/Comments/1")'>罢亚</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（稻名）</span>百顷稻，西风吹半黄。<div id='poem_sentence_18_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_32362'>尚可活乡里，岂唯满囷仓。<div id='poem_sentence_19_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_32362'>后岭翠扑扑，前溪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_32362", 32362, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>碧泱泱</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_20_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_32362'>雾晓起凫雁，日晚下牛羊。<div id='poem_sentence_21_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_32362'>叔舅欲饮我，社瓮<span class='link'
