id='poem_sentence_24_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_32362'>姻亲骨肉舍，烟火遥相望。<div id='poem_sentence_25_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_32362'>太守<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10599, "poem_sentence_26_32362")'>政如水</span>，长官贪似狼。<div id='poem_sentence_26_32362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_32362'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_32362", 32362, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>征输</span>一云毕，任尔自存亡。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32311'>嗜酒狂嫌阮，知非晚笑蘧。<div id='poem_sentence_2_32311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_32320_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_32320'>貂簪荆玉润，丹穴<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2237, "poem_sentence_5_32320")'><span id='poem_sentence_5_32320_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_32320'>今日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_32320", 32320, class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_32320'>且嫌游昼短，莫问<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4011, "poem_sentence_7_32320")'>积薪</span>长。<div id='poem_sentence_7_32320_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_32320'>无计披<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7076, "poem_sentence_8_32320")'>清裁</span>，唯持<span id='poem_sentence_9_32320'>愿公如<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8727, "poem_sentence_9_32320")'>卫武</span>，百岁尚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_32320", 32320, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>康强</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_32320_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_32320'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_32320_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年6月</a>　在黄州，黄州刺史任上。杜牧作文一篇。作品：《黄州准赦祭百神文》<div id='poem_1374935' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374935' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374935?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄州准赦祭百神文</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374935")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374935_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374935'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374935'>会昌二年岁次壬戌夏四月乙丑朔二十三日丁亥。皇帝御宣政殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374935_comment'></div>百辟卿士。稽首再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374935_comment'></div>敢上仁圣文武至神大孝尊号于皇帝。受册礼毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374935_comment'></div>御丹凤楼。因大赦天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374935_comment'></div>咸告天下刺史。宜祭境内神祇有益于人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374935_comment'></div>可抽常所上赋。以备供具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374935_comment'></div>牧为刺史。实守黄州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374935_comment'></div>夏六月甲子朔十八日辛巳。伏准赦书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374935_comment'></div>得祭诸神。因为文称赞皇帝功德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374935_comment'></div>用飨神云。皇帝嗣帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374935_comment'></div>天饬天付。前壬申年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374935_comment'></div>坐统大业。慈仁宽恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374935_comment'></div>圣明文武。或曰诛殛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374935_comment'></div>曰我父母。譬彼婴儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374935_comment'></div>岂不可恕。或曰畋游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374935_comment'></div>苑大林深。喈嘐跳突。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374935_comment'></div>千毛万羽。豹裂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1374935", 1374935, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>鹏擒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374935_comment'></div>其乐无伍。皇帝曰不。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374935_comment'></div>匪我不知。言岂假汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374935_comment'></div>未抚四夷。未考百度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374935_comment'></div>天地宗庙。未陈簋簠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374935_comment'></div>如寐未寤。如痒未愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374935_comment'></div>斥退狗马。未可以御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374935_comment'></div>或曰酒饮。顺气完神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374935_comment'></div>奠习乐工。自祖自父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374935_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1374935", 1374935, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>瑶簪</span>绣裾。千万侍女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374935_comment'></div>酬以觥斝。助之歌舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374935_comment'></div>富贵四海。不乐何苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374935_comment'></div>皇帝曰不。如闻四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374935_comment'></div>蝗蔽田亩。或曰亢旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374935_comment'></div>或曰淫雨。稚老孤寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374935_comment'></div>未尽得所。闻一有是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374935_comment'></div>首不能举。乃拔俊良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374935_comment'></div>乃登耆老。夕思朝议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374935_comment'></div>依规约矩。详刑定法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374935_comment'></div>深刻不取。标揭典制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374935_comment'></div>酌之中古。远师太宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374935_comment'></div>近法宪宗。怵慄思惟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374935_comment'></div>不治是惧。四国既平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374935_comment'></div>六职攸序。黍稷稻粱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374935_comment'></div>呕哑俯偻。父子供养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374935_comment'></div>婴儿抚乳。万里齐俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374935_comment'></div>实皇帝力。繄眠而食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374935_comment'></div>罔知其故。皇帝乃曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374935_comment'></div>予见郊庙。严法物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374935_comment'></div>旓旐旗。五帝坐坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374935_comment'></div>百神立坫。嵬嶷肸蚃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374935_comment'></div>捧爵是醮。海外天内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374935_comment'></div>戎狄蛮夷。奇服异貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374935_comment'></div>伏于除外。欢喜叫噪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374935_comment'></div>回御丹凤。大赦四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374935_comment'></div>改元会昌。减论有罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374935_comment'></div>绍功嗣德。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1374935", 1374935, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>搜剔</span>幽昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374935_comment'></div>寒暑合节。风轻雨碎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374935_comment'></div>谷溢陈菌。畜繁腯大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374935_comment'></div>东南西北。限岸畺纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374935_comment'></div>无有顿惮。不识灾害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374935_comment'></div>三事大夫。邦伯诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374935_comment'></div>曰皇帝德。古不能侔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374935_comment'></div>讴歌谣咏。安能可称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374935_comment'></div>百工庶人。亦有聚谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374935_comment'></div>拜章口呼。愿上大号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374935_comment'></div>神听天闻。欲扬宏休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374935_comment'></div>皇帝曰。无功不可虚受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374935_comment'></div>恳请不已。出涕叩头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374935_comment'></div>皇帝不能止。曰予惭羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374935_comment'></div>日因大赦。惟新九州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374935_comment'></div>不穷不诈。不饥不偷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374935_comment'></div>有穷有饥。实吏之尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374935_comment'></div>予实天吏。许之省修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374935_comment'></div>约束教诫。纤悉丁宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374935_comment'></div>品类细伟。各当源流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374935_comment'></div>皇帝曰俞。股肱耳目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374935_comment'></div>诚示竭力。寒暑风雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374935_comment'></div>宜神是酬。匪神之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374935_comment'></div>其谁能谋。凡尔守土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374935_comment'></div>各报尔望。剥烹羹胾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374935_comment'></div>无爱羊牛。天下闻命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374935_comment'></div>奔走承事。牧实遭遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374935_comment'></div>亦忝剌史。斋斋惕慄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374935_comment'></div>渊谷临坠。视牲启毛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374935_comment'></div>濯爵置羃。不委下吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374935_comment'></div>肴羞具洁。罔有不备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374935_comment'></div>衣冠待晓。坐以假寐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374935_comment'></div>步及神宇。蹐足屏气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374935_comment'></div>神实在前。敬恭跪起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374935_comment'></div>诗不云乎。皇天上帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374935_comment'></div>伊谁云憎。天憎罪人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374935_comment'></div>天可指视。止殃其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374935_comment'></div>岂可傍炽。刺史有罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374935_comment'></div>可病可死。其身未塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374935_comment'></div>可及妻子。无作水旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374935_comment'></div>以及闾里。皇帝仁圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374935_comment'></div>神祇聪明。唱和符同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374935_comment'></div>相为表里。黄治虽远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374935_comment'></div>黄俗虽鄙。皇帝视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374935_comment'></div>远近一致。洋洋在上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374935_comment'></div>实提人纪。无负皇帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374935_comment'></div>自作羞愧。月惟孟夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1374935_comment'></div>日惟辛巳。实神降祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1374935_comment'></div>神如有言。我答皇帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1374935_comment'></div>寒暑风雨。其期必致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1374935_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_102_1374935", 1374935, "Clauses/204/Comments/0")'>瘥疠</span>水旱。永永止弭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1374935_comment'></div>尔为官人。勉其尔治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1374935_comment'></div>某敬再拜。汗流沾地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1374935_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_105_1374935_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年8月</a>　在黄州，黄州刺史任上。八月，回鹘南侵，杜牧忧念北边人民受回鹘侵扰，作诗借雁以寄慨。作品：《早雁》<div id='poem_32164' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32164' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/32164?labeling=true' target='_blank'>早雁</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32164")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_32164_comment'></div><div id='poem_allusion_32164_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32164'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32164'>金河秋半虏弦开，云外<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作际）</span>惊飞四散哀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32164'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_32164", 32164, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>仙掌</span>月明<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_32164", 32164, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>孤影</span>过，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1337, "poem_sentence_1_32164")'>长门</span>灯暗数声来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32164'>须知胡骑纷纷在<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作虽随胡马翩翩去）</span>，岂逐春风一一回。<div id='poem_sentence_2_32164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_32164'>莫厌<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作好是）</span>潇湘少人处，水多菰米岸莓苔。<div id='poem_sentence_3_32164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_32164'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_32164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_32164'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(32164)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　在黄州，黄州刺史任上。杜牧有诗上宰相崔珙。作品：《上门下崔相公书》<div id='poem_1374874' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374874' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374874?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上门下崔相公书</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374874")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374874_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374874'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374874'>天生相公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374874_comment'></div>辅仁圣天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374874_comment'></div>外齐武事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374874_comment'></div>内治文教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374874_comment'></div>被权衡称量者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374874_comment'></div>不失铢黍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374874_comment'></div>受威烈慑怛者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374874_comment'></div>蚓缩鱼藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374874_comment'></div>百职率治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374874_comment'></div>中外平一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374874_comment'></div>伏惟相公功德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374874_comment'></div>无与为比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374874_comment'></div>往者彭城骄强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374874_comment'></div>顽卒数万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374874_comment'></div>联三齐旧风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374874_comment'></div>振天下饷道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374874_comment'></div>重弓束矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374874_comment'></div>大刀长矛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374874_comment'></div>不受指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374874_comment'></div>自有信誓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374874_comment'></div>王侍中生于其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374874_comment'></div>称为健黠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374874_comment'></div>奔马潜出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374874_comment'></div>不敢回顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374874_comment'></div>高仆射宽厚闻名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374874_comment'></div>能治军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374874_comment'></div>举动汗流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374874_comment'></div>拜于堂下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374874_comment'></div>及乎不受李司徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374874_comment'></div>脔食其使者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374874_comment'></div>风波不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374874_comment'></div>气势已去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374874_comment'></div>自淮北渡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374874_comment'></div>由洛东下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374874_comment'></div>漕挽行役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374874_comment'></div>出泗上者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374874_comment'></div>稚长相贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374874_comment'></div>藩镇欲生事树功者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374874_comment'></div>横激旁构。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374874_comment'></div>庙堂谋议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374874_comment'></div>不知所出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374874_comment'></div>相公殿一家僮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374874_comment'></div>驰入万众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374874_comment'></div>无不手垂目瞪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374874_comment'></div>露刃弦弓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374874_comment'></div>偶语腹非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374874_comment'></div>或离或伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374874_comment'></div>相公气压其骄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374874_comment'></div>文诱其顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374874_comment'></div>指示叛臣贼子覆灭之踪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374874_comment'></div>铺陈忠臣义士荣显之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374874_comment'></div>皇威坌涌于言下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374874_comment'></div>狼心顿革于目前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374874_comment'></div>然后剔刮根节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374874_comment'></div>销磨顽矿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374874_comment'></div>日教月化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374874_comment'></div>水顺雪释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374874_comment'></div>吐饭饱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374874_comment'></div>解衣暖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374874_comment'></div>威驱恩收礼训法束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374874_comment'></div>一年人畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374874_comment'></div>二年人爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374874_comment'></div>三年化成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374874_comment'></div>裁成一邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374874_comment'></div>俗同三辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374874_comment'></div>当此之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374874_comment'></div>迟回之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374874_comment'></div>有勇力者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374874_comment'></div>一唱而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374874_comment'></div>徵兵数十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374874_comment'></div>大小且百战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374874_comment'></div>然后傅其垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374874_comment'></div>钩其垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374874_comment'></div>得其罪人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374874_comment'></div>天下固已困矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374874_comment'></div>而天下议者必曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374874_comment'></div>某名将也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374874_comment'></div>某善用兵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374874_comment'></div>虽疏爵上公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374874_comment'></div>裂土千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374874_comment'></div>其酬尚薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374874_comment'></div>此必然之说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374874_comment'></div>故曰见胜不过众人之所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374874_comment'></div>非善之善者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374874_comment'></div>战胜而天下曰善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374874_comment'></div>非善者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374874_comment'></div>百战百胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374874_comment'></div>非善之善者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374874_comment'></div>能不战而屈人之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374874_comment'></div>乃善之善者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374874_comment'></div>是相公手携暴虎贪狼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374874_comment'></div>化为耕牛乘马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374874_comment'></div>退数十万兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374874_comment'></div>解天下之缚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374874_comment'></div>祇于谈笑俯仰燕享笔砚之间耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374874_comment'></div>以此校之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374874_comment'></div>斯过古人万万远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374874_comment'></div>复自持统大相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374874_comment'></div>开张教化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1374874_comment'></div>外制四夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1374874_comment'></div>内循百度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1374874_comment'></div>长育人材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1374874_comment'></div>兴起颓弛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1374874_comment'></div>心迎志释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1374874_comment'></div>罔有怨嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1374874_comment'></div>是以天下帖泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1374874_comment'></div>蝗死灾去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1374874_comment'></div>饥人复饱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1374874_comment'></div>流人复安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1374874_comment'></div>内外远近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1374874_comment'></div>率职奉法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1374874_comment'></div>不闻其他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1374874_comment'></div>如周有召穆公仲山甫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1374874_comment'></div>汉有魏相邴吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1374874_comment'></div>国朝姚宋二公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1374874_comment'></div>文事武事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1374874_comment'></div>居中处外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1374874_comment'></div>罔不是倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1374874_comment'></div>国家有天下二百三十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1374874_comment'></div>盛溢两汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1374874_comment'></div>功侔三代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1374874_comment'></div>今复生相公辅佐仁圣天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1374874_comment'></div>天时人事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1374874_comment'></div>即自将来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1374874_comment'></div>福禄昌炽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1374874_comment'></div>卜之无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1374874_comment'></div>天下孰不幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1374874_comment'></div>某僻守荒郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1374874_comment'></div>亦被陶钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1374874_comment'></div>齿发甚壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1374874_comment'></div>志尚未衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1374874_comment'></div>敢不自强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1374874_comment'></div>冀得天造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1374874_comment'></div>无任感激悃恳之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1374874_comment'></div>某恐惧再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_134_1374874_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　在黄州，黄州刺史任上。杜牧作文呈李回，抒抑郁不平之意。作品：《上李中丞书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（李中丞无法确定。缪钺《杜牧传·杜牧年谱》，河北教育出版社1999年版，第167页，标注其为李回，会昌初年，以户部侍郎兼御史中丞，泽潞平后，以本官同平章事；吴在庆《杜牧集系年校注》，中华书局2008年版,第861页，标注其为李让夷，会昌二年七月，以尚书右丞兼御史中丞迁中书侍郎、同中书门下平章事。）</span><div id='poem_1374879' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374879' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374879?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上李中丞书</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374879")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374879_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374879'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374879'>某入仕十五年间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374879_comment'></div>凡四年在京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374879_comment'></div>其间卧疾乞假。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374879_comment'></div>复居其半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374879_comment'></div>嗜酒好睡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374879_comment'></div>其癖已痼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374879_comment'></div>往往闭户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374879_comment'></div>便经旬日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374879_comment'></div>吊庆参请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374879_comment'></div>多亦废阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374879_comment'></div>至于俯仰进趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374879_comment'></div>随意所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374879_comment'></div>希时徇势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374879_comment'></div>不能逐人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374879_comment'></div>是以官途之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374879_comment'></div>比之辈流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374879_comment'></div>亦多困踬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374879_comment'></div>自顾自念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374879_comment'></div>守道不病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374879_comment'></div>独处思省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374879_comment'></div>亦不自悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374879_comment'></div>然分于当路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374879_comment'></div>必无知已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374879_comment'></div>默默成戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374879_comment'></div>守日待月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374879_comment'></div>冀得一官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374879_comment'></div>以足衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374879_comment'></div>一自拜谒门馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374879_comment'></div>似蒙奖饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374879_comment'></div>敢以恶文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374879_comment'></div>连进机案。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374879_comment'></div>特遇采录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374879_comment'></div>更不因人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374879_comment'></div>许可指教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374879_comment'></div>实为师资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374879_comment'></div>接遇之礼过等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374879_comment'></div>询问之辞悉纤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374879_comment'></div>虽三千里僻守小郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374879_comment'></div>上道之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374879_comment'></div>气色济济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374879_comment'></div>不知沉困之在已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374879_comment'></div>不知升腾之在人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374879_comment'></div>都门带酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374879_comment'></div>笑别亲戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374879_comment'></div>斯乃大君子之遇难逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374879_comment'></div>世途之不偶常事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374879_comment'></div>虽为远宦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374879_comment'></div>适足自宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374879_comment'></div>某世业儒学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374879_comment'></div>自高曾至于某身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374879_comment'></div>家风不坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374879_comment'></div>少小孜孜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374879_comment'></div>至今不怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374879_comment'></div>性颛固不能通经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374879_comment'></div>于治乱兴亡之迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374879_comment'></div>财赋兵甲之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374879_comment'></div>地形之险易远近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374879_comment'></div>古人之长短得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374879_comment'></div>中丞即归廊庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374879_comment'></div>宰制在手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374879_comment'></div>或因时事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374879_comment'></div>召置堂下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374879_comment'></div>坐之与语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374879_comment'></div>此时回顾诸生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374879_comment'></div>必期不辱恩奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374879_comment'></div>今者志尚未泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374879_comment'></div>齿发犹壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374879_comment'></div>敢希指顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374879_comment'></div>一罄肝胆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374879_comment'></div>无任感激血诚之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374879_comment'></div>某恐惧再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_70_1374879_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　在黄州，黄州刺史任上。杜牧与池州刺史李方玄书，倾吐怀抱，谈论学术。作品：《上池州李使君书》<div id='poem_1374866' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374866' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374866?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与池州李使君书</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374866")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374866_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374866'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374866'>景业足下。仆与足下齿同而道不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374866_comment'></div>足下性<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1374866", 1374866, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>俊达</span>坚明。心正而气和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374866_comment'></div>饰以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1374866", 1374866, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>温慎</span>。故处世显明无罪悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374866_comment'></div>仆之所禀。阔略<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1374866", 1374866, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>疏易</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374866_comment'></div>轻微而忽小。然其天与其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374866_comment'></div>知邪柔利已偷苟谗謟可以进取。知之而不能行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374866_comment'></div>非不能行之。抑复见恶之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374866_comment'></div>不能忍一同坐与之交语。故有知之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374866_comment'></div>有怒之者。怒不附已者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374866_comment'></div>怒不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1374866", 1374866, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>恬言柔舌</span>道其盛美者。怒守直道而违已者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374866_comment'></div>知之者皆齿少气锐。读书以贤才自许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374866_comment'></div>但见古人行事。直当如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374866_comment'></div>未得官职。不睹形势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374866_comment'></div>絜絜少辈之徒也。怒仆者足以裂仆之肠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374866_comment'></div>折仆之胫。知仆者不能持一饭与仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374866_comment'></div>仆之不死已幸。况为刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374866_comment'></div>聚骨肉妻子。衣食有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374866_comment'></div>乃大幸也。敢望其他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374866_comment'></div>然与足下之所受性。固不得伍列齐立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374866_comment'></div>亦抵足下疆陇畦畔閒耳。故足下怜仆之厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374866_comment'></div>仆仰足下之多。在京城间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374866_comment'></div>家事人事。终日促束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374866_comment'></div>不得日出所怀以自晓。自然不敢以辈流间期足下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374866_comment'></div>去岁乞假。自江汉间归京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374866_comment'></div>乃知足下出官之由。勇于为义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374866_comment'></div>向者仆之期足下之心。果为不缪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374866_comment'></div>私自喜贺。足下果不负天所付。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374866_comment'></div>与仆所期向。二者所以为喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374866_comment'></div>且自贺也。幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374866_comment'></div>夫子曰。吾少也贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374866_comment'></div>故多能鄙事。复曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374866_comment'></div>不试故艺。圣人尚以少贱不试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374866_comment'></div>乃能多能有艺。况他人哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374866_comment'></div>仆与足下。年未三十为诸侯幕府吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374866_comment'></div>未四十为天子廷臣。不为甚贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374866_comment'></div>不为不试矣。今者齿各甚壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374866_comment'></div>为刺史。各得小郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374866_comment'></div>俱处僻左。幸天下无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374866_comment'></div>人安谷熟。无兵期军须逋负<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1374866", 1374866, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>诤诉</span>之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374866_comment'></div>足以为学。自强自勉于未闻未见之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374866_comment'></div>仆不足道。虽能为学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374866_comment'></div>亦无所益。如足下之才之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374866_comment'></div>真可惜也。向者所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1374866", 1374866, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>俊达</span>坚明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374866_comment'></div>心正而气和。饰以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1374866", 1374866, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>温慎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374866_comment'></div>此才之可惜也。年四十为刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374866_comment'></div>得僻左小郡。有衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374866_comment'></div>无为吏之苦。此时之可惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374866_comment'></div>仆以为天资足下。有异日名声绩业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374866_comment'></div>光于前后。正在今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374866_comment'></div>可不勉之。仆常念生百代之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374866_comment'></div>未必为不幸。何者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374866_comment'></div>以其书具而事多也。今之言者必曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374866_comment'></div>使圣人微旨不传。乃郑元辈为注解之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374866_comment'></div>仆观其所解释。明白完具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374866_comment'></div>虽圣人复生。必挈置数予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374866_comment'></div>坐于游夏之位。若使元辈解释不足为师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374866_comment'></div>安得圣人复生。如周公夫子亲授微旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374866_comment'></div>然后为学。是则圣人不生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374866_comment'></div>终不为学。假使圣人复生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374866_comment'></div>即亦随而汨之矣。此则不学之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374866_comment'></div>好出大言。欺乱常人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374866_comment'></div>自汉已降。其有国者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374866_comment'></div>成败兴废。事业踪迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374866_comment'></div>一二亿万。青黄白黑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374866_comment'></div>据实空有。皆可图画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374866_comment'></div>考其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1374866", 1374866, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>来由</span>。裁其短长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374866_comment'></div>十得四五。足以应当时之务矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374866_comment'></div>不似古人穷天凿元。蹑于无踪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374866_comment'></div>算于忽微。然后能为学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374866_comment'></div>故曰生百代之下。未必为不幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374866_comment'></div>夫子曰。三人行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374866_comment'></div>必有我师焉。此乃随所见闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374866_comment'></div>能不亡失。而思念至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374866_comment'></div>楚王问萍实。对曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374866_comment'></div>吾往年闻童谣而知之。此乃以童子为师耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374866_comment'></div>既参之于上古。复酌之于见闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374866_comment'></div>乃能为圣人也。诸葛孔明曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374866_comment'></div>诸公读书。乃欲为博士耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374866_comment'></div>此盖滞于所见。不知适变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374866_comment'></div>名为腐儒。亦学者之一病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374866_comment'></div>仆自元和已来。以至今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374866_comment'></div>其所见闻名公才人之所论讨。典刑制度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374866_comment'></div>征伐叛乱。考其当时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374866_comment'></div>参于前古。能不忘失而思念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374866_comment'></div>亦可以为一家事业矣。但随见随忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374866_comment'></div>随闻随废。轻目重耳之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374866_comment'></div>此亦学者之一病也。如足下天与之性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374866_comment'></div>万万与仆相远。仆自知顽滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374866_comment'></div>不能苦心为学。假使能学之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374866_comment'></div>亦不能出而施之。恳恳欲成足下之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374866_comment'></div>异日既受足下之教于一官一局。而无过失而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374866_comment'></div>自古未有不学而能垂名于后代者。足下勉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374866_comment'></div>大江之南。夏候郁湿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374866_comment'></div>易生百疾。足下气俊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374866_comment'></div>胸臆间不以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1374866", 1374866, "Clauses/188/Comments/0")'>悁忿</span>是非贮之。邪气不能侵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374866_comment'></div>慎防是晚多食。大醉继饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374866_comment'></div>其他无所道。某再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374866_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_97_1374866_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年11月</a>　在黄州，黄州刺史任上。冬至日，杜牧有诗寄小侄阿宜。作品：《冬至日寄小侄阿宜诗》<div id='poem_32334' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32334' id='poem_sentence_16_32371'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_32371_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年</a>　在黄州，黄州刺史任上。杜牧就己力所能及者，减除弊政。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年4月</a>　在黄州，黄州刺史任上。杜牧上书宰相李德裕，论泽潞兵事，德裕制置泽潞，颇采其言。作品：《上李司徒相公论用兵书》<div id='poem_1374872' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374872' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374872?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上李司徒相公论用兵书</a><span class='authorDate'>（825年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374872")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374872_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374872'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374872'>伏睹明诏。诛山东不受命者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374872_comment'></div>庙堂之上。事在相公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374872_comment'></div>虽樽俎之谋。算画已定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374872_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1374872", 1374872, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>贱末</span>之士。刍荛敢陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374872_comment'></div>伏希舍其狂愚。一赐听览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374872_comment'></div>某大和二年为校书郎。曾诣淮西将军董重质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374872_comment'></div>诘其以三州之众。四岁不破之由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374872_comment'></div>重质自誇勇敢多算之外。复言其不破之由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374872_comment'></div>是徵兵太杂耳。遍徵诸道兵士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374872_comment'></div>上不过五千人。下不至千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374872_comment'></div>既不能自成一军。事须帖附地主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374872_comment'></div>名为客军。每有战阵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374872_comment'></div>客军居前。主人在后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374872_comment'></div>势羸力弱。心志不一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374872_comment'></div>既居前列。多致败亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374872_comment'></div>如战似胜。则主人引救以为已功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374872_comment'></div>小不胜。则主人先退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374872_comment'></div>至有歼焉。初战二年已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374872_comment'></div>战则必胜。是多杀客军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374872_comment'></div>及二年已后。客军殚少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374872_comment'></div>止与陈许河阳全军相搏。纵使唐州军不能因雪取城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374872_comment'></div>蔡州兵力亦不支矣。其时朝廷若使鄂州寿州唐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374872_comment'></div>祇令保境。不用进战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374872_comment'></div>但用陈许郑滑两道全军。帖以宣润弩手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374872_comment'></div>令其守隘。即不出一岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374872_comment'></div>无蔡州矣。今者上党之叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374872_comment'></div>复与淮西不同。淮西为寇仅五十岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374872_comment'></div>破汴州襄州襄城。尽得其财货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374872_comment'></div>输之悬瓠。复败韩全义于溵上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374872_comment'></div>多杀官军四万馀人。输辇财谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374872_comment'></div>数月不尽。是以其人味为寇之腴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374872_comment'></div>见为寇之利。风俗益固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374872_comment'></div>气燄已成。自以为天下之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374872_comment'></div>莫我与敌。父子相勉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374872_comment'></div>仅于两世。根深源阔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374872_comment'></div>取之固难。夫上党则不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374872_comment'></div>自安史南下。不甚附隶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374872_comment'></div>建中之后。每奋忠义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374872_comment'></div>是以郳公抱真能窘田悦。走朱滔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374872_comment'></div>常以孤穷寒苦之军。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1374872", 1374872, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>横折</span>河朔彊梁之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374872_comment'></div>贞元中。节度使李长策卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374872_comment'></div>中使提诏授与本军大将。但军士附者即授之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374872_comment'></div>其时大将来希皓为众所服。中使将以手诏付之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374872_comment'></div>希皓言于众曰。此军取人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374872_comment'></div>合是希皓。但作节度使不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374872_comment'></div>若朝廷以一束草来。希皓亦必敬事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374872_comment'></div>中使言面奉进旨。只令此军取大将授与节龯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374872_comment'></div>朝廷不别除人。希皓固辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374872_comment'></div>押衙卢从史其位居四下。因潜与监军相结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374872_comment'></div>超出伍曰。若来大夫不肯受诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374872_comment'></div>某请且勾当此军。监军曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374872_comment'></div>卢中丞若肯如此。此亦固合圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374872_comment'></div>中使因探怀取诏以授之。从史捧诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374872_comment'></div>再拜舞蹈。希皓回挥同列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374872_comment'></div>使北面称贺。军士毕集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374872_comment'></div>更无一言。从史尔后渐畜奸谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374872_comment'></div>养义儿三千人。日夕煦沫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374872_comment'></div>及父虔死。军士留之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374872_comment'></div>表请起复。亦只义儿与之唱和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374872_comment'></div>其馀大将王翼元乌重允第五钊等及长行兵士。并不同心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374872_comment'></div>及至被擒。乌重允坐于军门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374872_comment'></div>喻以祸福。义儿三千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374872_comment'></div>一取约束。及河阳取孟元阳为之统帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374872_comment'></div>一军无主仅一月日。曾无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1374872", 1374872, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>犬吠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374872_comment'></div>况于他谋。以此證验人心忠赤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374872_comment'></div>习尚专一。可以尽见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374872_comment'></div>及元和十五年。授与刘悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374872_comment'></div>时当幽镇入觐。天下无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374872_comment'></div>柄庙算者。议必销兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374872_comment'></div>雄健敢勇之士。百战千攻之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374872_comment'></div>坐食租赋。其来已久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374872_comment'></div>一旦黜去。使同编户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374872_comment'></div>纷纷诸镇。停解至多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374872_comment'></div>是以天下兵士闻之。无不忿恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374872_comment'></div>至长庆元年七月。幽镇乘此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374872_comment'></div>首唱为乱。昭义一军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374872_comment'></div>初亦郁咈。及诏下诛叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374872_comment'></div>使温起居造宣慰泽潞。便令发兵其时九月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374872_comment'></div>天气已寒。四方全师未颁中冬衣服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374872_comment'></div>聚之授诏。或伍或离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374872_comment'></div>垂手<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1374872", 1374872, "Clauses/160/Comments/0")'>强项</span>。往往谇语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374872_comment'></div>及温起居立于重榻。大布恩旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374872_comment'></div>并疏昭义一军。自七十馀年忠义战伐之功劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374872_comment'></div>安史已还叛逆灭亡之明效。辞语既毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374872_comment'></div>无不欢呼。人衣裋褐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374872_comment'></div>争出效命。其时用兵处处败北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374872_comment'></div>唯昭义一军。于临城县北同果堡下大战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374872_comment'></div>杀贼五千馀人。所杀皆楼下步射搏天飞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374872_comment'></div>贼之精勇。无不歼焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374872_comment'></div>贼中大震。更一月日田布不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374872_comment'></div>贼亦自溃。后一月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374872_comment'></div>其军大乱。杀大将磁州刺史张汶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374872_comment'></div>因劫监军刘承阶。尽杀其下小使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374872_comment'></div>此实承阶侮媟一军。侵取不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374872_comment'></div>张汶随王承元出于镇州。久与昭义相攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374872_comment'></div>军人恶之。汶既因依承阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374872_comment'></div>谋欲杀悟自取。军人忌怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374872_comment'></div>遂至大乱。非悟独能使其如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374872_comment'></div>刘悟卒。从谏求继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1374872_comment'></div>与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1374872", 1374872, "Clauses/198/Comments/0")'>扶同</span>者只郓州随来中军二千耳。其副倅贾直言入责从谏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1374872_comment'></div>尔父提十二州地归之朝廷。其功非细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1374872_comment'></div>祇以张汶之故。自谓不洁淋头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1374872_comment'></div>竟至羞死。尔一孺子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1374872_comment'></div>安敢如此。从谏恐悚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1374872_comment'></div>不敢出言。一军闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1374872_comment'></div>皆阴然直言之说。值宝历多故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1374872_comment'></div>因以授之。今才二十馀岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1374872_comment'></div>风俗未改。故老尚存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1374872_comment'></div>虽欲劫之。必不用命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1374872_comment'></div>伏以河阳西北去天井关强一百里。关隘多山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1374872_comment'></div>井不可凿。虽有兵力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1374872_comment'></div>必恐无功。若以万人为垒下窒其口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1374872_comment'></div>高壁深堑。勿与之战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1374872_comment'></div>忽有败负。势惊洛师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1374872_comment'></div>盖河阳军士。素非精勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1374872_comment'></div>战则不足。守则有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1374872_comment'></div>成德一军。自六十年来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1374872_comment'></div>世与昭义为敌。访闻无事之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1374872_comment'></div>村落邻里。不相往来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1374872_comment'></div>今王司徒代居反侧。思一自雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1374872_comment'></div>况联姻戚。愿奋可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1374872_comment'></div>六十年相雠之兵。仗朝廷委任之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1374872_comment'></div>必宜尽节。以答殊私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1374872_comment'></div>魏博承风。亦当效顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1374872_comment'></div>然亦止于围一城攻一堡。刊木堙井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1374872_comment'></div>系累稚老而已。必不能背二十城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1374872_comment'></div>长驱上山。径捣上党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1374872_comment'></div>其用武之地。必取之策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1374872_comment'></div>在于西面。今者严紫塞之守备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1374872_comment'></div>谨白马之堤防。祇以忠武武宁两军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1374872_comment'></div>以青州五千精甲宣润二千弩手。由绛州路直东径入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1374872_comment'></div>不过数日。必覆其巢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1374872_comment'></div>何者。昭义军粮尽在山东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1374872_comment'></div>泽潞两州全居山内。土瘠地狭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1374872_comment'></div>积谷全无。是以节度使多在邢州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1374872_comment'></div>名为就粮。山东粮谷既不可输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1374872_comment'></div>山西兵士亦必单鲜。捣虚之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1374872_comment'></div>正在于此。后周武帝大举伐齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1374872_comment'></div>路由河阳。吏部宇文㢸曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1374872_comment'></div>夫河阳要冲。精兵所聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1374872_comment'></div>尽力攻围。恐难得志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1374872_comment'></div>如臣所见。彼汾之曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1374872_comment'></div>戌小山平。用武之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1374872_comment'></div>莫过于此。帝不纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1374872_comment'></div>无功而还。后复大举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1374872_comment'></div>竟用㢸计。遂以灭齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1374872_comment'></div>前秦苻坚遣将王猛伐后燕慕容伟。大破伟将慕容评于潞州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1374872_comment'></div>因遂灭之。路亦由此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1374872_comment'></div>北齐高欢再攻后周。路亦由此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1374872_comment'></div>而后周名将韦孝宽齐王攸常镇勋州玉璧城。故东西相伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1374872_comment'></div>每由此路。以古为證。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1374872_comment'></div>得之者多。以某愚见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1374872_comment'></div>不言刘稹终不能取。贵欲速擒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1374872_comment'></div>免生他患。昨者北虏才毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1374872_comment'></div>复生上党。赖相公庙算深远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1374872_comment'></div>北虏即日败亡。傥使北虏至今尚存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1374872_comment'></div>沿边犹须转战。回顾上党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1374872_comment'></div>岂能讨除。天下虽言无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1374872_comment'></div>若上党久不能解。别生患难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1374872_comment'></div>此亦非细。自古皆因攻伐未解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1374872_comment'></div>旁有他变。故孙子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1374872_comment'></div>兵闻拙速。未睹巧之久也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1374872_comment'></div>伏闻圣主全以兵事付于相公。某受恩最深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1374872_comment'></div>窃敢干冒威严。远陈愚见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1374872_comment'></div>无任战汗。某顿首再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1374872_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_165_1374872_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年</a>　在黄州，黄州刺史任上。杜牧作文记祭城隍神祈雨一事。作品：《祭城隍神祈雨文》<div id='poem_1374936' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374936' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374936?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭城隍神祈雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374936")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374936_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374936'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374936'>下土之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374936_comment'></div>天实有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374936_comment'></div>五谷丰实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374936_comment'></div>寒暑合节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374936_comment'></div>天实生之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374936_comment'></div>苗房甲而水湮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374936_comment'></div>苗秀好而旱莠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374936_comment'></div>饥即必死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374936_comment'></div>天实杀之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374936_comment'></div>天实有人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374936_comment'></div>生之孰敢言天之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374936_comment'></div>杀之孰敢言天之不仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374936_comment'></div>刺史吏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374936_comment'></div>三岁一交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374936_comment'></div>如彼管库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374936_comment'></div>敢有其宝玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374936_comment'></div>如彼传舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374936_comment'></div>敢治其居室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374936_comment'></div>东海孝妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374936_comment'></div>吏冤杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374936_comment'></div>天实冤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374936_comment'></div>杀吏可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374936_comment'></div>东海之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374936_comment'></div>于妇何辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374936_comment'></div>而三年旱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374936_comment'></div>刺史性愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374936_comment'></div>治或不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374936_comment'></div>厉其身可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374936_comment'></div>绝其命可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374936_comment'></div>吉福殃恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374936_comment'></div>止当其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374936_comment'></div>胡为降旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374936_comment'></div>毒彼百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374936_comment'></div>谨书诚恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374936_comment'></div>本之于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374936_comment'></div>神能格天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374936_comment'></div>为我申闻。</div><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374883_comment'></div>建中日。田悦名曰腹中之眼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374883_comment'></div>带甲十万。籍土五州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374883_comment'></div>太行夷仪。为其扃关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374883_comment'></div>健马强弓。为其羽翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374883_comment'></div>自逆党专有。仅及一世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374883_comment'></div>颇闻教育。实曰精强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374883_comment'></div>昨者凶专地之请初陈。圣主整旅之诏将下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374883_comment'></div>中外远迩。皆疑难攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374883_comment'></div>蜂虿螗螂。颇亦自负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374883_comment'></div>伏惟相公上符神断。潜运庙谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374883_comment'></div>仗宗社威灵。䘪风云雷电。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374883_comment'></div>掌上必取。彀中难逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374883_comment'></div>才逾周星。果枭逆首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374883_comment'></div>周公东征之役。捷至三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374883_comment'></div>宪皇淮夷之师。尅闻四岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374883_comment'></div>校虏寇之强弱。曾不等伦。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年</a>　在黄州，黄州刺史任上。杜牧作文一篇。作品：《塞废井文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（该文作于黄州，难定何年，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1374909' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374909' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374909?labeling=true' target='_blank'>塞废井文</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374909")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374909_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374909'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374909'>井废辄不塞。于古无所据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374909_comment'></div>今之州府厅事。有井废不塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374909_comment'></div>居第在堂上。有井废亦不塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374909_comment'></div>或匣而护之。或横木以土覆之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374909_comment'></div>至有岁久木朽。陷人以至于死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374909_comment'></div>世俗终不塞之。不知出何典故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374909_comment'></div>而井不可塞。井虽列在五祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374909_comment'></div>在都邑中。物之小者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374909_comment'></div>若盘庚五迁其都。若社稷宗庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374909_comment'></div>尚毁其旧。而独井岂不塞邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374909_comment'></div>古者井田九顷。八家环而居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374909_comment'></div>一夫食一顷。中一顷树蔬凿井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374909_comment'></div>而八家共汲之。所以籍齐民而重泄地气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374909_comment'></div>以小喻大。人身有疮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374909_comment'></div>不医即死。木有疮久不封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374909_comment'></div>即亦死。地有千万疮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374909_comment'></div>于地何如哉。古者八家共一井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374909_comment'></div>今家有一井。或至大家至于四五井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374909_comment'></div>十倍多于古。地气漏泄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374909_comment'></div>则所产脆薄。人生于地内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374909_comment'></div>今之人不若古之人浑刚坚一。宁不由地气泄漏哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374909_comment'></div>易曰。改邑不改井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374909_comment'></div>此取象言安也。非井不可塞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374909_comment'></div>天下每州春秋二时。天子许抽常所上赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374909_comment'></div>锡宴其刺史及州吏。必廓其地为大宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374909_comment'></div>以张其事。黄州当是地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374909_comment'></div>有古井不塞。故为文投之而实以土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374909_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1374909_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: -----title
贵池（秋浦）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='d554be9e200e434f910186e29c971c0d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d554be9e200e434f910186e29c971c0d");'><span id='d554be9e200e434f910186e29c971c0d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=846')">844-846年</a>，42-44岁</div><div id='d554be9e200e434f910186e29c971c0d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年9月</a>　九月，杜牧迁池州刺史，代李方玄之任。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年</a>　在池州，池州刺史任上。杜牧上宰相李德裕书，论防御回鹘事，德裕称善。作品：《上李太尉论北边事启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文具体创作时间不详，盖作于会昌四年八月至会昌五年五月之间，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1374882' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374882' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374882?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上李太尉论北边事启</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374882")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374882_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374882'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374882'>某启。伏以圣主垂衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374882_comment'></div>太尉当轴。威德上显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374882_comment'></div>和泽下流。诸侯无异心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374882_comment'></div>百姓无怨气。星辰顺静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374882_comment'></div>日月光明。天业益昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374882_comment'></div>圣统无极。既功成而理定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374882_comment'></div>实道尊而名垂。今则未闻纵东山之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374882_comment'></div>乐后园之醉。惕惕若不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374882_comment'></div>兢兢而如无。岂不以边障尚惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374882_comment'></div>殊虏未殄。防其入寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374882_comment'></div>犹须徵兵。伏以回鹘种落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374882_comment'></div>人数非多。校于突厥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374882_comment'></div>绝为小弱。今者国破众叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374882_comment'></div>逃来漠南。为羁旅之魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374882_comment'></div>食草莱之实。白鬣骊骍之骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374882_comment'></div>凋耗巳无。湩酪皮毳之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374882_comment'></div>饥寒皆尽。寄命杂种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374882_comment'></div>藏迹阴山。取之及时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374882_comment'></div>可以一战。今者度虏之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374882_comment'></div>不出二者。时去时来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374882_comment'></div>回翔不决。必有所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374882_comment'></div>西戎巳得要约。伺其气势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374882_comment'></div>同为侵扰。此其一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374882_comment'></div>心胆破坏。马畜残少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374882_comment'></div>且于美水荐草。暖日广川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374882_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1374882", 1374882, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>牧马</span>养习。以俟强大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374882_comment'></div>此其二也。今者徵中国之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374882_comment'></div>与之首尾。久戍则有师老费财之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374882_comment'></div>深入则有大寒瘃堕之苦。示戎狄之弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374882_comment'></div>生奸杰之心。今者不取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374882_comment'></div>恐贻后患。敢以管见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374882_comment'></div>上干<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1374882", 1374882, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>尊重</span>。自两汉伐虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374882_comment'></div>皆是秋冬不过百日。驱中国之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374882_comment'></div>入苦寒之地。此时匈奴劲弓折胶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374882_comment'></div>童马免乳。畜肥草壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374882_comment'></div>力全气盛。与之相校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374882_comment'></div>胜少败多。故匈奴云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374882_comment'></div>汉实大国也。但其人不能辛苦尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374882_comment'></div>此所谓避虚而击实。逃短而攻长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374882_comment'></div>至于后魏崔浩。因见其理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374882_comment'></div>蠕蠕强盛。屡犯北边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374882_comment'></div>浩请讨之曰。蠕蠕恃其地远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374882_comment'></div>自宽巳久。故夏则散众放畜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374882_comment'></div>秋肥乃聚。背寒向暄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374882_comment'></div>南来寇抄。今出其虑表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374882_comment'></div>掩其不备。大兵卒至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374882_comment'></div>必惊骇星分。向尘奔走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374882_comment'></div>牡马护牧。牝马恋驹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374882_comment'></div>驱驰难制。不得水草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374882_comment'></div>未过数日。则聚而困毙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374882_comment'></div>可一举而灭矣。武帝从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374882_comment'></div>及军入境。蠕蠕先不设备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374882_comment'></div>民畜布野。惊怖四奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374882_comment'></div>莫相收摄。于是分军扑讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374882_comment'></div>东西五千里。南北三千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374882_comment'></div>凡所俘虏。及获畜产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374882_comment'></div>弥漫山泽。高车因杀蠕蠕积类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374882_comment'></div>归降者三十馀万落。虏遂散乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374882_comment'></div>帝沿弱水西行。至涿邪山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374882_comment'></div>诸大将虑深入恐有伏兵。劝帝停止不追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374882_comment'></div>浩先劝穷追之不从。后闻凉州贾胡言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374882_comment'></div>若更前行三日。则尽灭之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374882_comment'></div>帝深恨之。以某所见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374882_comment'></div>今若以幽并突阵之骑。酒泉教射之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374882_comment'></div>整饬诫誓。仲夏潜发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374882_comment'></div>计阴山与涿邪之远近。十不一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374882_comment'></div>校蠕蠕回鹘之强弱。犹如虎鼠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374882_comment'></div>五月节气。在中夏则热。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374882_comment'></div>到阴山尚寒。中国之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374882_comment'></div>足以施展。行军于枕席之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374882_comment'></div>玩寇于掌股之间。軏轠悬瓶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374882_comment'></div>汤沃晛雪。一举无疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374882_comment'></div>必然之策。今冰合防秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374882_comment'></div>冰销解戍。行之已久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374882_comment'></div>虏为长然。出其意外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374882_comment'></div>实为上策。议者或云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374882_comment'></div>北取黠戛。令讨回鹘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374882_comment'></div>伏以黠戛起于别种。超为可汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374882_comment'></div>必是英杰。天时必助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374882_comment'></div>贤才必用。法令必明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374882_comment'></div>灭回鹘之后。便是勍敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374882_comment'></div>况示之以弱。必为所轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374882_comment'></div>今者四海九州。同风共贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374882_comment'></div>诸侯用命。年谷丰熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374882_comment'></div>可以瘗元玉于常山。孑遗人于河垄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374882_comment'></div>顾兹疲虏。岂遗子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374882_comment'></div>伏惟太尉相公文德素昭。武功复著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374882_comment'></div>画地而兵形尽见。按璅而边事无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374882_comment'></div>唯一指踪。即可扫迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374882_comment'></div>昔汉武帝之求贤也。有上书不足采者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374882_comment'></div>辄报罢去。未尝罪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374882_comment'></div>故能羁越臣胡。大兴礼乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374882_comment'></div>今太尉与仁圣天子同德。有志之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374882_comment'></div>无不愿死。伏惟特宽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_93_1374882", 1374882, "Clauses/187/Comments/0")'>狂狷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374882_comment'></div>不赐诛责。生死荣荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374882_comment'></div>无任感恩攀恋惶惧汗慄之至。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374882_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1374882_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年</a>　在池州，池州刺史任上。杜牧闻朝廷以刘濛为巡边使准备收复河湟，作诗表达关切。作品：《皇风》<div id='poem_32357' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32357' class='poemTitle "poem_allusion_32357")'>化人汉文帝</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_32357_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32357'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32357'>仁圣天子神且武，内兴文教外披攘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32357'>以德<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4137, "poem_sentence_1_32357")'>化人汉文帝</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1228, "poem_sentence_1_32357")'>侧身修道</span>周宣王。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32357'>迒<span class='inlineComment2'>（音刚）</span>蹊巢穴尽窒塞，礼乐刑政皆弛张。<div id='poem_sentence_2_32357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_32357'>何当提笔侍巡狩，前驱白旆吊河湟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_32357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_32357'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_32357_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年</a>　在池州，池州刺史任上。杜牧送别友人孟迟，作诗一首。作品：《池州送孟迟先辈》《重送》<div id='poem_32338' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32338' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a "poem_allusion_32338")'>黥阵</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8456, "poem_allusion_32338")'>头角折</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_32338_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32338'>奉披<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_32338", 32338, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>尘意</span>惊，立语平生豁。<div
