id='poem_allusion_32363'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1349, "poem_allusion_32363")'>相如</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_32363_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32363'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32363'>手撚金仆姑，腰悬玉辘轳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32363'>爬头峰北正好去，系取可汗钳作奴。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32363'>六宫虽念<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1349, "poem_sentence_2_32363")'>相如</span>赋，其那防边重武夫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_32363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_32363'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_32363_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>　在池州，池州刺史任上。杜牧上书于宰相李德裕，论江贼事。作品：《上李太尉论江贼书》<div id='poem_1374873' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374873' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374873?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上李太尉论江贼书</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374873")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374873_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374873'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374873'>伏以太尉持柄在上。当轴处中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374873_comment'></div>未及五年。一齐四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374873_comment'></div>德振法束。贪廉懦立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374873_comment'></div>有司各敬其事。在位莫匪其任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374873_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1374873", 1374873, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>九官</span>事舜。十人佐周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374873_comment'></div>校于太尉。未可为比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374873_comment'></div>伏以江淮赋税。国用根本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374873_comment'></div>今有大患。是劫江贼耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374873_comment'></div>某到任才九月。日寻穷询访。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374873_comment'></div>实知端倪。夫劫贼徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374873_comment'></div>上至三船两船百人五十人。下不减三二十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374873_comment'></div>始肯行劫。劫杀商旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374873_comment'></div>婴孩不留。所劫商人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374873_comment'></div>皆得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1374873", 1374873, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>异色</span>财物。尽将南渡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374873_comment'></div>入山博茶。盖以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1374873", 1374873, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>异色</span>财物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374873_comment'></div>不敢货于城市。唯有茶山可以销受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374873_comment'></div>盖以茶熟之际。四远商人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374873_comment'></div>皆将锦绣缯缬金钗银钏。入山交易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374873_comment'></div>妇人稚子。尽衣华服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374873_comment'></div>吏见不问。人见不惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374873_comment'></div>是以贼徒得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1374873", 1374873, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>异色</span>财物。亦来其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374873_comment'></div>便有店肆为其囊橐。得茶之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374873_comment'></div>出为平人。三二十人挟持兵仗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374873_comment'></div>凡是镇戌。例皆单弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374873_comment'></div>止可供亿浆茗。呼召指使而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374873_comment'></div>镇戌所由。皆云<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1374873", 1374873, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>赊死</span>易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374873_comment'></div>就死难。纵贼不捉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374873_comment'></div>事败抵法。谓之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1374873", 1374873, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>赊死</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374873_comment'></div>与贼相拒。立见杀害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374873_comment'></div>谓之就死。若或人少被捉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374873_comment'></div>罪抵止于私茶。故贼云以茶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1374873", 1374873, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>压身</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374873_comment'></div>始能行得。凡千万辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374873_comment'></div>尽贩私茶。亦有已聚徒党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374873_comment'></div>水劫不便。逢遇草市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374873_comment'></div>泊舟津口。便行陆劫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374873_comment'></div>白昼入市。杀人取财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374873_comment'></div>多亦纵火。唱棹徐去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374873_comment'></div>去年十月十九日。劫池州青阳县市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374873_comment'></div>凡杀六人。内取一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374873_comment'></div>屠刳心腹。仰天祭拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374873_comment'></div>自迩以来。频于邻州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374873_comment'></div>大有劫杀。沉舟灭迹者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374873_comment'></div>即莫知其数。凡江淮草市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374873_comment'></div>尽近水际。富室大户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374873_comment'></div>多居其间。自十五年来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374873_comment'></div>江南江北。凡名草市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374873_comment'></div>劫杀皆遍。只有三年再劫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374873_comment'></div>无有五年获安者。一劫之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374873_comment'></div>州县糜费。所由寻捉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374873_comment'></div>烽火四出。凡是平人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374873_comment'></div>多被恐胁。求取之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374873_comment'></div>恩雠并行。追逮證验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374873_comment'></div>穷根寻叶。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1374873", 1374873, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>狼虎</span>满路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374873_comment'></div>狴牢充塞。四五月后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374873_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1374873", 1374873, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>炎郁</span>蒸湿。一夫有疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374873_comment'></div>染习多死。免之则踪迹未白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374873_comment'></div>杀之则赃状不明。一狱之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374873_comment'></div>凡五十人中。二十人悉是此辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374873_comment'></div>至于真贼。十人不得一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374873_comment'></div>濠亳徐泗汴宋州贼。多劫江南淮南宣润等道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374873_comment'></div>许蔡申光州贼。多劫荆襄鄂岳等道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374873_comment'></div>劫得财物。皆是博茶北归本州货卖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374873_comment'></div>循环往来。终而复始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374873_comment'></div>更有江南土人。相为表里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374873_comment'></div>校其多少。十居其半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374873_comment'></div>盖以倚淮介江。兵戈之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374873_comment'></div>为郡守者。罕得文吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374873_comment'></div>村乡聚落。皆有兵仗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374873_comment'></div>公然作贼。十家九亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374873_comment'></div>江淮所由。屹不敢入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374873_comment'></div>其间所能捉获。又是沿江架船之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374873_comment'></div>村落负担之类。临时胁去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374873_comment'></div>分得涓毫。雄健聚啸之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374873_comment'></div>尽不能获。为江湖之公害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374873_comment'></div>作乡闾之大残。未有革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374873_comment'></div>实可痛恨。今若令宣润洪鄂各一百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374873_comment'></div>淮南四百人。每船以三十人为率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374873_comment'></div>一千二百人分为四十船。择少健者为之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1374873", 1374873, "Clauses/155/Comments/0")'>主将</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374873_comment'></div>仍于本界江岸。创立营壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374873_comment'></div>置本判官专判其事。拣择精锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374873_comment'></div>牢为舟棹。昼夜上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374873_comment'></div>分番巡检。明立殿最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374873_comment'></div>必行赏罚。江南北岸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374873_comment'></div>添置官渡。百里率一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374873_comment'></div>尽绝私载。每一宗船上下交送。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374873_comment'></div>是桴鼓之声。千里相接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374873_comment'></div>私渡尽绝。江中有兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374873_comment'></div>安有乌合蚁聚之辈。敢议攻劫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374873_comment'></div>或曰。制置太大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374873_comment'></div>不假如此。答曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374873_comment'></div>今西北边御未来之寇。备向化之戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374873_comment'></div>长倾东南物产。供百万口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374873_comment'></div>况长江五千里。来往百万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374873_comment'></div>日杀不辜。水满冤骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374873_comment'></div>至于婴稚。曾不肯留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374873_comment'></div>葛伯杀饷童子。汤征灭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374873_comment'></div>盖以童子无知而杀之。王者不舍其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374873_comment'></div>今长江连海。群盗如麻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374873_comment'></div>骤雨绝弦。不可寻逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1374873_comment'></div>无关可闭。无要可防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1374873_comment'></div>今者自出五道兵士。不要朝廷添兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1374873_comment'></div>活江湖赋税之乡。绝寇盗劫杀之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1374873_comment'></div>政理之急。莫过于斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1374873_comment'></div>若此制置。凡去三害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1374873_comment'></div>而有三利。人不冤死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1374873_comment'></div>去一害也。乡闾获安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1374873_comment'></div>无追逮證验之苦。去二害也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1374873_comment'></div>每擒一私茶贼。皆称买卖停泊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1374873_comment'></div>恣口点染。盐铁监院追扰平人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1374873_comment'></div>搜求财货。今私茶尽黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1374873_comment'></div>去三害也。商旅通流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1374873_comment'></div>万货不乏。获一利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1374873_comment'></div>乡闾安堵。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_112_1374873", 1374873, "Clauses/225/Comments/0")'>狴犴</span>空虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1374873_comment'></div>获二利也。撷茶之饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1374873_comment'></div>尽入公室。获三利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1374873_comment'></div>三害尽去。三利必滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1374873_comment'></div>穷根寻源。在劫贼耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1374873_comment'></div>故江西观察使裴谊。召得贼帅陈璠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1374873_comment'></div>署以军中职名。委以江湖之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1374873_comment'></div>陈璠健勇。分毫不私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1374873_comment'></div>自后廉察。悉皆委任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1374873_comment'></div>至今陈璠每出彭蠡湖口。领徒东下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1374873_comment'></div>商船百数。随璠行止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1374873_comment'></div>璠去之后。惘然相吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1374873_comment'></div>安有清朝盛时。太尉在位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1374873_comment'></div>反使万里行旅。依一陈璠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1374873_comment'></div>某详观格律敕条百二十卷。其间制置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1374873_comment'></div>无不该备。至于微细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1374873_comment'></div>亦或再三。唯有江寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1374873_comment'></div>未尝言及。今四夷九州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1374873_comment'></div>文化武伏。奉贡走职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1374873_comment'></div>罔不如法。言其功德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1374873_comment'></div>皆归太尉。敢率愚衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1374873_comment'></div>上干明虑。冀裨亿万之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1374873_comment'></div>无任战汗惶惧之至。某谨再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1374873_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_135_1374873_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>　在池州，池州刺史任上。杜牧游池州林泉寺金碧洞，有诗记之。作品：《游池州林泉寺金碧洞》<div id='poem_32078' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32078' id='poem_sentence_2_1374904_comment'></div>某太和三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374904_comment'></div>佐沈吏部江西府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374904_comment'></div>暇日公与宾吏<span id='poem_note_32167_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年4月</a>　在池州，池州刺史任上。四月，友人李方玄卒于宣城客舍，年四十三，杜牧作文伤悼。作品：《祭故处州李使君文》<div id='poem_1374939' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374939' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374939?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭故处州李使君文</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374939")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374939_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374939'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374939'>维会昌五年岁次乙丑某月日。池州刺史杜牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374939_comment'></div>谨遣军事押衙王鏶。谨以清酌庶馐之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374939_comment'></div>敬致祭于亡友李君起居之灵。忆昔相遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374939_comment'></div>两未生须。京师众中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374939_comment'></div>迹犹甚疏。一言道合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374939_comment'></div>尽写有无。我于宣城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374939_comment'></div>忝迹宾吏。君随幕府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374939_comment'></div>东下继至。复与友人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374939_comment'></div>故薛子威。邂逅适愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374939_comment'></div>如相为期。放论剧谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374939_comment'></div>各持是非。攻强讨深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374939_comment'></div>张矛彀机。怒或赩赫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374939_comment'></div>终成笑嬉。于后七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374939_comment'></div>君拜左史。来蜀西川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374939_comment'></div>我官补阙。云愧我先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374939_comment'></div>拜章请代。盖私我焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374939_comment'></div>我有家事。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1374939", 1374939, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>乞假</span>南来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374939_comment'></div>循行里第。君出离杯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374939_comment'></div>令弟在席。恣为诙谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374939_comment'></div>耳热胆张。觥联相𧱉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374939_comment'></div>我归坠马。一支几摧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374939_comment'></div>君来我坐。侧倚旁偎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374939_comment'></div>持简酸吟。戏口犹开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374939_comment'></div>云君我杀。以酒相加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374939_comment'></div>忌我之才。及我南去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374939_comment'></div>君刺池阳。我守黄冈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374939_comment'></div>葭苇之场。惟君书信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374939_comment'></div>前后相望。辞意纤悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374939_comment'></div>勉我自强。律我性情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374939_comment'></div>补短裁长。一函每发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374939_comment'></div>沈忧并忘。幸会交代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374939_comment'></div>沿楫若飞。江山九月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374939_comment'></div>凉风满衣。为别几时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374939_comment'></div>多少欢悲。志业益广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374939_comment'></div>不可窥知。长人之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374939_comment'></div>首为吏师。纵酒十日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374939_comment'></div>舞袖僛垂。语公之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374939_comment'></div>且及其私。许以季女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374939_comment'></div>配我长儿。莫云稚齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374939_comment'></div>可以指期。各负少壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374939_comment'></div>轻后会时。寓居宣城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374939_comment'></div>书札日驰。一疾不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374939_comment'></div>讣来犹疑。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374939_comment'></div>惟先仆射。俭德冠古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374939_comment'></div>凡二十年。四领茅土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374939_comment'></div>所至所治。曰人父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374939_comment'></div>官俸馀半。委库不取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374939_comment'></div>京师里第。蓬茅数亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374939_comment'></div>庆馀生君。曰天酬补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374939_comment'></div>何聪明才智兮。不使施为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374939_comment'></div>何付与之多兮。折之何暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374939_comment'></div>天阳地阴。高厚相侔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374939_comment'></div>上有河汉。鈲天横流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374939_comment'></div>百刻昼夜。平分不饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374939_comment'></div>皎不阴晦。一月几朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374939_comment'></div>二男三女。俗率如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374939_comment'></div>三男二女。无有其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374939_comment'></div>君子小人。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1374939", 1374939, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>鼻目</span>并列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374939_comment'></div>与小人校。会无百一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374939_comment'></div>于百一中。以秀夺实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374939_comment'></div>凡禀阴阳。生于其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374939_comment'></div>阳常不胜。贤者宜艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374939_comment'></div>自古皆然。欲复何言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374939_comment'></div>抚孤一吊。拍棺一哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374939_comment'></div>咫尺不遂。涕下相续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374939_comment'></div>期于没齿。尽力嗣子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374939_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。伏惟尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374939_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_67_1374939_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>　在池州，池州刺史任上。有诗寄友人李中敏。作品：《李给事二首》<div id='poem_32186' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32186' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_2_32185_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_32185'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(550, "poem_sentence_3_32185")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_32185", 32185, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>曲突徙薪</span></span>人不会，海边今作钓鱼翁。<div id='poem_sentence_3_32185_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_32185'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_32185_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_32185'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_32185_1'>⑴ 李膺退罢，归纶氏，教授生徒，给事论郑注，告满归颍阳</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_32185_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年5月</a>　在池州，池州刺史任上。作品：《唐故宣州观察使御史大夫韦公墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（韦温去世具体日期据杜牧为其所作墓志铭。）</span><div id='poem_1374921' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374921' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374921?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故宣州观察使御史大夫韦公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374921")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1374921_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1374921'>韦公会昌五年五月头始生疮。召子婿张复鲁曰。三稚女得良婿。死以是托。墓宜以池州剌史杜牧为志。复鲁曰。公去岁两疮生头。今始一尚微。何言之深。公曰。吾年二十九官校书郎时。尝梦涉浐水。既中流。有二人若举符召我者。其一人曰。坟墓至大万日始成。今未也。今万日矣。天已告我。我其可逃乎。谢医不问。以其月十四日。年五十八薨于位。公从父弟某书公功行。以公命来命牧。牧位哭。序且铭之。公讳温。字宏育。韦氏自殷周秦汉。邱明马迁班固辈争书其人。以光其所为书。至后周逍遥公夐。出世家富贵中。隐身行道。当其时及后代论者。以蜀严郑谷口不能为比。逍遥公五世生潞州上党尉赠谏议大夫希元。上党生吏部侍郎赠太尉肇。吏部生右补阙翰林学士右散骑常侍致仕赠司空绶。常侍生公。于逍遥公为九代孙。年十一。以明经取第。为太常寺奉礼郎秘书省校书郎。选判入等。咸阳尉监察御史。公曰。是官岂奉养所宜耶。上疏乞免。改著作佐郎。当贞元中。常侍公事德宗为翰林学士。帝深于文学。明察人间细微事。事有密切。多委之。岁久忧畏病心。帝曰。某之心我其尽之。以致仕官屏居西郊。公早夜侍侧。温凊饮食。迎情解意。一经心手。积二十馀年。丁常侍丧。自毁不欲生。后相国李公逢吉以相印镇武昌。皆虚上职书。卑辞至门。公起赴武昌。未至府。拜监察御史。迁左补阙。事文宗皇帝。时宰相百吏。愿条帝功德。撰号上献。公独再疏曰。今蜀之东川川溢杀万家。京师雪积五尺。老幼多冻死。岂崇虚名报上帝时耶。帝乃止。遂讫十五年不答尊号事。改侍御史尚书吏部考功员外郎。当大和九年。文宗思拔用德行超出者。以警𢥠天下。故公自考功不数月拜谏议大夫。召为翰林学士。遂欲相之。公立银台外门下。拜送疏入。具道先常侍遗诫。子孙不令任密职。言恳志决。乃命掌书舍人阁下。公复坚让。不半岁。转太常少卿。一岁迁给事中皇太子侍读。公复陈先诫。以侍读辞。自宰相下皆曰。帝以一子请教于公。是宜避耶。公不听。凡拜三章。帝终不能夺。灵武节度使王晏平罢灵武。以战马四百匹兵器数万事去。罪成贬康州司户。不旬日。改抚州司马。仙韶院乐官尉迟璋以乐官授光州长史。晏平以财赂贵倖。璋太有宠于上。公皆封诏书上还。上比谕之。公持益急。竟以康州还晏平。璋免长史。庄恪太子得罪。上召东西省御史中丞郎官于内殿。悉疏庄恪过恶。欲立废之。曰。是宜为天子乎。群公低首唯唯。公独进曰。陛下唯一子。不教。陷之至是。太子岂独过乎。上意稍平。不数日。迁尚书右丞。朱衣鱼章。迁兵部侍郎。亟请丞相。愿为治人官。出为陕州防御使兼御史大夫。服章金紫。回鹘窥边。刘桢继以上党叛。东徵天下兵。西出禁兵。陕当其冲。公抚民供事就不两告苦。入为吏部侍郎。典一冬选。老吏无所卖。复以御史大夫出为宣歙池等州观察使。赋多口众。最于江南。公急恶宽穷。益自俭苦。刑律其俗。凡周一岁。无所更改。自至大治。公幼不戏弄。冠为老成人。解褐得官。超出群众中。人不敢旁发戏嫚。及为公卿。在朝廷省閤中。大臣见公。若临绝壑。先忖度语言举止。然后出发。其所执持不可者。笔一落纸。言一出口。虽天子宰相。知不能夺。俯委遂之。不以德行尚人。人自敬畏。不施要结于人。人自亲慕。后进凡持节业自许者。获公一言。矜奋刻削。益自贵重。官卑家贫时。主将家事。在私阃内。高曾兄弟。镌琢教诱。嫁娶衣食。无有二等。疾甚将终。悉召亲属宾吏。称先常侍诗句云。在室愧屋漏。因曰。今知没身不负斯诫。遂涕下不禁。当夫子世。得七十子。国小俗俭。复有圣人为之师。使生于今。与公相后先。必有能品之者。夫人陇西李氏。赞善大夫怂之女。先公四岁终。生四男。长曰礭。前国子监四门助教。次曰璆。前明经。次曰镶。次未免乳。女四人。长嫁南阳张复鲁。复鲁得进士第。有名于时。为试太常寺协律郎鄂岳观察支使。其下皆稚齿相次。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1374921_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374921'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374921'>德则至矣，位以充乎。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1374921_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1374921'>如其充兮，可大厥功。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1374921_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32321")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_32321_comment'></div><div onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7153, "poem_allusion_32321")'>求五鼎</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_32321_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32321'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32321'>为吏非循吏，论书读底书。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32321'>晚花红艳静，高树绿阴初。<div id='poem_sentence_2_32321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_32321'>亭宇清无比，溪山画不如。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=846&endYear=846')">846年</a>　在池州，池州刺史任上。杜牧登九峰楼，有诗感怀。作品：《登九峰楼》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此条活动具体时间不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_32373' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32373' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/32373?labeling=true' target='_blank'>登九峰楼</a><span class='authorDate'>（846年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32373")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_32373_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32373'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32373'>晴江滟滟含浅沙，高低绕郭滞秋花。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32373_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32373'>牛歌鱼笛山月上，鹭渚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_32373", 32373, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>鹙梁</span>溪日斜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32373_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32373'>为郡异乡徒泥酒，杜陵芳草岂无家。<div id='poem_sentence_2_32373_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_32373'>白头搔杀倚柱遍，归棹何时闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_32373", 32373, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>轧鸦</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_32373_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_32373'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_32373_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=846&endYear=846')">846年</a>　在池州，池州刺史任上。杜牧作文上宰相白敏中。作品：《上白相公启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1374884' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374884' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374884?labeling=true' "poem_title_1374884")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374884_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374884'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374884'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374884_comment'></div>伏维相公上佐圣主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374884_comment'></div>独专魁柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374884_comment'></div>封殖良善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374884_comment'></div>修整纪纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374884_comment'></div>练群臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374884_comment'></div>谨百职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374884_comment'></div>考功绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374884_comment'></div>覈名实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374884_comment'></div>大张公室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374884_comment'></div>尽闭私门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374884_comment'></div>盛德大功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374884_comment'></div>直笔实光于简策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374884_comment'></div>清节细行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374884_comment'></div>祝史不愧于神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374884_comment'></div>天下望之为准绳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374884_comment'></div>朝廷倚之为依据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374884_comment'></div>毕公克勤小物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374884_comment'></div>周公焕发大猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374884_comment'></div>邴吉陋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1374884", 1374884, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>案吏</span>于公庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374884_comment'></div>袁安不锢人于圣代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374884_comment'></div>卫将军有长揖之客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374884_comment'></div>张子儒无谢恩之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374884_comment'></div>吉甫率由旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374884_comment'></div>魏相能明故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374884_comment'></div>房杜不以求备取人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374884_comment'></div>不以已长格物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374884_comment'></div>姚梁公先有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374884_comment'></div>修旧法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374884_comment'></div>下位各得言其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374884_comment'></div>百司各得尽其才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374884_comment'></div>求于古人之贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374884_comment'></div>皆集相公之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374884_comment'></div>如以尺量刀解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374884_comment'></div>粉布墨画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374884_comment'></div>大小铢黍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374884_comment'></div>丸角尖缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374884_comment'></div>各尽其分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374884_comment'></div>皆当其任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374884_comment'></div>是以庶人不议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374884_comment'></div>乡校无言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374884_comment'></div>天下欣欣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374884_comment'></div>若更生者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374884_comment'></div>自此黄发之老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374884_comment'></div>待哺之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374884_comment'></div>不见兵戈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374884_comment'></div>不离抱抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374884_comment'></div>清庙之祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374884_comment'></div>四夷来助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374884_comment'></div>苍生之愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374884_comment'></div>百志皆成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374884_comment'></div>禺禺万方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374884_comment'></div>实悬斯望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374884_comment'></div>某远守僻左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374884_comment'></div>无因起居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374884_comment'></div>但采风谣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374884_comment'></div>亦能歌咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374884_comment'></div>无任攀恋激切之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374884_comment'></div>谨启。</div><div id='poem_sentence_58_1374884_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=846&endYear=846')">846年</a>　在池州，池州刺史任上。杜牧作文一篇，祭木瓜神。作品：《祭木瓜神文》<div id='poem_1374938' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374938' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374938?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭木瓜山神文</a><span class='authorDate'>（846年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374938")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374938_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374938'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374938'>维会昌六年岁次丙寅某月某日。某官敬告于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1374938", 1374938, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>木瓜山</span>之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374938_comment'></div>惟神聪明格天。能降云雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374938_comment'></div>郡有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1374938", 1374938, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>灾旱</span>。必能救之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374938_comment'></div>前后刺史。祈无不应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374938_comment'></div>去岁七月。苗将萎死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374938_comment'></div>祷神之际。甘雨随至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374938_comment'></div>稿然凶岁。化为丰年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374938_comment'></div>仰神之灵。感神之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374938_comment'></div>愿新祠宇。以崇祭祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374938_comment'></div>今易卑庳。变为华敞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374938_comment'></div>正位南面。庙貌严整。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374938_comment'></div>风雷云雨。师伯必备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374938_comment'></div>侍卫旗戟。罗列森然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374938_comment'></div>惟神系云在襟。贮雨在缶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374938_comment'></div>视人如子。渴即与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374938_comment'></div>不容凶邪。不降疾疫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374938_comment'></div>千万年间。使池之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374938_comment'></div>敬仰不怠。伏惟尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374938_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1374938_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=846&endYear=846')">846年</a>　在池州，池州刺史任上。杜牧有诗一首,姑系于此。作品：《见刘秀才与池州妓别》<span -----title
杭州（钱塘）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='e1ed28cbff0241a39ce71442aa11b22d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e1ed28cbff0241a39ce71442aa11b22d");'><span id='e1ed28cbff0241a39ce71442aa11b22d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=846&endYear=846')">846年</a>，44岁</div><div id='e1ed28cbff0241a39ce71442aa11b22d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=846&endYear=846')">846年12月</a>　杜牧过钱塘。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='b7952969a0ea401f87680ef640c9d21e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b7952969a0ea401f87680ef640c9d21e");'><span id='b7952969a0ea401f87680ef640c9d21e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=846&endYear=846')">846年</a>，44岁</div><div id='b7952969a0ea401f87680ef640c9d21e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=846&endYear=846')">846年12月</a>　经杭州，杜牧作诗一首。作品：《杭州新造南亭子记》<div id='poem_1374900' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374900' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374900?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杭州新造南亭子记</a><span class='authorDate'>（846年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374900")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374900_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374900'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374900'>佛著经曰。生人既死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374900_comment'></div>阴府收其精神。校平生行事罪福之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374900_comment'></div>坐罪者刑。狱皆怪险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374900_comment'></div>非人世所为。凡人平生一失举止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374900_comment'></div>皆落其间。其尤怪者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374900_comment'></div>狱广大千百万亿里。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1374900", 1374900, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>积火</span>烧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374900_comment'></div>一日凡千万生死。穷亿万世无有间断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374900_comment'></div>名为无间。夹殿宏廊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374900_comment'></div>悉图其状。人未熟见者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374900_comment'></div>莫不毛立神骇。佛经曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374900_comment'></div>我国有阿阇世王。杀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1374900", 1374900, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>父王</span>篡其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374900_comment'></div>法当入所谓狱无间者。昔能求事佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374900_comment'></div>后生为天人。况其他罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374900_comment'></div>事佛固无恙。梁武帝明智勇武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374900_comment'></div>创为梁国者。舍身为僧奴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374900_comment'></div>至国灭饿死不闻悟。况下辈固惑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374900_comment'></div>为工商者。杂良以苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374900_comment'></div>伪内而华外。纳以大秤斛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374900_comment'></div>以小出之。欺夺村闾戆民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374900_comment'></div>铢积粒聚。以至于富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374900_comment'></div>刑法钱谷小胥。出入人性命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374900_comment'></div>颠倒埋没。使簿书条令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374900_comment'></div>不可究知。得财买大第豪奴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374900_comment'></div>如公侯家。大吏有权力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374900_comment'></div>能开库取公钱。缘意恣为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374900_comment'></div>人不敢言是。此数者心自知其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374900_comment'></div>皆捐己奉佛以求救。日月积久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374900_comment'></div>曰。我罪如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374900_comment'></div>富贵如所求。是佛能灭吾罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374900_comment'></div>复能以福与吾也。有罪罪灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374900_comment'></div>无福福至。生人唯罪福耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374900_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1374900", 1374900, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>田妇</span>稚子。知所趋避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374900_comment'></div>今权归于佛。买福卖罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374900_comment'></div>如持<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1374900", 1374900, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>左契</span>。交手相付。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374900_comment'></div>至有穷民啼一稚子。无以与哺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374900_comment'></div>得百钱。必召一僧饭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374900_comment'></div>冀佛之助。一日获福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374900_comment'></div>若如此。虽举寰海内尽为寺与僧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374900_comment'></div>不足怪也。屋壁绣纹可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374900_comment'></div>为金枝扶疏。擎千万佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374900_comment'></div>僧为具味饭之可矣。饭讫持钱与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374900_comment'></div>不大不壮不高不多不珍不奇瑰怪为忧。无有人力可及而不为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374900_comment'></div>晋霸主也。一铜鞮宫至衰弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374900_comment'></div>诸侯不肯来盟。今天下能如几晋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374900_comment'></div>凡几千铜鞮。人得不困哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374900_comment'></div>文宗皇帝尝语宰相曰。古者三人共食一农人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374900_comment'></div>今加兵佛。一农人乃为五人所共食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374900_comment'></div>其间吾民尤困于佛。帝念其本牢根大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374900_comment'></div>不能果去之。武宗皇帝始即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374900_comment'></div>独奋怒曰。穷吾天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374900_comment'></div>佛也。始去其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1374900", 1374900, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>山台</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1374900", 1374900, "Clauses/101/Comments/1")'>野邑</span>四万所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374900_comment'></div>冠其徒几至十万人。后至会昌五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374900_comment'></div>始命西京留佛寺四。僧唯十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374900_comment'></div>东京二寺。天下所谓节度观察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374900_comment'></div>同华汝三十四治所得留一寺。僧准西京数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374900_comment'></div>其他剌史州不得有寺。出四御史缕行天下以督之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374900_comment'></div>御史乘驿未出关。天下寺至于屋基耕而刓之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374900_comment'></div>凡除寺四千六百。僧尼笄冠二十六万五百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374900_comment'></div>其奴婢十五万。良人枝附为使令者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374900_comment'></div>倍笄冠之数。良田数千万顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374900_comment'></div>奴婢口率与百亩编入农籍。其馀贱取民直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374900_comment'></div>归于有司。寺材州县得以恣新其公署传舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374900_comment'></div>今天子接位。诏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374900_comment'></div>佛尚不杀而仁。且来中国久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374900_comment'></div>亦可助以为治。天下州率与二寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374900_comment'></div>用齿衰男女为其徒。各止三十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374900_comment'></div>两京数倍其四五焉。著为定令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374900_comment'></div>以徇其习。且使后世不得复加也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374900_comment'></div>赵郡李子烈播。立朝名人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374900_comment'></div>自尚书比部郎中出为钱塘。钱塘于江南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374900_comment'></div>繁大雅亚吴郡。子烈少游其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374900_comment'></div>委曲知其俗。蠹人者剔削根节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374900_comment'></div>断其脉络。不数月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374900_comment'></div>人随化之。三笺干丞相云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374900_comment'></div>涛坏人居不一。釬锢败侵不休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374900_comment'></div>诏与钱二千万。筑长堤以为数十年计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374900_comment'></div>人益安善。子烈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374900_comment'></div>吴越古今多文士。来吾郡游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374900_comment'></div>登楼倚轩。莫不飘然而增思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374900_comment'></div>吾郡之江山甲于天下。信然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374900_comment'></div>佛炽害中国六百岁。生见圣人一挥而几夷之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374900_comment'></div>今不取其寺材。立亭胜地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374900_comment'></div>以彰圣人之功。使文士歌诗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374900_comment'></div>后必有指吾而骂者。乃作南亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374900_comment'></div>在城东南隅。宏大<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_1374900", 1374900, "Clauses/169/Comments/0")'>焕显</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374900_comment'></div>工施手目。发匀肉均牙滑而无遗巧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374900_comment'></div>江平入天。越峰如髻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374900_comment'></div>越树如发。孤帆白鸟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1374900_comment'></div>点尽上凝。在半夜酒馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1374900_comment'></div>倚老松。坐怪石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1374900_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1374900", 1374900, "Clauses/180/Comments/0")'>殷殷</span>潮声。起于月外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1374900_comment'></div>东闽两越。宦游善地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1374900_comment'></div>天下名士多往之。予知百数十年后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1374900_comment'></div>登南亭者。念仁圣天子之神功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1374900_comment'></div>美子烈之旨迹。睹南亭千万状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1374900_comment'></div>吟不辞已。四时千万状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1374900_comment'></div>吟不能去。作为歌诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1374900_comment'></div>次之于后。不知几千百人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1374900_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_98_1374900_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

-----title
建德
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='fe6cf91807dd4612a3c958231f0bf7e4_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("fe6cf91807dd4612a3c958231f0bf7e4");'><span id='fe6cf91807dd4612a3c958231f0bf7e4_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=846&endYear=848')">846-848年</a>，44-46岁</div><div id='fe6cf91807dd4612a3c958231f0bf7e4' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=846&endYear=846')">846年</a>　杜牧抵睦州，任睦州刺史。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=847&endYear=847')">847年1月</a>　在睦州，睦州刺史任上。初春，杜牧作诗感怀，并寄友人邢群。作品：《初春有感寄歙州邢员外》<div id='poem_32342' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32342' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/32342?labeling=true' target='_blank'>初春有感寄歙州邢员外</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32342")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_32342_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32342'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32342'>雪涨前溪水，啼声已绕滩。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32342_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32342'>梅衰未减态，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_32342", 32342, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>春嫩</span>不禁寒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32342_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32342'>迹去梦一觉，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_32342", 32342, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>年来</span>事百般。<div id='poem_sentence_2_32342_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_32342'>闻君亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_32342", 32342, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>多感</span>，何处倚阑干。<div id='poem_sentence_3_32342_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_32342'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_32342_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=847&endYear=847')">847年</a>　在睦州，睦州刺史任上。杜牧有诗酬邢群。作品：《正初奉酬歙州刺史邢群》<span class='inlineComment2'>（邢群，字涣思，河间人。大和三年登进士第。）</span><div id='poem_32153' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32153' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/32153?labeling=true' target='_blank'>正初奉酬歙州刺史邢群</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32153")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_32153_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32153'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32153'>翠岩千尺倚溪斜，曾得严光作钓家。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32153'>越嶂远分丁字水，腊梅迟见二年花。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1374899_comment'></div>有求名而名不随者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374899_comment'></div>未之闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374899_comment'></div>治心莫若和平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374899_comment'></div>治身莫若兢谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374899_comment'></div>治友莫若诚信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374899_comment'></div>友治矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374899_comment'></div>非身治而不能得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374899_comment'></div>身治矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374899_comment'></div>非心治而不能致之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374899_comment'></div>三者治矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374899_comment'></div>推而广之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374899_comment'></div>可以治天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374899_comment'></div>恶其求成进士名者而不得也。<div id='poem_sentence_21_1374899_comment'></div>古之圣贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374899_comment'></div>业大事钜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374899_comment'></div>道行则不肖惧。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1374864_comment'></div>每促束于簿书宴游间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374864_comment'></div>刺史七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374864_comment'></div>病弟孀妹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374864_comment'></div>百口之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374864_comment'></div>经营衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374864_comment'></div>复有一州赋讼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374864_comment'></div>私以贫苦焦虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374864_comment'></div>公以愚恐败悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374864_comment'></div>仍有嗜酒多睡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374864_comment'></div>厕于其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374864_comment'></div>是数者相遭于多忘格卑之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374864_comment'></div>书不得日读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374864_comment'></div>文不得专心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374864_comment'></div>百不逮人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374864_comment'></div>所尚业复不能尺寸铢两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374864_comment'></div>自强自进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374864_comment'></div>乃庸人辈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374864_comment'></div>复何言哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374864_comment'></div>今者欲求为贽于大君子门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374864_comment'></div>尚可以为文而为其礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374864_comment'></div>诗所谓有腼面目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374864_comment'></div>视人罔极者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374864_comment'></div>谨敢缮写所为文凡二十首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374864_comment'></div>伏地汗赧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374864_comment'></div>不知所云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374864_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1374864_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=848')">848年</a>　在睦州，睦州刺史任上。杜牧作诗三首。作品：《朱坡绝句三首》<span "poem_title_32108")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_32108_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32108'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32108'>雨滴珠玑碎，苔生紫翠重。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32108'>故关何日到，且看小三峰。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=848')">848年8月3日</a>　八月，受宰相周墀援引之力，杜牧内擢为司勋员外郎、史馆修撰。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=848')">848年9月</a>　九月初，杜牧自睦州启程赴长安，作诗一首。作品：《秋晚早发新定》《除官归京睦州雨霁》<div id='poem_32218' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32218' class='poemTitle href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32218")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_32218_comment'></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_32218'>凉风满红树，晓月下秋江。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32218_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32218'>岩壑会归去，尘埃终不降。<div id='poem_sentence_4_32218'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_32218_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_32323' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32323' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a -----title
桐庐
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='2cc80c449a124ac795d38655b1aee9c6_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2cc80c449a124ac795d38655b1aee9c6");'><span id='2cc80c449a124ac795d38655b1aee9c6_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=848')">848年</a>，46岁</div><div id='2cc80c449a124ac795d38655b1aee9c6' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=848')">848年9月</a>　杜牧夜泊桐庐，有诗寄友人。作品：《夜泊桐庐先寄苏台卢郎中》<div id='poem_32349' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_32349' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/32349?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夜泊桐庐先寄苏台卢郎中</a><span class='authorDate'>（848年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32349")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_32349_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_32349'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7076, "poem_allusion_32349")'>清裁</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_32349_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32349'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32349'>水槛桐庐馆，归舟系石根。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32349_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32349'>笛吹孤戌月，犬吠隔溪村。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32349_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32349'>十载违<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7076, "poem_sentence_2_32349")'>清裁</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（一作义）</span>，幽怀未一论。<div id='poem_sentence_2_32349_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_32349'>苏台菊花节，何处与开樽？<div id='poem_sentence_3_32349_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_32349'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_32349_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
宁陵
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='d827a2a4226940b59eda2b11f4a64050_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d827a2a4226940b59eda2b11f4a64050");'><span id='d827a2a4226940b59eda2b11f4a64050_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=848')">848年</a>，46岁</div><div id='d827a2a4226940b59eda2b11f4a64050' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>杜牧过宋州。杜牧作文一篇。作品：《宋州宁陵县记》<div id='poem_1374905' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374905' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374905?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋州宁陵县记</a><span class='authorDate'>（848年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374905")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374905_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374905'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374905'>建中初年。李希烈自蔡陷汴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374905_comment'></div>驱兵东下。将收江淮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374905_comment'></div>宁陵守将刘昌以兵二千拒之。希烈众且十倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374905_comment'></div>攻之三月。韩晋公以三千强弩涉水夜入宁陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374905_comment'></div>弩矢至希烈帐前。希烈曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374905_comment'></div>复益吴弩。宁陵不可取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374905_comment'></div>解围归汴。后数月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374905_comment'></div>希烈骁将翟辉以锐兵大败于淮阳城下。希烈且蹙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374905_comment'></div>弃汴归蔡。后司徒刘公元佐见昌问曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374905_comment'></div>尔以孤城。用一当十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374905_comment'></div>凡百日间。何以能守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374905_comment'></div>昌泣曰。以负心能守之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374905_comment'></div>昌令陴者曰。内顾者斩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374905_comment'></div>昌孤甥张俊守西北隅。未尝内顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374905_comment'></div>捽下斩之。军士有死志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374905_comment'></div>故能坚守。因伏地流涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374905_comment'></div>司徒刘公亦泣。抚昌背曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374905_comment'></div>国家必以富贵尔。无忧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374905_comment'></div>天宝末。淮阳太守薛愿睢阳太守许远真源县令张巡等兵守二城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374905_comment'></div>其于穷蹙。事相差埒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374905_comment'></div>睢阳陷贼。淮阳能守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374905_comment'></div>故巡远名悬。而愿事不传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374905_comment'></div>昌之守宁陵。近比之于睢阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374905_comment'></div>故良臣之名不如忠臣。孙武曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374905_comment'></div>善用兵者无赫赫之功。斯是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374905_comment'></div>大中二年十一月十八日。将仕郎守尚书司勋员外郎史馆修撰杜某题。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374905_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1374905_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>冬，杜牧由睦州回长安赴任，过汴河，有诗一首。作品：《汴河阻冻》<div id='poem_31982' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_31982' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/31982?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汴河阻冻</a><span class='authorDate'>（848年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_31982")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_31982_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_31982'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_31982'>千里长河初冻时，玉珂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_31982", 31982, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>瑶佩</span>响参差。<div id='poem_sentence_0_31982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_31982'>浮生却<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作一）</span>似冰底水，日夜东流人不知。<div id='poem_sentence_1_31982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_31982'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_31982_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
湖州（乌程）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='bdf4b1154fe84b65bedfd40e786b8b65_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("bdf4b1154fe84b65bedfd40e786b8b65");'><span id='bdf4b1154fe84b65bedfd40e786b8b65_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=851&endYear=851')">851年2月</a>　二月，周墀卒于东川节度使任所，杜牧撰文伤悼。作品：《祭周相公文》<div id='poem_1374940' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374940' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374940?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭周相公文</a><span class='authorDate'>（851年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_1374940")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374940_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374940'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374940'>维大和五年岁次辛未七月辛未朔八日戊寅。故吏朝议郎知湖州诸军事守湖州刺史杜牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374940_comment'></div>谨遣军事押衙司马素。谨以清酌庶羞之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374940_comment'></div>敬祭于故相国仆射赠司徒周公之灵。伏惟相公之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374940_comment'></div>遍于天下。至如牧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374940_comment'></div>受恩丛深。爰自稚齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374940_comment'></div>即蒙顾许。及在宦途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374940_comment'></div>援挈益至。会昌之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374940_comment'></div>柄者为谁。忿忍阴污。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374940_comment'></div>多逐良善。牧实忝幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374940_comment'></div>亦在遣中。黄冈大泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374940_comment'></div>葭苇之场。继来池阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374940_comment'></div>栖在孤岛。僻左五岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374940_comment'></div>遭逢圣明。收拾冤沈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374940_comment'></div>诛破罪恶。牧于此际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374940_comment'></div>更迁桐庐。东下京江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374940_comment'></div>南走千里。曲屈越嶂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374940_comment'></div>如入洞穴。惊涛触舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374940_comment'></div>几至倾没。万山环合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374940_comment'></div>才千馀家。夜有哭乌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374940_comment'></div>昼有毒雾。病无与医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374940_comment'></div>饥不兼食。抑暗偪塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374940_comment'></div>行少卧多。逐者纷纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374940_comment'></div>归轸相接。唯牧远弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374940_comment'></div>其道益艰。相公怜悯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374940_comment'></div>极力掀拔。爰及作相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374940_comment'></div>首取西归。授之名曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374940_comment'></div>帖以重职。虢国太子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374940_comment'></div>绛市谍人。死而复生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374940_comment'></div>未足为喻。旌旆西去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374940_comment'></div>拜于都门。贤士大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374940_comment'></div>无不攀惜。皆曰相公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374940_comment'></div>事君尽忠。保道轻位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374940_comment'></div>大张公室。尽闭私门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374940_comment'></div>彼由径者。跛倚不进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374940_comment'></div>天下贤彦。明知所趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374940_comment'></div>重德壮年。众期再入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374940_comment'></div>牧守吴兴。继奉手示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374940_comment'></div>但云休退。不言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1374940", 1374940, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>疾恙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374940_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1374940", 1374940, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>讣问</span>忽至。恸哭问天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374940_comment'></div>岂独私恩。想像音容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374940_comment'></div>思惟恩纪。期于令嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1374843_comment'></div>统华夏为一家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1374843_comment'></div>用夷狄为四守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1374843_comment'></div>万物由道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1374843_comment'></div>百度皆贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1374843_comment'></div>远超三代之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1374843_comment'></div>使无一人之狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1374843_comment'></div>臣僻左小郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1374843_comment'></div>朴𣙙散材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1374843_comment'></div>空过流年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1374843_comment'></div>徒生圣代。<div class='inline' ShowPoemAuthorProfile(17274, "唐", "杜牧", "poem_title_32240")'>杜牧</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_32240_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_32240'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9805, "poem_allusion_32240")'>一麾</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_32240_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_32240'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_32240'>贱子来千里，明公去<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9805, "poem_sentence_0_32240")'>一麾</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_32240_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_32240'>可<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作不）</span>能休<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作挥）</span>涕泪，岂独感恩知。<div id='poem_sentence_1_32240_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_32240'>草木穷秋<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作秋风）</span>后，山川落照时。<div id='poem_sentence_2_32240_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_32240'>如何望故国，驱马却迟迟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_32240_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_32240'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_32240_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
